1a1(myang 'das): @#/ /myang 'das ka pa bzhugs so//
1b1(myang 'das): rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya mahA pa
1b2(myang 'das): ri nirbA NaM NA ma sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags
1b3(myang 'das): pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
1b4(myang 'das): byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa rnam par sel/ /
1b5(myang 'das): tshogs gnyis mthar phyin rnam 'dren lnga pa che/ /
1b6(myang 'das): byang sems phyag na rdo rje mthu stobs dbang / /
2a1(myang 'das): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis
2a2(myang 'das): thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rtswa mchog gi grong khyer skyes bu stobs
2a3(myang 'das): po che 'byung ba'i gnas klung ha ri la ba ti'i 'gram shing sA la drung gnyis kyi bar na/ dge slong chen po'i dge 'dun brgya stong phrag brgyad cu snyed kyis yongs su bskor nas/
2a4(myang 'das): mdun du bdar te thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/
2a5(myang 'das): /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dpyid zla/
2a6(myang 'das): 'jam dpal dbyangs dngos zla med tsong kha pa/ /
2a7(myang 'das): yang dag rigs la ma kun sbyong thub bstan mtshan/ /
2b1(myang 'das): 'bring po'i tshes bco lnga'i nyin par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs su nye ba na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi
2b2(myang 'das): r labs kyis gsung chen pos srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du kun tu khyab par sems can thams cad la so so'i skad du gsung 'di
2b3(myang 'das): skad ces grags par gyur to/ /deng de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skye bo mang
2b4(myang 'das): po rnams la thugs brtse ba/ sems can thams cad kyi skyabs dang mgon du gyur pa/ sems can thams cad la sras sgra
2b5(myang 'das): gcan 'dzin dang 'dra ba'i mnyam par gzigs pa/ sems can gyi skyabs dang / dpung gnyen dang / rten dang / gnas su
2b6(myang 'das): gyur pa deng yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/ /so so'i skye bo dag the tshom dang som nyir gyur pa yod na/ da zhu zhing dri ba'i dus
3a1(myang 'das): nang gi tha ma 'dir zhu zhing gsol cig / ces pa'i gsung gis yongs su grags par gyur to/ /de'i tshe
3a2(myang 'das): bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe zhal gyi sgo nas 'od rnam pa sna tshogs bkye ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar
3a3(myang 'das): po dang / dkar po dang / shel lta bus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
3a4(myang 'das): khams kyi bar du yongs su snang bar byas nas/ de dag na gnas pa'i lam rgyud drug gi sems can dag 'od zer des reg ma thag
3a5(myang 'das): tu kha na ma tho ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad byang bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe so so'i skye bo dag de lta bu'i ltas mthong zhing thos nas mya ngan
3a6(myang 'das): chen pos yid gdungs te/ dus gcig tu cho nges rdung zhing ngus nas 'di skad du/ e ma'o/ shin tu byams pa'i pha mar gyur
3b1(myang 'das): pa/ kyi hud/ kyi hud mya ngan las 'das sam zhes smras nas/ thal mos mgo dang brang la rdebs te cho nge rdung ngo / /kha cig ni/ lus kyang rab tu 'dar zhing ba spu kun langs
3b2(myang 'das): nas skad kyis brnangs pa tsam du dus so/ /de'i tshe na sa chen po 'di dang / ri dang rgya mtsho'ang rab tu g.yos shing 'khrugs so/ /de nas sems can de dag gcig la gcig spro
3b3(myang 'das): bsring zhing mya ngan bsang ba'i phyir 'di skad du/ kye/ grogs po dag /mya ngan ma byed par myur du rtswa mchog gi grong khyer skyes bu stobs po che 'byung ba'i gnas de bzhin
3b4(myang 'das): gshegs pa ga la ba der 'dong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar 'jig rten na
3b5(myang 'das): bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa gcig 'gribs kyi bar du bzhugs par gsol du 'deng ngo zhes smras so/ /la la ni gcig gi lag pa la gcig gis 'jus nas 'di skad
3b6(myang 'das): du 'jig rten stongs te/ sems can gyi bsod nams zad pas mi dge ba'i las 'jig rten du byung bar gyur gyi/ grogs po dag /de bzhin gshegs pa ni ring po mi thogs
3b7(myang 'das): par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs nges kyi/ bdag cag myur du 'deng ngo zhes smra'o/ /la la ni 'di skad du 'jig rten stongs so/ /'jig rten stongs so/ /bdag
4a1(myang 'das): cag la deng slan chad ni mgon dang skyabs med de/ dbul phongs par gyur to/ /deng kho nar bla na med pa'i bcom ldan 'das dang yongs su bral
4a2(myang 'das): bas/ da slan chad som nyi dang the tshom za ba su la zhu zhes smra'o/ /de'i tshe na tshad med pa'i nye gnas chen po tshe dang ldan pa kAt+yA ya na chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ba ku la dang /
4a3(myang 'das): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la sogs pa dge slong chen po de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis reg pas lus kun 'dar zhing mi bzod pa tsam du rab tu g.yos te/ sems
4a4(myang 'das): kyang myos nas cho nges 'debs shing de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis non par gyur to/ /de'i tshe na gzhan yang dge slong brgya stong phrag brgyad cu snyed thams cad
4a5(myang 'das): kyang dgra bcom pa/ sems kyi dbang du gyur pa/ bya ba byas pa/ nyon mongs pa yongs su spangs pa/ dbang po thams cad rab tu dul ba/ klu'i rgyal po chen po ltar mthu che
4a6(myang 'das): ba/ stong pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa/ phyis bdag gi don rab tu rnyed pa/ tsan dan gyi tshal ltar tsan dan gyis yongs su bskor ba/ seng ge'i rgyal po ltar seng ges yongs
4a7(myang 'das): su bskor ba/ de lta bu'i tshad med pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi sras yang dag pa sha stag go /de dag kyang snga dro nyi ma shar ma thag tu gnas
4b1(myang 'das): nas byung ste/ so shing 'cha' ba na sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis reg nas gcig la gcig 'di skad du/ grogs po dag /myur du kha lag khrus shig ces smras so/ /de skad ces smras ma
4b2(myang 'das): thag tu lus kyi ba spu kun langs nas/ lus la khyab par khrag gis rgyas pa ni me tog pa la sha lta bur gyur te/ mig mchi mas gang nas sdug bsngal chen po myong bar gyur to/ /de
4b3(myang 'das): dag thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir/ theg pa chen po don dam pa'i stong pa nyid la rnal 'byor du bsgrub pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs
4b4(myang 'das): pas thabs su dgongs te gsungs pa dag bstan pa'i phyir/ rnam pa sna tshogs su chos ston pa rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad yongs su gdul ba'i phyir/ bcom
4b5(myang 'das): ldan 'das gang na ba der myur du dong nas spyi bos sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te/ lan brgya stong du bskor nas thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de'i tshe gzhan
4b6(myang 'das): yang kun+ta la'i bu mo dge slong ma dpal bzang dang / dge slong ma bsnyen dga' ma dang / dge slong ma rgya mtsho'i blo gros la sogs te/ dge slong ma khri phrag drug cu snyed thams
4b7(myang 'das): cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ sems kyi dbang du gyur pa/ bya ba byas pa/ nyon mongs pa yongs su spangs pa/ dbang po rab tu dul ba/ klu chen po ltar gzi brjid
5a1(myang 'das): rab tu che ba/ stong pa nyid kyi shes rab dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ de dag kyang sda dro'i dus kyi tshe nyi ma thog mar shar ba na/ lus kyi ba spu kun skyi bud
5a2(myang 'das): zhes byed nas lus la khyab par khrag gis rgyas pa ni me tog pa la sha lta bur gyur te/ mig mchi mas yongs su gang nas sdug bsngal chen po myong bar gyur to/ /de dag kyang
5a3(myang 'das): sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/ theg pa chen po don dam pa'i stong pa nyid la rnal 'byor du bsgrub pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas thabs su dgongs te
5a4(myang 'das): gsungs pa dag bstan pa'i phyir/ rnam pa sna tshogs su chos ston pa rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad yongs su gdul ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das gang na ba
5a5(myang 'das): der myur du dong nas sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal te/ lan brgya stong du bskor nas thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /dge slong ma de dag gi nang na
5a6(myang 'das): dge slong ma kha cig ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ste/ mi'i nang na klu lta bu sa bcu rab tu non pa/ mi g.yo ba la gnas pa/ sems can gdul ba'i phyir bud med kyi lus
5a7(myang 'das): ston kyang rtag tu tshad med pa bzhi la nan tan byed pa/ sems kyi dbang du gyur pas sangs rgyas kyi skur yang sprul pa sha stag go /de'i tshe gzhan yang klung gang+gA gcig gi bye ma
5b1(myang 'das): snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi'i nang na klu lta bu sa bcu rab tu non pa/ mi g.yo ba la rab tu gnas pa/ thabs kyis lus ston pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang
5b2(myang 'das): chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la sogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis thog mar drangs nas
5b3(myang 'das): thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la bkur sti byed pa/ theg pa chen po la rab tu gnas pa/ theg pa chen po la shin tu mkhas pa/ theg pa chen po la shin tu mos pa/ theg pa chen po
5b4(myang 'das): la shin tu bsrung ba/ 'jig rten du bcas pa thams cad kyi sems dang sbyor ba/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus sum grol ba grol bar yi dam 'cha' ba/ 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs
5b5(myang 'das): med pa'i bar du tshul khrims yongs su bsrungs pa/ spyod pa yongs su 'dzin pa/ ma grol ba grol bar byed pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par 'tshob pa/ ma 'ongs
5b6(myang 'das): pa'i dus su chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba/ rgyan chen pos shin tu brgyan pa de lta bu'i yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra
5b7(myang 'das): bar lta ba sha stag go / de dag kyang snga dro'i dus nyi ma shar ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis reg ma thag tu lus kyi ba spu kun la'ang te/ lus la khyab par khrag gis rgyas pa ni ji
6a1(myang 'das): ltar me tog pa la sha lta bur gyur te/ mig mchi mas yongs su gang nas sdug bsngal myong bar gyur to/ /de dag kyang sems can thams cad
6a2(myang 'das): la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/ theg pa chen po don dam pa'i stong pa nyid la rnal 'byor du bsgrub pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas thabs su dgongs te gsungs pa bstan
6a3(myang 'das): pa'i phyir/ rnam pa sna tshogs su chos ston pa rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad yongs su gdul ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der myur du dong nas
6a4(myang 'das): phyin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal nas lan brgya stong du bskor te/ thal mo sbyar nas bsti stang dang bcas pas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de'i
6a5(myang 'das): tshe gzhan yang klu gang+gA gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi dge bsnyen pha khrims lnga yongs su bsrung ba la 'di lta ste/ dge bsnyen gzi brjid dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po dang /
6a6(myang 'das): dge bsnyen legs pa'i yon tan la sogs pas thog mar drangs te/ thams cad kyang gnyen por gyur pa'i chos la shin tu mos pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang / bde
6a7(myang 'das): ba dang / rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / yongs su dag pa dang / ma dag pa dang / bdag dang / bdag med pa dang / nges pa dang / ma nges pa dang / skyabs su 'gro ba dang
6b1(myang 'das): skyabs su mi 'gro ba dang / sems can dang / sems can ma yin pa dang / ther zug dang / ther zug ma yin pa dang / bde ba dang / bde ba ma yin pa dang / 'dus byas pa dang /
6b2(myang 'das): 'dus ma byas pa dang / chad pa dang / chad pa ma yin pa dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin pa dang / lhag pa dang / lhag pa ma yin pa la sogs te/
6b3(myang 'das): gnyen por gyur pa'i chos 'di dag la rtag par shin tu mos pa sha stag go /gzhan yang bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po la thos par mos pa/ ji ltar thos pa bzhin du gzhan la'ang
6b4(myang 'das): ston nus pa/ tshul khrims yongs su bsrung ba/ theg pa chen po la skom pas gdungs pa ltar mos pa bdag kyang shin tu ngoms la/ skom pas gdungs pa gzhan yang ngoms par
6b5(myang 'das): byed pa/ bla na med pa'i ye shes la shin tu 'jug pa/ theg pa chen po la shin tu mos pa/ theg pa chen po la shin tu bsrung ba/ 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi sems dang shin tu
6b6(myang 'das): sbyor ba/ ma rgal ba sgrol ba/ ma grol ba 'grol ba/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par 'tshob pa/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus su chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu bskor ba
6b7(myang 'das): rgyan chen pos rnam par brgyan pa/ sems shin tu zab mo'i rol mos pa/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa/ thams cad kyang de lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa/ sems can thams
7a1(myang 'das): cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed cing bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar gnyis su med par snyoms pa sha stag go / de dag kyang snga dro'i dus nyi ma shar
7a2(myang 'das): ma thag tu 'od zer gyis reg nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur zhugs la bzhen pa'i phyir thams cad kyis so so nas spos kyi shing khri phrag du ma bshams pa la 'di lta ste/ spos kyi shing tsan dan dang /
7a3(myang 'das): a ga ru dang / go shiR+Sha tsan dan dang / lha'i shing bsung can la sogs pa'o/ /shing de dag kyang mdzes pa'i ri mo dang ldan zhing rin po che sna bdun
7a4(myang 'das): gyis rnam par brgyan pa/ 'od shin tu 'tsher zhing gsal ba ni/ dper na/ ri mo mkhan gyis tshon sna tshogs bkye ba dang 'dra ste/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'od kha
7a5(myang 'das): dog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang ldan te/ 'gro ba mang pos mthong na dga' bar 'gyur ba sha stag go/ shing rnam pa mang po de dag la gzhan
7a6(myang 'das): yang rnam pa sna tshogs kyi spos kyi lde gu dang / gur gum dang / a ga ru dang / pog la sogs pas yongs su bskus la/ me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gtor cing brgyan
7a7(myang 'das): pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ me tog ut+pa la dang / me tog ku mu da dang / me tog pad+mo dang / me tog puN+Da ri ka la sogs pa'o/ /shing de dag la gzhan yang tshon rnam pa lnga dang
7b1(myang 'das): ldan pa'i ba dan shin tu 'jam zhing mdzes pa yongs su dpyangs pa ni/ dper na/ lha'i na bza' ke'u sha ya'am/ shu ma lta bu'o/ /spos kyi shing de dag kyang rin po che'i shing rtas
7b2(myang 'das): bskyas te/ rin po che'i shing rta de dag las kyang 'od rnam pa sna tshogs byung ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po'o/ /shing rta'i gnya' shing
7b3(myang 'das): dang / bar gdang la sogs pa'ang rin po che sna bdun gyis rnam par spras te/ shing rta de re re'ang rta bzhi bzhis drangs so/ /rta de dag kyang mgyogs khyad rlung dang 'dra'o/ /shing rta de re
7b4(myang 'das): re'i mdun na rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyal mtshan lnga bcu snyed dngar te/ gser gyi dra bas bla res bres so/ /rin po che'i shin rta de re re'i steng steng yang rin po che'i gdugs lnga bcu snyed
7b5(myang 'das): bres so/ /shing rta de re re la'ang me tog gi phreng ba dpyangs pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ me tog ut+pa la dang / me tog ku mu da dang / me tog pad+mo dang puN+Da ri ka rnams te/ 'dab ma ni gser/
7b6(myang 'das): ge sar ni rdo rje las byas te/ me tog ge sar de dag gi nang na'ang bung ba nag po lding zhing rtse'o/ /gzhan yang sgra skad shin tu snyan pa dang / de ma yin pa mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal
7b7(myang 'das): ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / bdag med pa'i sgra'ang 'byin to/ /de dag las gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sngon spyad pa spyod pa'i sgra dang / gzhan yang rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs
8a1(myang 'das): kyi sgra grag pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ glu dang / gar dang / gling bu dang / dgu po rgyud mang dang / se'u dang / shir dang / rnga'i sgra rnams so/ /rol mo'i sgra de
8a2(myang 'das): bslas gzhan yang / 'di skad du/ kyi hud/ kyi hud 'jig rten stongs so zhes zer ba'i sgra'ang byung ngo / /shing rta de re re'i mdun na/ dge bsnyen rin po che sna bzhi'i khri'u thogs
8a3(myang 'das): ba re re yod de/ khri'u de'i steng na rnam pa sna tshogs kyi me tog spungs pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ me tog ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+mo dang / puN+Da ri ka dang / gur gum dang / byug
8a4(myang 'das): spos dang / bdug spos la sogs pa mchog tu gyur/ phul du gyur pa rnams bshams so/ /dge bsnyen rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun la bsod snyoms rnam pa sna
8a5(myang 'das): tshogs bshams pa'ang thams cad tsan dan dang / a ga ru'i shing bsung can bsregs te/ yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu las g.yos su byas so/ /zhal zas de dag
8a6(myang 'das): kyang ro rnam pa drug dang ldan no/ /'di lta ste/ kha ba dang / skyur ba dang / mngar ba dang / tsha ba dang / lan tshwa bro ba dang / bsngal ba'i ro dang ldan no/ /gzhan yang yon tan
8a7(myang 'das): rnam pa gsum dang ldan te/ mnyen zhing 'jam pa dang / gtsang ba dang / chos bzhin byas pa'o/ /de lta bu la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bshams nas/ stobs
8b1(myang 'das): po che 'byung ba'i gnas sA la'i shing drung du lhags so/ /gzhan yang gser gyi bye mas sa gzhir brdal te/ lha'i na bza' ka tsa lin+da dang / kham pa la dang / dar gyis de'i steng du
8b2(myang 'das): bting ba ni/ kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad bcu gnyis tshun chad yog par byas so/ /sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun bzhugs pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyi seng+ge'i khri bshams te/ khri
8b3(myang 'das): de dag kyang 'phang du mtho khyad ri rab lhun po dang mnyam mo/ khrid dag gi steng na rin po che'i gur phub nas do shal rnam pa mang po dbyangs so/ /sA la'i shing de dag la'ang rnam pa
8b4(myang 'das): sna tshogs kyi ba dan dpyangs te/ gdugs bres nas rnam pa sna tshogs kyi spos bsung can gyi lde gus shing de dag la bskus so/ /shing gi bar yang me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis
8b5(myang 'das): chal bar bkang ngo / /dge bsnyen de rnams so so nas yid la 'di snyam du sems so/ /so so'i skye bo dag gal te bza' bas brel na bza' ba byin no/ /btung bas brel ba la btung
8b6(myang 'das): ba/ mgo 'dod pa rnams la mgo/ mig 'dod pa rnams la mig /de ltar so so'i skye bo dag ci 'dod pa bzhin du sbyin pa thams cad byin te/ sbyin pa de'ang 'dod chags dang /
8b7(myang 'das): zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / rnyog pa'i sems med do/ /de las gzhan pa 'jig rten gyi longs spyod kyi phyir bsam pa'i sems med kyi/ bla na med pa yongs su dag pa'i byang
9a1(myang 'das): chub 'ba' zhig gi phyir ro/ /dge bsnyen de dag bla na med pa'i byang chub la bde bar gnas nas yang 'di snyam du sems so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
9a2(myang 'das): ni bdag cag gi mchod pa 'di bzhes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o snyam bsams nas/ de dag gi lus kyi ba spu kun langs te/ lus khrag gis rgyas pa ni me tog pa la sha
9a3(myang 'das): lta bur gyur/ mchi mas ni mig gang / sdug bsngal chen pos ni yid gdungs par gyur te/ so so nas mchod pa'i yo byad bshams pa spos kyi shing dang / rgyal mtshan dang
9a4(myang 'das): ba dan dang / gdugs dang / zhal zas rnams rin po che'i shing rtas bskyas nas sangs rgyas gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal
9a5(myang 'das): nas mchod pa'i yo byad bshams pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod de/ lan brgya stong du bskor nas skad phyung ste ngus so/ /du ba'i sgras gnam sa'ang g.yos so/ /brang
9a6(myang 'das): rdung zhing cho nges 'debs te/ mchi ma char bzhin du zag nas/ gcig la gcig 'di skad du/ kyi hud/ kyi hud grogs po dag /'jig rten stongs so/ /'jig rten stongs
9a7(myang 'das): so zhes smras nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lus brdabs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /de bzhin gshegs pas thugs brtse ba'i
9b1(myang 'das): slad du bdag cag gi mchod pa bshams pa nang gi tha ma 'di bzhes shig ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dus mkhyen pas cang mi gsung ste ma bzhes nas/ de bzhin du lan
9b2(myang 'das): gsum gyi bar du gsol kyang bzhes su ma gnang ngo / /dge bsnyen de dag bsam pa bzhin du ma gyur nas/ mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te/ cad mi smra bar 'khod pa ni/ dper na/ pha
9b3(myang 'das): ma shin tu byams pa'i bu gcig pa glo bur du nad kyis btab ste/ tshe 'phos nas ngur du bskyal te/ shin tu mya ngan gyis yid gdungs pa dang 'dra bar dge bsnyen de dag kyang mya ngan
9b4(myang 'das): gyis yid gdungs pa'ang de dang 'dra ste/ mchod pa'i yo byad rnams gnas gcig tu bzhag nas phyogs gcig tu cang mi smra bar 'khod do/ /de'i tshe gzhan yang klung gang+gA gsum
9b5(myang 'das): gyi bye ma snyed kyi dge bsnyen ma khrims lnga yongs su bsrung ba/ spyod lam dang ldan pa 'di lta ste/ dge bsnyen ma 'tsho ba'i yon tan dang / dge bsnyen ma dpal gyi phreng ba dang / dge
9b6(myang 'das): bsnyen ma byi sha ka la sogs pas thog ma drangs nas/ dge bsnyen ma brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed thams cad kyang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa/ sems can tshad med pa brgya stong
9b7(myang 'das): gdul ba'i phyir bud med kyi lus su ston cing khyim gyi chos yongs su smod pa/ bdag gi lus la sprul gdug pa bzhi dang 'dra bar rtogs pa/ lus la rtag tu srin bu grangs med
10a1(myang 'das): pas za ba dang / lus 'di la shin tu btsog pa dang / 'dod pas yongs su bcings par rtogs pa/ lus 'di la khyi ro dang 'dra bar 'jigs su
10a2(myang 'das): rung ba dang / lus 'di ni mi gtsang ba ste/ pu ga dgu nas rtag tu zag par rtogs pa/ lus 'di ni mkhar dang 'dra ste/ sha dang pags pa dang rtsa dang rgyus pas rnam par
10a3(myang 'das): dkris pa/ lag pa dang rkang pa ni mkhar gyi nyen lta bur gyur ba/ mig ni skar khung lta bur gyur pa/ mgo ni khang pa lta bur gyur te/ sems rgyal po dang 'dra ba de'i nang na
10a4(myang 'das): gnas par rtogs pa/ lus mkhar dang 'dra ba 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yongs su spangs te/ bus pa so so'i skye bo dag ni de la chags par byed
10a5(myang 'das): do/ /'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi srin po gnas par rtogs pa/ lus 'di ni snying po med pa ste/ 'dam bu'i myu gu 'am/ e raN+Da 'am/ chu'i chu bur ram/
10a6(myang 'das): chu shing lta bur rtogs pa/ lus 'di ni mi rtag pa ste/ skad cig skad cig tu 'pho zhing / dper na/ glog gi 'od dam/ gzar po'i chu'am/ sgyu ma'am/ smig rgyu 'am/ chu
10a7(myang 'das): la ri mo bris pa lta bur rtogs pa/ lus 'di ni 'gyur zhing 'pho ba ste/ dper na/ chu 'gram g.yang sa'i sdong po lta bur rtogs pa/ lus 'di ni ring por mi thogs pa ste/ spyang
10b1(myang 'das): ki dang / 'phar ba dang / srin bya dang / 'ug pa dang / bya rgod dang / khwa dang / ske ka dang / khyi ltogs pa'i gzan du 'gyur te/ 'di la mkhas pa shes rab can su zhig mos shing
10b2(myang 'das): chags par byed snyam du rtogs pa/ ba rmig gi nang du rgya mtsho chen po'i chu blugs kyang bzod kyi/ lus 'di ni mi rtag pa dang / mi gtsang ba dang / btsog pa ni brjod sla ba ma yin
10b3(myang 'das): par rtogs pa/ sa chen po 'di rgya shug tsam du dril tam/ chung ngu na yungs kar gyi 'bru'am/ rdul phra mor gse ba ni sla'i/ lus 'di'i nyes pa'i skyon brjod pa ni sla ba ma yin par
10b4(myang 'das): rtogs pa/ de bas na mchil ma dang 'dra bar yongs su spangs nas de'i rgyu/ de'i rkyen gyis dge bsnyen ma rnams stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos la
10b5(myang 'das): rtag tu nan tan byed pa/ theg pa chen po'i mdo sde nyan cing 'dzin pa la mos pa/ thos nas kyang gzhan la rgya cher ston nus pa/ sngon gyi smon lam yongs su 'dzin pa/ bud med
10b6(myang 'das): kyi lus la shin tu smod pa/ shin tu skyon che bar shes pa/ snying po med par rtogs pa/ sems rtag tu rnal 'byor du spyod pa/ de bzhin du yang dag par rtog cing mtha' med
10b7(myang 'das): par 'khor ba'i rgyun yongs su gcod pa/ theg pa chen po la skom pas gdungs pa ltar mos pa/ bdag shin tu ngoms pas gzhan yang shin tu ngoms par byed pa/ theg pa
11a1(myang 'das): chen po la rab tu mos pa/ theg pa chen po la shin tu bsrung ba/ bud med kyi lus su ston kyang yang dag par byang chub sems dpa' sha stag ste/ thams
11a2(myang 'das): cad kyang 'jig rten gyi bsam pa dang shin tu sbyor ba/ ma rgal ba sgrol ba/ ma grol ba 'grol ba/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par 'tshob pa/ ma 'ongs pa'i
11a3(myang 'das): dus su chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba/ rgyan chen pos yongs su brgyan pa/ tshul khrims yongs su bsrung ba/ de lta bu'i yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa/ sems can
11a4(myang 'das): thams cad la snying rje'i sems bskyed cing bu gcig pa dang 'dra par gnyis su med par mnyam pa sha stag go / de dag kyang snga dro'i dus nyi ma thog ma shar ba na 'od kyis reg nas/
11a5(myang 'das): gcig la gcig 'di skad du/ deng ni shing sA la drung gnyis kyi drung du 'deng ngo zhes smras so/ /dge bsnyen ma rnams kyis mchod pa'i yo byad bshams pa snga ma bas phyed kyis bzang
11a6(myang 'das): bar sbyar te/ sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal te lan brgya stong bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
11a7(myang 'das): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sangs rgyas dang / dge 'dun du bcas pa la mchod pa'i yo byad bshams pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pas thugs brtse ba'i
11b1(myang 'das): slad du bzhes shig ces gsol to/ /de la bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas bzhes su ma gnang ngo / /dge bsnyen ma rnams bsams pa bzhin du ma gyur pas mya ngan gyis yid
11b2(myang 'das): gdungs te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de'i tshe gzhan yang klung gang+gA bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi li tsa bI'i bu grong khyer yangs pa can na gnas pa'i skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang /
11b3(myang 'das): bu mo dang / chung ma dang / 'khor rnams dang / gzhan yang dzam+bu'i gling gi rgyal rigs su gtogs pa rgyal po'i 'khor dang bcas te/ thams cad kyang chos 'dod pa'i phyir tshul
11b4(myang 'das): khrims yongs su bsrung ba/ spyod lam dang ldan pa/ slob pa gzhan la zhugs shing / dam pa'i chos la sun 'byin pa shin tu tshar gcod pa sha stag gcig la gcig 'di skad
11b5(myang 'das): ces dam 'cha'o/ /bdag cag gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che'i gter mdzod lta bur yang dag pa'i chos shin tu zab mo bdud rtsi lta bur zad mi shes pa yun du 'jig rten na
11b6(myang 'das): gnas par byas te/ bdag cag kyang de dag la rtag tu nan tan du spyod par gyur cig /gal te zhal nas gsungs pa'i dam pa'i chos la dbang za zhing / skur ba zhig yod na bdag
11b7(myang 'das): cag gis de'i lce gcad do zhes dam bcas shing / gzhan yang khyim nas khyim ma yin par rab tu byung ba dag tshul khrims las nyams par gyur na/ bdag cag gis khyim par
12a1(myang 'das): phab ste/ las byed du gzhug go zhes pa dang / gal te dam pa'i chos la nan tan du byed na/ bdag cag gis pha ma dang 'dra bar rim gro dang bkur sti
12a2(myang 'das): bya'o zhes pa dang / gal te dge 'dun las dam pa'i chos la nan tan du spyod pa zhig yod na/ bdag cag gis rjes su yi rang zhing de la mthu'ang sbyin par bya'o zhes dam bcas pa/
12a3(myang 'das): rtag tu theg pa chen po'i mdo sde thos par mos shing / thos nas kyang gzhan la rgyas par ston pa de lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ li tsa bI'i bu rnam dag dri
12a4(myang 'das): ma med pa'i snying po dang / li tsa bI'i bu bag yod rnam par dag pa dang / li tsa bI'i bu rtag tu dri med rnam dag yon tan la sogs te/ de dag gcig la gcig 'di skad du/ kye/
12a5(myang 'das): grogs po dag/ myur bar de bzhin gshegs pa gang na ba der song ste/ mchod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod du 'deng ngo / /de nas li tsa bI de dag re res
12a6(myang 'das): kyang bal glang brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / rin po che'i shing rta rta bzhi dang bcas pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / gzhan yang
12a7(myang 'das): shing tsan dan dang / a ga ru sbams pa brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed bshams te/ bal glang de re re'i mdun na rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs kyang bshams
12b1(myang 'das): so| |gdugs nang gi chung ngu'ang kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig khebs so/ /ba dan nang gi thung ngu'ang ring khyad dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis so/ /rin po che'i rgyal mtshan nang gi
12b2(myang 'das): chung ba'ang mtho khyad dpag tshad brgya pa ste/ de lta bu'i mchod pa'i yo byad bshams nas sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags te phyin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal nas
12b3(myang 'das): lan brgya stong du bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis sangs rgyas dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la mchod pa'i yo byad
12b4(myang 'das): 'di dag 'bul na/ de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du mchod pa 'di dag bzhes shig ces gsol to/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa cang mi gsung nas
12b5(myang 'das): bzhes su ma gnang ngo / /li tsa bI'i bu rnams bsams pa bzhin du ma gyur nas shin tu mya ngan gyis non te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sa las shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags
12b6(myang 'das): nas steng gi nam mkha' la cang mi smra bar 'khod do/ /de'i tshe gzhan yang klung gang+gA lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi blon po chen po dang / khyim bdag dang / tshong dpon theg pa chen po la shin tu mos
12b7(myang 'das): pas slob pa gzhan la zhugs pa gang zhig yang dag pa'i chos la smod pa zhig yod na/ de dag gi mthus thul ba ni/ ji ltar rtswa dang shing la ser ba bab pa lta bu sha stag la 'di lta
13a1(myang 'das): ste| tshong dpon nyi ma'i 'od dang / tshong dpon 'jig rten skyong dang / tshong dpon chos skyong la sogs pas thog ma drangs te/ de dag gis so so nas
13a2(myang 'das): mchod pa'i yo byad bshams pa ni/ snga ma bas lnga 'gyur tsam bshams te/ shing sA la drung gnyis kyi bar gang na bar stong ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
13a3(myang 'das): la spyi bos phyag btsal nas lan brgya stong du bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis sangs rgyas dang / dge slong gi
13a4(myang 'das): dge 'dun rnams la mchod pa'i yo byad 'di dag 'bul na/ bzhes shig ces gsol to/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa cang mi gsung bas bzhes su ma gnang ngo / /tshong dpon
13a5(myang 'das): de dag bsams pa bzhin du ma gyur nas shin tu mya ngan gyis yid gdungs par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sa la shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags
13a6(myang 'das): nas/ steng gi nam mkha' la cang mi smra bar 'khod do/ /de'i tshe gzhan yang yul yangs pa can gyi rgyal po btsun mo dang sras su bcas pa/ gzhan yang dzam+bu gling na rgyal po ma skyes
13a7(myang 'das): dgra ma gtogs par rgyal phran de ma yin pa thams cad dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs dang / grong 'dab thams cad kyi mi thams cad dang bcas pa la 'di lta ste/ rgyal po zla
13b1(myang 'das): 'od dri med rgyal po la sogs pas thog mar drangs nas so so nas dmag rnam bzhi dang bcas te/ sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags so/ /rgyal po de dag re re'ang 'khor khri phrag brgyad
13b2(myang 'das): cu dang bcas so/ /dmag gi tshogs kyang bal glang dang rta pa ste/ bal glang de dag kyang mche ba drug dang ldan la/ rta rnams kyang mgyogs khyad rlung bzhin te/ mchod pa'i yo byad bshams
13b3(myang 'das): pa'ang snga ma bas drug 'gyur gyis lhag go/ rin po che'i gdugs nang gi chung ngu'ang chu zheng kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad brgyad khebs so/ /ba dan nang gi thung ngu'ang ring khyad dpag
13b4(myang 'das): tshad bcu drug snyed do/ /rin po che'i rgyal mtshan nang gi chung ngu'ang mtho khyad dpag tshad sum cu rtsa drug go/ rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i chos la gnas pas log pa'i
13b5(myang 'das): chos kun la shin tu smod pa/ theg pa chen po la bkur sti byed pa/ theg pa chen po la shin tu mos pa/ sems can thams cad la bu gcig dang 'dra bar byams pa/ zhal zas bshams
13b6(myang 'das): pa'i dri'ang dpag tshad bzhi'i bar du bro ba bshams nas/ snga dro'i dus kyi tshe mchod pa'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs thogs te/ shing sA la drung gnyis kyi bar de bzhin gshegs pa
13b7(myang 'das): gang na bzhugs pa der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis sangs rgyas dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams
14a1(myang 'das): la mchod pa 'di dag 'bul na/ de bzhin gshegs pas thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag gi mchod pa nang gi tha ma 'di bzhes shig ces gsol to/ /
14a2(myang 'das): de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen pas bzhes su ma gnang ngo / /rgyal po de dag kyang bsams pa bzhin du ma gyur pas shin tu mya ngan gyis yid gdungs par gyur te/ phyogs
14a3(myang 'das): gcig tu 'khod do/ /de'i tshe gzhan yang klung gang+gA bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi rgyal po'i btsun mo rnams tshogs te/ de la gcig ma gtogs pa ni ma skyes dgra'i btsun mo 'ba'
14a4(myang 'das): zhig go/ sems can gdul ba'i phyir bud med kyi lus su ston te/ rtag tu lus kyis nan tan du spyod cing stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos la
14a5(myang 'das): sems 'dris shing goms par byed pa de la sogs te/ btsun mo khams gsum bzang mo dang / btsun mo 'dod pa'i yon tan la sogs pas thog mar drangs so/ /thams
14a6(myang 'das): cad kyang dam pa'i chos la gnas shing tshul khrims yongs su bsrung ba/ spyod lam dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar byams pa sha stag go/
14a7(myang 'das): de dag kyang gcig la gcig 'di skad du/ bdag cag kyang myur bar sangs rgyas gang na bzhugs par 'deng ngo zhes smras so/ /rgyal po'i btsun mo rnams kyis mchod
14b1(myang 'das): pa'i yo byad bshams pa ni/ snga ma bas bdun 'gyur gyis lhag ste/ me tog dang / spos dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / dar gyi ba dan dang / gdugs dang / zhal zas
14b2(myang 'das): mchog rnams so/ /rin po che'i gdugs nang gi chung ngu'ang chu zheng kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad bcu drug khebs so/ /ba dan nang gi thung ngu'i tshad kyang dpag tshad sum cu rtsa drug
14b3(myang 'das): snyed do/ /rin po che'i rgyal mtshan nang gi dma' ba'i tshad kyang dpag tshad drug cu rtsa brgyad snyed do/ /zhal zas kyi dri bsung gis kyang dpag tshad brgyad kyi bar du bro ba/ mchod pa'i
14b4(myang 'das): yo byad de lta bu dag bshams nas de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal nas lan brgya stong du ma bskor te/
14b5(myang 'das): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis sangs rgyas dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la mchod pa'i yo byad bshams te 'bul
14b6(myang 'das): ba 'di/ de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du mchod pa nang gi tha ma 'di bzhes shig ces gsol to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen pas cang
14b7(myang 'das): mi gsung nas bzhes su ma gnang ngo / /de'i tshe rgyal po'i btsun mo rnams bsams pa bzhin du ma gyur nas shin tu mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te/ skra 'bal zhing brang la thal
15a1(myang 'das): mos rdebs te cho nges rdung ba ni/ ji ltar bu'i nang na sdug pa shi ba dang 'dra bar gyur nas phyogs gcig tu cang mi smra bar 'khod do/ /de'i tshe gzhan
15a2(myang 'das): yang klung gang+gA brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi lha'i bu mo rnams la 'di lta ste/ lha'i bu mo yangs pa'i mig ces bya bas thog mar drangs nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye/ grogs mo dag /
15a3(myang 'das): mthong ngam ltos shig /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang pos mchod pa'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs bshams nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la 'bul ba
15a4(myang 'das): mthong ngam/ bdag cag kyang mchod pa'i yo byad bshams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod nas/ de bzhin gshegs pas bzhes pa'i 'og tu mya ngan las mi 'da'
15a5(myang 'das): bar bzhugs su gsol bar bya'o/ /kye/ grogs mo dag /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du gshegs pa'ang shin tu dka'/ mchod pa nang gi tha ma bshams
15a6(myang 'das): te 'bul ba'ang shin tu dka'o/ /gal te bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das na 'jig rten stong par 'gyur ro zhes smras so/ /lha'i bu mo de rnams kyang theg pa chen po 'dod
15a7(myang 'das): pa/ theg pa chen po thos par mos pa/ thos nas kyang gzhan la rgya cher ston nus pa/ theg pa chen po la skom pas gdungs pa ltar gyur cing / bdag shin tu ngoms pa ltar
15b1(myang 'das): skom pas gdungs pa gzhan dag kyang ngoms par byed pa/ theg pa chen po la skyob pa/ slob pa gzhan la zhugs pa dag theg pa chen po la sun 'byin cing phrag dog byed pa yod na/
15b2(myang 'das): ji ltar rtswa la ser ba bab pa bzhin du shin tu thul ba/ tshul khrims yongs su bsrung ba/ spyod lam dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi yid dang sbyor ba la shin tu mkhas pa/
15b3(myang 'das): ma dul ba rnams 'dul ba/ ma grol ba rnams 'grol bar byed pa/ phyi ma ma 'ongs pa'i dus su chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par
15b4(myang 'das): 'tshob pa/ theg pa chen po la nan tan byed cing rgyan chen pos shin tu brgyan pa/ de lta bu'i yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la'ang bu gcig dang 'dra
15b5(myang 'das): bar byams pa sha stag ste/ de dag kyang snga dro'i dus nyi ma thog ma shar ba na so so nas rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lha'i shing bsung can bshams pa ni/ mi'i shing bsung can las khyad par
15b6(myang 'das): du gyur pa/ shing gi bsung des mi'i 'jig rten na mnam zhing dri mi zhim pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa/ shing rta dkar po la gdugs dkar po bres te rta dkar po bzhis drangs pa/
15b7(myang 'das): shing rta de re re'i steng yang gur dkar po phub pa la gur gyi mtha' ma'ang gser gyi dril bu dpyangs pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyi spos dang / me tog dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan
16a1(myang 'das): dang | ba dan dang / gdugs dang / zhal zas mchog dam pa dang / rol mo'i rnam pa sna tshogs bshams te/ seng ge'i gdan bting ngo / /seng ge'i
16a2(myang 'das): gdan gyi rkang pa bzhi'ang bai DUR+ya mthon mthing las byas pa/ de'i rgyab ni rin po che sna bdun gyi snam rten dang bcas pa/ mdun yang gser las byas pa'i sngas re re yod pa/
16a3(myang 'das): rin po che sna bdun gyi sgron ma'i sdong po la nor bu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgron ma snang ba/ sa gzhi thams cad lha'i me tog gis chal par bkod pa de lta bu dag lha'i bu
16a4(myang 'das): mo de dag gis bshams nas/ yid gdung zhing mchi ma zags te sdug bsngal chen po skyes kyang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir theg pa chen po don dam
16a5(myang 'das): pa stong pa nyid dang ldan par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs te gsungs pa mngon du bstan pa dang / chos rnam pa sna tshogs smra ba rgyun mi bcad pa'i phyir bcom
16a6(myang 'das): ldan 'das gang na bar lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal te/ lan brgya stong du bskor nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
16a7(myang 'das): to| |bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du mchod pa bshams pa nang gi tha ma 'di bzhes shig ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dus mkhyen pas
16b1(myang 'das): cang mi gsung nas bzhes su ma gnang ngo / /lha'i bu mo rnams bsams pa bzhin du ma gyur nas mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te/ cang mi smra bar phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de'i tshe
16b2(myang 'das): gzhan yang klung gang+gA dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi klu'i rgyal po phyogs bzhi nas lhags pa la 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / klu'i rgyal po nyer dga'
16b3(myang 'das): bo la sogs pas thog mar drangs nas/ klu'i rgyal po rnams kyang snga dro'i dus nyi ma thog ma shar ba na lha dang mi las lhag pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad bshams nas/ bcom ldan
16b4(myang 'das): 'das gang na bar lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal nas lan brgya stong du bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
16b5(myang 'das): 'das/ bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du mchod pa nang gi tha ma 'di bzhes shig ces gsol to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen pas cang mi gsung nas bzhes su
16b6(myang 'das): ma gnang ngo / /de nas klu'i rgyal po rnams kyang bsams pa bzhin du ma gyur pas mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de'i tshe gzhan yang klung gang+gA bcu'i
16b7(myang 'das): bye ma snyed kyi gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po ngal bsos po la sogs pas thog mar drangs nas gcig la gcig 'di skad du/ kye/ skyes bu dag /myur bar sangs rgyas gang na ba
17a1(myang 'das): der 'deng ngo zhes smras nas mchod pa'i yo byad klu bas lhag par bshams te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bar lhags nas sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi
17a2(myang 'das): bos phyag btsal te/ lan brgya stong du ma bskor nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du mchod pa bshams
17a3(myang 'das): pa nang gi tha ma 'di bzhes shig ces gsol to/ /de la bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas bzhes su ma gnang ngo / /gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnams bsams pa bzhin du ma gyur
17a4(myang 'das): pas mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de'i tshe gzhan yang klung gang+gA nyi shu'i bye ma snyed kyi nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po phas rgol ba bcom pa zhes bya
17a5(myang 'das): bas thog mar drangs so/ /gzhan yang klung gang+gA sam cu'i bye ma snyed kyi dri za'i rgyal po mthu bo ches thog mar drangs so/ /gzhan yang klung gang+gA bzhi bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi
17a6(myang 'das): mi 'am ci'i rgyal po shin tu mthong ba zhes bya bas thog mar drangs so/ /gzhan yang klung gang+gA lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi lto 'phye chen po'i rgyal po shin tu mthong ba chen po
17a7(myang 'das): zhes bya bas thog mar drangs so/ /gzhan yang klung gang+gA drug cu'i bye ma snyed kyi lha ma yin gyi rgyal po khab bi lis thog mar drangs so/ /gzhan yang klung gang+gA bdun cu'i bye
17b1(myang 'das): ma snyed kyi ta na pa'i rgyal po dri med 'bab chu dang / ba ti da ta la sogs pas thog mar drangs so/ /gzhan yang klung gang+gA'i brgyad cu bye ma snyed kyi srin po'i rgyal po 'jigs su rung ba zhes
17b2(myang 'das): bya bas thog mar drangs so/ /de dag kyang sdig pa mi dge ba'i sems yongs su spangs nas mi la mi za ba dang / dgra dang 'khon du gyur pa la byams shing snying rje'i sems skye ba dang / gzugs
17b3(myang 'das): mi sdug pa'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis thams cad bzang zhing sdug par gyur to/ /gzhan yang klung gang+gA'i dgu bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi nags tshal la dbang ba'i lha dri bsung la dga'
17b4(myang 'das): ba zhes bya bas thog mar drangs so/ /gzhan yang klung gang+gA stong gi bye ma snyed kyi rig 'dzin gyi rgyal po rdzu 'phrul chen po zhes bya bas thog mar drangs so/ /gzhan yang klung gang+gA 'bum gyi
17b5(myang 'das): bye ma snyed kyi mdangs za ba'i rgyal po shin tu mthong ba zhes bya bas thog mar drangs so/ /gzhan yang klung gang+gA khri phrag brgya'i bye ma snyed kyi lha'i bu mo 'dod chags can lam pa dang /
17b6(myang 'das): ur pa shi dang / ti lo t+ta ma dang / phyir sha tsi la sogs pas thog mar drangs so/ /gzhan yang klung gang+gA khri phrag stong gi bye ma snyed kyi sa la gnas pa'i yi dwags kyi rgyal po gzhog
17b7(myang 'das): dkar zhes bya bas thog mar drangs so/ /gzhan yang klung gang+gA 'bum phrag bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi lha'i sras po rnams dang / lha'i rgyal po la phyogs bzhi'i mgon pos thog mar drangs
18a1(myang 'das): so| |gzhan yang klung gang+gA'i 'bum phrag bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi klung gi lhas ni/ phyogs bzhi nas sa las skyes pa'i me tog dus dang dus ma yin pa rnams
18a2(myang 'das): sA la'i shing drung du chal par bkang ngo / /gzhan yang klung gang+gA 'bum phrag bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rlung dang char la dbang ba'i lha rnams ni/ 'di snyam du bdag cag gis de bzhin
18a3(myang 'das): gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das nas zhugs la bzhen pa na char rab tu phab ste dus su me zhi bar bya ba dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor las tsha bas gdungs pa rnams kyang shin
18a4(myang 'das): tu bsil bar bya'o snyam du sems so/ /gzhan yang klung gang+gA nyi shu'i bye ma snyed kyi spos kyi bal glang chen po bal glang gi rgyal po la hu dang / bal glang gi rgyal po gser can
18a5(myang 'das): dang | bal glang gi rgyal po mngar ba'i ro dang / bal glang gi rgyal po mthon mthing mig dang / bal glang gi rgyal po bsung can la sogs pas thog mar drangs te/ de dag thams
18a6(myang 'das): cad kyang theg pa chen po la bsti stang byed pa/ theg pa chen po la mos pa sha stag ste/ de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ring po mi thogs par mya ngan las 'da'
18a7(myang 'das): bar shes pas/ so so nas pad+mo bzang po tshad med dpag tu med pa phyung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang na bar lhags nas gdong gis phyag btsal te phyogs gcig
18b1(myang 'das): tu sdod do/ /gzhan yang klung gang+gA'i nyi shu'i bye ma snyed kyi ri dwags kyi rgyal po seng ge seng ge sgra zhes bya bas thog mar drangs te/ sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa byin nas so so
18b2(myang 'das): nas me tog dang 'bras bu thogs te/ sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags nas sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu sdod do/ /gzhan yang klung gang+gA nyi shu'i bye ma
18b3(myang 'das): snyed kyi bya'i rgyal po ngang pa dang / ngur pa dang / rma bya dang / gai na dar pa dang / ka lan+ta ka dang / gu yog dang / ne tso dang / ko shi la dang / ba hi ka dang / ka la ping+ka dang / 'tsho byed la
18b4(myang 'das): sogs pa bya'i rgyal po rnams kyang so so nas me tog dang / 'bras bu thogs te/ sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te phyogs gcig
18b5(myang 'das): tu sdod do/ /gzhan yang klung gang+gA nyi shu'i bye ma snyed kyi chu glang dang / ba dang / lug la sogs pa sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags nas/ grong khyer rtswa mchog gi 'obs dang / shang
18b6(myang 'das): shong thams cad kyang dri bsung dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ro bro bar ldan pa'i 'o mas kun tu gang bar byas nas phyogs gcig tu sdod do/ /gzhan yang klung gang+gA nyi shu'i bye ma snyed kyi
18b7(myang 'das): gling bzhi la gnas pa'i drang srong bzod pa can zhes bya ba la sogs pas thog mar drangs te/ so so nas me tog dang / spos dang / 'bras bu mngar ba la sogs pa thogs te sangs
19a1(myang 'das): rgyas gang na bar lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal te lan gsum bskor nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
19a2(myang 'das): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du mchod pa nang gi tha ma 'di zhes shig ces gsol to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen pas cang mi
19a3(myang 'das): gsung nas bzhes su ma gnang nas/ drang srong rnams bsams pa bzhin du ma gyur nas mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /dzam+bu'i gling gi bung ba'i rgyal
19a4(myang 'das): po sgra snyan zhes bya bas thog mar drangs nas dung pa thams cad kyang me tog rnam pa sna tshogs thogs te/ sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag
19a5(myang 'das): btsal te lan gcig bskor nas phyogs gcig tu sdod do/ /de'i tshe dzam+bu'i gling na gnas pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma thams cad 'dus te/ de la gnyis ma gtogs pa ni
19a6(myang 'das): 'od srung chen po dang / dga' bo'o/ /gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa klung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed dang / dzam+bu'i gling gi ril sogs pa ri rab ri'i rgyal pos
19a7(myang 'das): thog mar drangs te/ ri de dag thams cad kyang shin tu brgyan pa ni nags tshal rgyas pa dang / shing rnams kyi lo ma dang / yal ga'ang ran par nyi ma'i 'od chod pa dang / me
19b1(myang 'das): tog rnam pa sna tshogs rgyas pa dang / kho ra khor yug tu 'bab chu dang chu mig yongs su dag cing bsung dang ldan pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
19b2(myang 'das): nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / rig 'dzin dang / drang srong la sogs pas rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs byed pas yongs su bar gyur to/ /lha dang
19b3(myang 'das): drang srong de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na bar lhags te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ gzhan yang grangs med pa'i klung gang+gA'i bye
19b4(myang 'das): ma snyed kyi rgya mtsho bzhi'i lha dang / 'bab chu kun gyi lha gzi brjid chen po dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyang snga ma bas lhag par mchod pa'i yo byad bshams te/ lha rnams
19b5(myang 'das): kyi lus kyi 'od dang / rol mo'i cha byad dang / me mar gyis nyi zla'i 'od kyang mi snang bar byas nas/ me tog tsam+pa kas klung ha ri ba di logs su gtor te/ sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags
19b6(myang 'das): nas sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de'i tshe grong khyer rtswa mchog gi shing sA la'i tshal thams cad kyang skya bor gyur te/ steng gi nam mkha' la
19b7(myang 'das): rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang 'bur dang ri mor ldan pa/ rgyan gyis mdzes pa/ kho ra khor yug tu rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa/ gzhal med khang gi drung na chu mig
20a1(myang 'das): dang / rdzing bu dang / mtshe'u las me tog pad+mo skyes pa ni/ byang gi sgra mi snyan nam/ sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi skyed mos tshal shin tu dga' ba zhes bya ba
20a2(myang 'das): dang 'dra ba rang byung bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe na shing sA la'i tshal kun tu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan cing shin tu yid du 'ong bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin la
20a3(myang 'das): sogs pa thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i ltas yin par rig nas/ thams cad mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te mi dga' bar gyur to/ /
20a4(myang 'das): de'i tshe rgyal chen bzhi'i rgyal po dang / brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug dag gcig la gcig 'di skad du/ kye/ skyes bu dang / 'jig rten du bcas pa lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin
20a5(myang 'das): la sogs pas mchod pa bshams te de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed pa la ltos/ bdag cag kyang de bzhin du mchod pa bya'o/ /gal te bdag cag gis nang gi tha mar
20a6(myang 'das): mchod na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur du nges so zhes smras so/ /de nas rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa snga ma ngas shin tu lhag par
20a7(myang 'das): bshams pa la 'di lta ste/ me tog man+dA ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po dang / me tog ka tsi li ka dang / ka tsi li ka chen po dang / me tog many+dzu sha ka dang / many+dzu sha ka chen
20b1(myang 'das): po dang / me tog san+ta ni ka dang / san+ta ni ka chen po dang / me tog yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du 'ong ba chen po dang / me tog kun tu bzang po dang / kun tu bzang po chen po dang / me tog dus
20b2(myang 'das): can dang / dus can chen po dang / me tog bsung gi grong khyer dang / bsung gi grong khyer chen po dang / me tog rab tu dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba chen po dang / me tog 'dod ldan
20b3(myang 'das): dang | 'dod ldan chen po dang / me tog bsung myos dang / bsung myos chen po dang / me tog kun tu bsung dang / kun tu bsung chen po dang / me tog lha'i gser 'dab dang / me tog
20b4(myang 'das): klu zhes bya ba dang / shing pa ri tsi tra'i me tog dang / shing ko bi dA ra'i me tog dang / gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs kyi zhal zas ro bro ba dang ldan pa thogs te/ sangs rgyas gang na bar
20b5(myang 'das): lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal te/ lha rnams kyi 'od kyis nyi zla'i 'od kyang zil gyis non to/ /mchod pa'i yo byad de dag gis de bzhin gshegs
20b6(myang 'das): pa la mchod pa bya bar bshams nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen pas cang mi gsung bar bzhes gsum gnang ngo / /de'i tshe lha rnams kyang bsams pa bzhin du ma gyur pas
20b7(myang 'das): mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lha rnams kyis snga ma bas shin tu lhag pa'i mchod
21a1(myang 'das): pa'i yo byad bshams nas me tog thogs pa'ang snga ma dang 'dra se/ dri bsung gis shin tu ngad pa ni yid du 'ong ba ste/ gzhal med khang rgyal par
21a2(myang 'das): 'gyur ba zhes bya ba dang / gzhal med khang chung ngu'i rnam pa bshams te/ sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal te/ bcom
21a3(myang 'das): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag ni theg pa chen po la shin tu dad cing mos na de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i
21a4(myang 'das): slad du mchod pa 'di dag bzhes shig ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dus mkhyen pas cang mi gsung bar bzhes su ma gnang ngo // //'phags pa yongs su mya
21a5(myang 'das): ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po gnyis pa/ de nas brgya byin dang lha'i 'khor rnams bsams pa bzhin du ma gyur nas mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /
21a6(myang 'das): 'dod pa'i khams kyi gnam rim pa drug gi bar du mchod pa'i yo byad bshams pa ni/ rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs gcig pas kyang gcig bzang
21a7(myang 'das): ba'o| |rin po che'i gdugs nang gi chung ngu'ang gling bzhi khebs so/ /ba dan nang gi thung ngu'ang rgya mtsho bzhi 'khor ro/ /rgyal mtshan nang gi dma' ba'ang gzhan 'phrul dbang
21b1(myang 'das): byed gnam la reg ste/ rlung gis bskyod na sgra skad snyan pa 'byin pa dang / zhal zas phul du byung ba rnam pa sna tshogs bshams nas bcom ldan 'das gang na bar lhags te/ bcom
21b2(myang 'das): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du mchod pa nang gi tha ma 'di
21b3(myang 'das): bzhes shig ces gsol to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen pas cang mi gsung bar bzhes su ma gnang ngo / /de nas lha rnams kyang bsams pa bzhan du ma gyur pas mya ngan gyis
21b4(myang 'das): yid gdungs te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de la gcig ma gtogs pa ni srid pa'i rtse mo ste/ tshangs pa'i ris kyi lha rnams kyang 'dus par gyur to/ /de'i tshe tshangs pa'i rgyal po dang /
21b5(myang 'das): tshangs pa'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od kyis gling bzhi kun snang bar byas nas/ 'dod pa'i khams na lha dang / mi dang / nyi zla'i 'od kyang mi snang bar byas so/ /de dag kyang so so nas rin
21b6(myang 'das): po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs thogs pa ni/ ba dan nang gi thung ngu'ang tshangs pa'i gnas nas shing sA la'i tshal la thug pa thogs nas sangs rgyas gang na bar
21b7(myang 'das): lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad
22a1(myang 'das): du bdag cag gi mchod pa nang gi tha ma 'di bzhes shig ces gsol to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen pas cang mi gsung bar bzhes su ma
22a2(myang 'das): gnang ngo / /tshangs pa'i lha rnams bsams pa bzhin du ma gyur nas mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thags bzang
22a3(myang 'das): ris kyang 'khor dpag tu med pa dang bcas te lhags so/ /de rnams kyi lus kyi 'od kyang tshangs pa'i lha bas kyang lhag par gyur te/ rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan
22a4(myang 'das): dang | gdugs rnams thogs te/ gdugs nang gi chung ngu'ang stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa dang / phul du byung ba'i zhal zas mchog rnams thogs
22a5(myang 'das): nas sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
22a6(myang 'das): bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du mchod pa nang gi tha ma 'di bzhes shig ces gsol to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen pas cang mi gsung bar bzhes su
22a7(myang 'das): ma gnang nas lha ma yin rnams bsams pa bzhin du ma gyur bas mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de'i tshe 'dod pa'i khams kyi bdud kyi
22b1(myang 'das): rgyal po bdud sdig to can yang 'khor lha'i bu mo grangs med dpag tu med pa dang bcas te/ sems can dmyal ba'i sgo phye nas yongs su bsil zhing dga' ba'i chu phab ste/ de dag la
22b2(myang 'das): 'di skad ces bsgo'o/ /khyed la sogs pa gzhan ci'ang mi nus kyi/ sems rtse gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dran par gyis la mchod pa
22b3(myang 'das): byed pa la rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig dang / khyed yun ring por rab tu bde bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bdud sdig can sems can dmyal ba'i mtshon cha dang / sdug bsngal du 'gyur
22b4(myang 'das): ba'i me rab tu 'bar ba'ang bsil ba'i char gyis zhi bar byas nas sangs rgyas kyi byin rlabs kyis bdud kyi 'khor rnams kyang 'di snyam du sems bskyed par gyur to/ /thams cad
22b5(myang 'das): kyis ral gri dang / mda' gzhu dang / go cha dang / mtshon shak+ti dang / lcags kyu dang / lcags tho dang / dgra sta dang / 'khor lo dang / zhags pa la sogs te/ mtshon cha thams
22b6(myang 'das): cad spangs nas/ mchod pa'i yo byad lha dang mi las khyad par du gyur pa bshams so/ /gdugs nang gi chung ngu'ang stong 'bring po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa thogs nas sangs
22b7(myang 'das): rgyas gang na bar lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang theg
23a1(myang 'das): pa chen po la rab tu dad cing mos te/ theg pa chen po bsrung bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig khe dang
23a2(myang 'das): grags pa'i phyir ram/ gzhan skrag par bya ba'i phyir ram/ gzhan la brdzun bya ba'i phyir ram/ nor dang zang zing gi phyir ram/ gzhan gyi yid dang sbyor ba tsam gyi phyir theg
23a3(myang 'das): pa chen po 'di 'dzin par byed na/ bden yang rung / rdzun yang rung / bdag cag gis de'i tshe gang zag de'i 'jigs pa bsal ba'i phyir gsang sngags 'di 'bul lo/ /ts+yog kye/
23a4(myang 'das): ta ta la ts+yog kye/ lo ha le/ ma hA lo ha le/ a la tsa la ta la swAhA/ sngags 'di ni sems stor ba rnams dang / 'jigs skrag pa dang / chos smra ba dang / yang dag pa'i chos
23a5(myang 'das): kyi bar du mi gcod pa dang / mu stegs can 'dul ba dang / bdag gi lus bsrung ba dang / yang dag pa'i chos bsrung ba dang / theg pa chen po bsrung ba'i slad du gsang sngags
23a6(myang 'das): 'di 'bul lo/ /gang gis gsang sngags 'di yid la bgyid na bal glang rmis pa'i 'jigs pa dang bral bar 'gyur/ gal te 'brog dgon pa 'am/ yul sa stong pa bag tsha
23a7(myang 'das): ba'i gnas su mchis na'ang 'jigs par mi 'gyur/ chu dang / me dang / seng+ge dang / stag dang / spyang ki dang / dgras 'jigs pa dang / rgyal po'i chad pas 'jigs pa
23b1(myang 'das): las kyang thar bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang gis gsang sngags 'di yid la bgyid na 'jigs pa de dag la sogs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan
23b2(myang 'das): 'das/ gsang sngags 'di 'dzin pa la bdag cag gis bskyab cing sba ba ni ji ltar rus sbal yan lag drug sbed pa bzhin no/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag ni g.yo dang sgyus
23b3(myang 'das): 'di skad du smra ba ma lags kyi/ gang gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin pa la bdag cag gis mthu stobs btang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du mchod pa
23b4(myang 'das): nang gi tha ma 'di bzhes su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bdud sdig to can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /khyed kyis mchod pa zhal zas phul ba rnams ni mi bzhes
23b5(myang 'das): so| |'gro ba thams cad dang / 'khor rnam bzhi la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir gsang sngags 'di bzhes so zhes bka' stsal nas/ cang mi gsung bar gzhan ni bzhes su ma gnang
23b6(myang 'das): ngo| |de ltar lan gsum gyi bar du gsol kyang bzhes su ma gnang nas/ bdud sdig to can bsams pa bzhin du ma gyur pas mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te/ phyogs gcig tu
23b7(myang 'das): 'khod do/ /de'i tshe lha dbang sgyur chen po'ang 'khor lha grangs med dpag tu med pa dang bcas te/ mchod pa'i yo byad bshams pa'ang tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / 'jig
24a1(myang 'das): rten gyi mgon po bzhi dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin sde brgyad dang / mi ma yin la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad rnams zil gyis gnon
24a2(myang 'das): pa ni| ji ltar sol ba'i drung na shel bzhag ba dang 'dra ste/ thams cad mi snang bar gyur to/ /rin po che'i gdugs nang gi chung ngu'ang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
24a3(myang 'das): rten gyi khams yongs su khebs pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad la sogs pa thogs te/ sangs rgyas gang na par lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal
24a4(myang 'das): nas lan grangs med pa bskor nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis mchod pa'i yo byad nang gi tha ma 'di 'bul ba
24a5(myang 'das): ni| ji ltar na bdag cag la sbrang bus mchod pa 'bul ba'am/ chu snyim pa gang rgya mtsho chen por blugs pa'am/ me mar chung ngu gcig gi 'od kyis nyi ma brgya stong
24a6(myang 'das): la btang ba'am/ dbyar me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i dus su me tog gcig thogs te me tog mang po'i khrod du bzhag pa'am/ yungs dkar 'brum bu gcig tsam ri rab
24a7(myang 'das): ri'i rgyal po la bstangs na rgya mtsho dang / nyi ma dang / me tog mang po dang / ri rab la mi sman pa dang 'dra bar bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi mchod pa'ang de dang 'dra'o/ /
24b1(myang 'das): gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams spos dang / me tog dang / rol mo dang / ba dan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan gyis yongs su bkang ste mchod kyang smos
24b2(myang 'das): pa'i rin du mi 'tshal to/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'gro ba mang po'i slad du sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / byol song gi skye gnas su sdug bsngal
24b3(myang 'das): mang po len to/ /de bas na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du mchod pa 'di dag bzhes shig ces gsol to/ /de'i tshe 'di nas shar phyogs su 'jig
24b4(myang 'das): rten gyi khams klung gang+gA'i bye ma grangs med dpag tu med pa 'das pa'i pha rol sangs rgyas kyi zhing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan zhes bya ba na/ sangs rgyas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa
24b5(myang 'das): zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa/ mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten rig pa/ bla na med pa/ skyes
24b6(myang 'das): bu 'dul zhing kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te/ de'i tshe na sangs rgyas des nye gnas chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
24b7(myang 'das): rigs kyi bu khyod song la/ 'di nas nub phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba na sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
25a1(myang 'das): dag par rdzogs pa/ mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten rig pa/ bla na med pa/ skyes bu 'dul zhing kha lo sgyur
25a2(myang 'das): ba| lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ring po mi thogs par yongs su mya ngan las 'dar nye'o/ /rigs kyi bu khyod 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i
25a3(myang 'das): zhal zas bsung can dri shin tu zhim pa/ yid du 'ong zhing bde bar 'gyur ba 'di thogs te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la phul cig/ bcom ldan 'das de gsol
25a4(myang 'das): nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod de la phyag 'tshal zhing the tshom du gyur pa'ang zhu ba'i dus la bab bo/ /de nas byang chub sems
25a5(myang 'das): dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba 'dug pa las langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal te lan gsum bskor nas/ byang
25a6(myang 'das): chub sems dpa' grangs med dpag tu med pa dang thabs gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der dong ngo / /de'i tshe na stong
25a7(myang 'das): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos nas 'khor gyi nang na tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / phyogs bzhi'i mgon po dang / bdud sdig to
25b1(myang 'das): can dang / dbang sgyur chen po la sogs pa de dag gis sa g.yos pa mthong nas lus kyi bung zhes byed de/ lce'ang skams pa tsam du dngangs skrag par gyur te/ so sor 'gro bar chas
25b2(myang 'das): nas lus kyi 'od dang gzi brjid kyang mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dug pa las langs te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces smras
25b3(myang 'das): so| |rigs kyi bu dag / khyed 'jigs par ma byed cig /khyed ma 'jigs shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di nas shar phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams klung gang+gA'i bye ma grangs med
25b4(myang 'das): dpag tu med pa 'das pa'i pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yid du 'ong pa'i sgra snyan zhes bya ba na sangs rgyas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
25b5(myang 'das): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa bzhugs te/ de na byang chub sems dpa' lus dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba 'khor byang chub sems
25b6(myang 'das): dpa' grangs med pa dang bcas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod du 'ong bas byang chub sems dpa' de'i gzi brjid dang byin gyis khyed kyi lus kyi
25b7(myang 'das): 'od kyang mi snang bar gyur to/ /de bas na khyed ma 'jigs par shin tu dga' ba skyed cig/ de'i tshe na 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad kyis rgyang ma nas sangs rgyas
26a1(myang 'das): de dang / 'khor mang po rnams mthong ba ni/ ji ltar me long gsal ba'i nang na bdag gi gzugs brnyan mthong ba bzhin no/ /de nas yang 'jam dpal
26a2(myang 'das): gyis 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyed kyis sangs rgyas de mthong ba ni/ ji ltar sangs rgyas 'di mthong ba dang 'dra bar sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs
26a3(myang 'das): kyis gzhan yang sangs rgyas phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa dpag tu med pa snyed kyang mthong bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang pos gcig la gcig
26a4(myang 'das): 'di skad du/ kyi hud/ kyi hud/ 'jig rten stongs so/ /'jig rten stongs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ring por mi thogs par yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes smras so/ /
26a5(myang 'das): de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lus dpag tu med pa 'khor dang bcas pa mthong ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
26a6(myang 'das): dpa' de'i ba spu'i khung bu re re nas me tog pad+mo chen po re re byung la/ pad+mo de re re'i steng yang grong khyer bdun khri brgyad stong snyed yod do/ /grong khyer de'ang chu zheng gab
26a7(myang 'das): par grong khyer yangs pa can dang mnyam ste/ ra ba dang / 'o bas kyang rin po che sna bdun gyis spras la/ rin po che'i shing ta la rim pa bdun dngar ba/ de na gnas
26b1(myang 'das): pa'i mi thams cad kyang rab tu bde zhing skyid pa/ grong khyer de'i cog par yang dzam+bu chu klung gi gser las byas pa/ cog par de re re'i bar na rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rnam pa sna tshogs
26b2(myang 'das): yod de/ me tog dang 'bras bu shin tu rgyas pa/ rlung mi drag pas bskyod pa na sgra skad shin tu snyan pa ni/ ji ltar lha'i rol mo zer ba lta bu de na gnas pa'i mi dag gis thos na phul du byung
26b3(myang 'das): ba'i rab tu bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro/ /'obs kyi nang na'ang yongs su dag pa'i chu bsung can baiDUR+ya dang 'dra bas yongs su gang ngo / /chu de dag la rin po che sna bdun gyi gru yod do/ /gru de'i steng
26b4(myang 'das): na mi dag rtse zhing khrus byed de/ gcig la gcig dga' zhing rab tu bde ba myong ngo / /gzhan yang kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi pad+mo skye ba ni ut+pa la dang / ku mu dang / pad+ma dang / puN+Da ri ka la
26b5(myang 'das): sogs pa shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam skye'o/ /'obs kyi g.yas g.yon na skyed mos tshal mang du yod de/ skyed mos tshal de re re'i nang du'ang chu mig dang bcas pa'i rdzing bu lnga lnga yod do/ /
26b6(myang 'das): rdzing bu de dag gi nang na yang me tog ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dang / puN+Da ri ka che khyad shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam skyes te dri bsung shin tu mngar ba/ rab tu yid du 'ong ba/ chu shin
26b7(myang 'das): tu gsal zhing 'jam pa/ ngang pa dang / ngur pa la sogs pa rkyal zhing rtse ba/ skyod mes tshal de na gzhan yang rin po che'i gzhal med khang yod de/ gzhal med khang de re re'i yang chu
27a1(myang 'das): zheng gab par dpag tshad bzhi yod do/ /gzhal med khang de'i ra ba'ang rin po che sna bzhi las byas so/ /'di ltas ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+ya dang /
27a2(myang 'das): shel las byas te/ kha bad kyang gser las byas/ sa gzhi ni mu sa la gar+b+ha las blangs te gser gyi bye ma bdal ba/ gzhal med khang de'i drung na rin po che sna bdun gyi 'bab chu dang /
27a3(myang 'das): chu mig dang / rdzing bu yod de/ rdzing bu de re re la'ang gser gyi them skas bco brgyad bco brgyad yod do/ /chu zheng yang dzam+bu chu klung gi gser las byas te/ sum cu rtsa gsum gnam
27a4(myang 'das): gyi skyed mos tshal rab tu bde ba can dang 'dra'o/ /grong khyer de re re'i nang na'ang rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed yod do/ /rgyal po de re re la'ang btsun mo dang pho brang gi slas grangs med pa
27a5(myang 'das): yod do/ /de dag dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga'o/ /de na gnas pa'i mi thams cad kyang so so'i gnas na rtse zhing dga'o/ /de na gnas pa'i sems can rnams ni rna bar gzhan mi grag
27a6(myang 'das): gi |bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i sgra 'ba' zhig grag go / me tog de re re'i nang na'ang seng+ge'i khri re re yod de/ khri de'i rkang ba bzhi'ang bai DUR+ya mthon mthing la byas pa/ khams
27a7(myang 'das): gsum las 'das pa'i na bza' shin tu 'jam pa dkar po bting ngo / /khri de re re'i steng na rgyal po re re 'dug ste/ theg pa chen po'i chos kyis sems can rnams 'dul te/ de
27b1(myang 'das): la'ang sems can la la ni theg pa chen po'i mdo sde glegs bam du 'dri ba dang / 'chang ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / ji ltar smras pa bzhin du nan tan du byed pa dang /
27b2(myang 'das): shin tu rgyas pa'i bar du byed do/ /de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' lus dpag tu med pa des bdag gi lus la sems can tshad med pa snyed bkod pa de'ang 'jig rten gyi bde ba btang nas
27b3(myang 'das): thams cad 'di skad du/ kyi hud/ kyi hud/ 'jig rten stongs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni ring po ma lon par yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes smra'o/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'
27b4(myang 'das): lus dpag tu med pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor tshad med pa snyed kyis bskor te/ de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bstan nas mchod pa'i yo byad tshad med pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
27b5(myang 'das): zhal zas bsung can thogs te/ gang zhig la zhal zas de'i bsung gis reg na kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' de'i byin gyi rlabs
27b6(myang 'das): kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rdzu 'phrul de dag mthong bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' lus dpag tu med pa ni lus chen po dpag tu med de/ de nam mkha' dang mnyam
27b7(myang 'das): pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma gtogs par gzhan gang gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus kyi mtha' shes par nus pa med do/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' lus
28a1(myang 'das): dpag tu med pa 'khor dang bcas pas mchod pa'i yo byad snga ma bas lhag par bshams nas/ sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags nas bcom ldan
28a2(myang 'das): 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal te thal mo sbyar/ bsti stang dang bcas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag la thugs brtse
28a3(myang 'das): ba'i slad du mchod pa 'di dag bzhes shig ces gsol to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen pas cang mi gsung bar bzhes su ma gnang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' lus
28a4(myang 'das): dpag tu med pa 'khor dang bcas pa phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun nas byang chub sems dpa' lus dpag tu
28a5(myang 'das): med pa grangs med pa snyed kyang mchod pa'i yo byad snga ma bas lhag par bshams nas/ sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags pa nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa'i bar du rgyas par rig
28a6(myang 'das): par bya'o/ /de'i tshe shing sA la'i drung gnyis kyi bar bsod nams kyis gzhi bkra shis kyi gnas der kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
28a7(myang 'das): gyis sa stong cung zad kyang med par yongs su gang ngo / /de'i tshe phyogs bzhi nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas te 'dug pa'i gnas ni smyung gi rtse mo 'am/
28b1(myang 'das): khab kyi rtse mo tsam mam/ rdul phra mo tsam mo/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra rab snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang 'dus par gyur/
28b2(myang 'das): dzam+bu'i gling na gnas pa'i 'khor thams cad kyang 'dus par gyur te/ de la gnyis ma gtogs pa ni/ 'od srung chen po dang / dga' bo'o/ /rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
28b3(myang 'das): sbrul gdug pa bltas pa tsam gyis 'chi bar byed pa dang / sbur ba dang / za gdug dang / sdig pa'i bar du sdig pa can gyi las spyod pa rnam pa bcu drug po ma gtogs par gzhan thams
28b4(myang 'das): cad 'dus par gyur to/ /srin po da na pa dang / lha ma yin la sogs pa thams cad kyis sdig pa'i bsam pa btang nas gcig la gcig byams shing sdug pa'i sems bskyed pa ni
28b5(myang 'das): pha'am/ ma'am/ phu nu lta bur gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems bskyed de/
28b6(myang 'das): gcig ma gtogs pa ni/ log sred can no/ /de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sa gzhi thams cad kyang 'jam par
28b7(myang 'das): gyur te/ ngam grog dang / bye ma dang / gseg ma dang / rdo ba dang / shing tsher ma can dang / rtswa gdug pa'ang med par gyur te/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi shin tu brgyan
29a1(myang 'das): pa ni| nub phyogs kyi sngas rgyas tshe dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can dang 'dra bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po
29a2(myang 'das): thams cad kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra mo snyed shin tu snang ba ni/ ji ltar me long gsal ba'i nang na bdag gi gzugs brnyan snang ba bzhin no/ /de nas de bzhin
29a3(myang 'das): gshegs pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'od rnam pa lnga byung ste/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po snang bar byas nas de dag gi lus kyi 'od zer mi mngon par zil gyis mnan te bya ba byas
29a4(myang 'das): nas phyir zhal gyi sgor zhugs so/ /de'i tshe lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin la sogs pa 'khor rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer phyir yang zhal gyi sgor zhugs pa mthong nas
29a5(myang 'das): thams cad 'jigs skrag ste/ lus kyi ba spu kun kyang langs nas/ gcig la gcig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas 'od zer bkye nas slar zhugs pa 'di ni rgyu med pa'am/
29a6(myang 'das): rkyen med pa ma yin te/ phyogs bcur mdzad pa kun mdzad nas tha ma yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i ltas yin du nges so/ /kyi hud/ kyi hud/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshad med
29a7(myang 'das): pa bzhi'i thugs btang nas lha dang mi rnams kyi mchod pa'ang bzhes su ma gnang ngo / /deng slan chad ni ye shes kyi nyi ma'ang nub par gyur/ bla na med pa'i chos kyi gru'ang bying bar
29b1(myang 'das): gyur to/ /kyi hud re sdug /'jig rten sdug bsngal chen pos gdungs par gyur to zhes smras nas/ brang la khu tshur gyis rdeg cing cho nge 'don pas lus kyis mi bzod pa tsam du shin tu 'dar
29b2(myang 'das): te| ba spu'i khung bu kun nas khrag kyang zag par gyur to/ /de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de na grong khyer rtswa mchog gi shing mkhan gyi bu dge bsnyen tsun+da zhes bya ba ris mthun pa'i 'khor
29b3(myang 'das): lnga bcu dang lhan cig tu 'dus so/ /des 'jig rten du bcas pa dag dge ba'i 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir sngon gyi tshul btang nas 'dug pa las langs te/ bla gos phyogs gcig tu
29b4(myang 'das): byas| pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar/ mchi ma blags te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal nas bcom
29b5(myang 'das): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas bdag cag gis mchod pa tha ma 'di bzhes su gso/ de'ang sems can dpag tu ma
29b6(myang 'das): mchis pa dag bsgral pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag ni dang slan chad mgon ma mchis/ skyabs ma mchis/ dpung gnyen ma mchis/ rten ma mchis/ gnas ma
29b7(myang 'das): mchis te/ shin tu dbul phongs pas de bzhin gshegs pa la slad ma ma mchis pa'i dus kyi tshogs tsam zhig gsol lo/ /bcom ldan 'das/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag
30a1(myang 'das): cag gi mchod pa tha ma 'di bzhes nas/ gdod yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/ dper na/ rgyal rigs sam/
30a2(myang 'das): bram ze'am/ gdol pa'ang rung / dbul phongs pas yul gzhan du mchis te/ zhing gi las la zhugs nas rmon pa dul ba dang / zhing yang gshin la sa gzhi'ang mnyam pa dang /
30a3(myang 'das): gseg ma dang / zhing gi ngo yur ma mchis na dgung char 'ba' zhig la re'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rmon pa dul ba zhes bgyi ba ni/ lus dang ngag gi las bdun po'i dpe'o/ /zhing
30a4(myang 'das): gshin la sa gzhi mnyam pa zhes bgyi ba ni/ shes rab kyi dpe'o/ /gseg ma dang / zhing gi ngo yur ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba ni/ nyon mongs pa'i dpe'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag
30a5(myang 'das): la'ang rmon pa dul ba dang / zhing gshin pa'ang mchis la/ zhing gi ngo yur ma bsal na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdud rtsi'i chos kyi char 'ba' zhig la re'o/ /rigs dbul po
30a6(myang 'das): bzhi ni bdag lags te/ bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i chos kyi rin po ches dbul te phongs na thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag cag gi dbul phongs pa'i sdug bsngal bsal
30a7(myang 'das): zhing sdug bsngal gyis yongs su gdungs pa'i sems can tshad ma mchis pa bsgral du gsol/ bdag cag gi mchod pa 'di shin tu chung mod kyi/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs
30b1(myang 'das): pa'i 'khor mang po kun gyi bsod snyoms su 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag la mgon ma mchis/ skyabs ma mchis/ dpung gnyen ma mchis na sgra gcan 'jig lta bur thugs brtse
30b2(myang 'das): bar dgongs su gso/ de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur bas tsun+da la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /legs so/ /legs
30b3(myang 'das): so| |ngas khyod kyi dbul phongs pa med pa dang / bla na med pa'i chos kyi char khyod kyi lus la dbab cing chos kyi myu gu skye bar bya'o/ /khyod ni da ltar tshe dang / mdog dang / stobs dang / bde ba
30b4(myang 'das): dang / thogs pa med pa'i so sor yang dag par shes pa thob par 'dod de/ ngas khyod la tshe dang / mdog dang / stobs dang / bde ba dang / thogs pa med pa'i so sor yang dag par shes
30b5(myang 'das): pa rtag tu sbyin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tsun+da/ zas kyi sbyin pa byin pas khyad par med pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis thob par 'gyur ro/ /gnyis gang zhe na/ bzhes nas bla na med pa yang
30b6(myang 'das): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa dang / bzhes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'o/ /ngas kyang khyod kyi mchod pa nang gi tha ma 'di bzhes pas khyod kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
30b7(myang 'das): phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/ /de nas tsun+das bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ltar na sbyin pa byin pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis
31a1(myang 'das): khyad par ma mchis so zhes bgyi ba de ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sngar sbyin pa bzhes pa ni nyon mongs pa'ang mang bas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye
31a2(myang 'das): shes kyang yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur/ sems can gyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par bgyid pa'ang ma lags so/ /sbyin pa byin ba slad kyis bzhes pa ni nyon mongs
31a3(myang 'das): pa'ang bas par gyur la/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang yongs su rdzogs shing sems can gyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags so/ /sbyin pa
31a4(myang 'das): sngar blangs pa ni sems can no/ /sbyin pa phyis ba zhes pa ni lha'i lha'o/ /sbyin pa sngar blangs pa ni zas dang 'dres pa'i lus/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i lus/ thab can gyi lus/ mi
31a5(myang 'das): rtag pa'i lus so/ /sbyin pa phyis bzhes pa ni nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i sku/ rdo rje lta bu'i sku/ chos kyi sku/ rtag pa'i sku/ mtha' yas pa'i sku lags na/ ci'i slad du sbyin pa
31a6(myang 'das): rnam pa gnyis kyi 'bras bu khyad par ma mchis zhes gsungs/ sngar sbyin pa blangs pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
31a7(myang 'das): phyin pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs par ma 'gyur te/ sha'i mig 'ba' zhig thob kyi sangs rgyas kyi sbyin mi thob pa nas shes rab kyi spyan gyi bar du thob pa ma lags so/ /sbyin pa
31b1(myang 'das): phyis bzhes pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs la/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan dang ldan pa nas shes rab kyi spyan gyi
31b2(myang 'das): bar du ldan pa lags na/ ci'i slad du sbyin pa rnam pa gnyis kyi 'bras bu khyad par ma mchis zhes gsungs/ bcom ldan 'das/ sbyin pa sngar blangs pa ni blangs ma thag tu 'tshal nas
31b3(myang 'das): de ma thag tu zhu bas tshe dang / mdog dang / stobs dang / bde ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa lags so/ /sbyin pa phyis bzhes pa ni gsol ba dang zhu ba'ang ma mchis la/
31b4(myang 'das): 'bras bu rnam pa lnga po'ang ma mchis na/ ci'i slad du sbyin pa rnam pa gnyis kyi 'bras bu khyad par ma mchis zhes gsungs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de
31b5(myang 'das): bzhin gshegs pa ni bskal ba tshad med mtha' yas grangs med pa'i bar du zas sam nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sku ma yin/ nang gi tha ma'i sku ma yin te/ rtag pa'i sku/ chos kyi
31b6(myang 'das): sku| rdo rje'i sku'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ma mthong ba ni nyon mongs pa'i lus/ zas dang bcas pa'i lus/ nang gi tha ma'i lus so/ /byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe
31b7(myang 'das): bsod snyoms bzhes nas rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bsod snyoms zhu ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin mthong nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
32a1(myang 'das): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de bas na sbyin pa rnam pa gnyis kyi 'bras bu khyad par med do zhes ngas gsungs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' thog
32a2(myang 'das): ma'ang bdud bzhi bcom la/ nga mya ngan las 'da' kar yang bdud rnam bzhi bcom pas/ de bas na sbyin pa rnam pa gnyis kyi 'bras bu khyad par med do zhes ngas gsungs so/ /byang chub
32a3(myang 'das): sems dpa' de'i tshe na mdo sde bcu gnyis rgyas par ma gsungs mod kyi/ thams cad sngar thugs su chud la da mya ngan las 'da' kar sems can rnams la rgyas par phye zhing bstan
32a4(myang 'das): pas de bas na sbyin pa rnam pa gnyis la khyad par med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni bskal pa tshad med grangs med pa'i bar du bsod snyoms mi gsol mod kyi/
32a5(myang 'das): nyan thos rnams la 'di skad ces gsungs te/ sngon de bzhin gshegs pas gnag rdzi mo nan+ta dang / nan+ta pa la gnyis kyis 'o ma'i 'jam phul ba bzhes nas/ gdod bla na med pa
32a6(myang 'das): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /nga ni yang dag par bshos mi gsol te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po 'di dag gi phyir khyod kyi
32a7(myang 'das): mchod pa tha ma 'di bzhes mod kyi/ yang dag par na gsol ba med do/ /de'i tshe na 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis tsun+da'i mchod pa bzhes pa mthong nas
