32b1(myang 'das): thams cad dga' mgu rangs te skad mthun pas tsun+da la legs so/ /shin tu legs so zhes smras te/ khyod kyi ming btags pa thob tu bab bo/ /tsun+da zhes bya ba ni don dam pa la mkhas pa
32b2(myang 'das): ste| khyod kyis kyang deng 'dir don chen po brtsams pas de bas na don las ming tsun+da zhes btags te/ khyod kyis ni tshe 'di nyid la grags pa dang / phan pa'i don chen po thob cing smon
32b3(myang 'das): pa'ang yongs su rdzogs par gyur te/ ngo mtshar che'o/ /tsun+da/ mi'i nang du skyes kyang bla na med pa'i bde ba shin tu rnyed dka' ba thob bo/ /legs so/ /tsun+da/ me tog u dum wA ra ltar 'jig
32b4(myang 'das): rten na shin tu dkon pa ste/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten du gshegs pa'ang shin tu rnyed dka' la/ sangs rgyas dang phrad nas dad pa bskyed pa'ang shin tu dka'/ chos thos pa'ang shin tu
32b5(myang 'das): dka'/ sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' kar mchod pa bshams te 'bul ba'ang shin tu dka'o/ /tsun+da la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tsun+da la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
32b6(myang 'das): phyin pa yongs su rdzogs te/ ston gyi tshes bco lnga'i zla ba ltar rgyas shing yongs su dag la/ sprin nam na bun gyis ma chod na thams cad kyis blta pa dang 'dra bar khyod kyang de dang 'dra bar
32b7(myang 'das): bdag cag la sogs pas shin tu blta bar gyur to/ /khyod kyi mchod pa nang gi tha ma bzhes pas khyod kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur te/ tsand khyod la phyag
33a1(myang 'das): 'tshal lo/ /de bas na khyod ni zla ba yongs su rgyas pa dang 'dra ste/ sems can gang yang mi lta ba med do/ /tsun+da khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi'i lus thob
33a2(myang 'das): nas kyang sems ni sangs rgyas kyi thugs dang 'dra bas tsun+da khyod ni sangs rgyas kyi sras yang dag pa ste/ sgra gcan 'dzin dang tha mi dad do/ /de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de rnams
33a3(myang 'das): kyis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ mi yi nang na khyod skyes pa/ /drug po lha las shin tu 'phags/ /bdag cag 'khor rnams thams cad kyis/ /khyod la phyag 'tshal gsol ba
33a4(myang 'das): 'debs/ /mi yi skyes bu khyu mchog ni/ /yongs su mya ngan 'da' zhes gsungs/ /bdag cag rnams la snying brtse'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas bzhugs par gsol ba thob/ /yun du
33a5(myang 'das): 'jig rten 'dir bzhugs shing / /tshad med 'khor la phan pa'i phyir/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis bsngags pa yi/ /bla med chos mchog bshad du gsol/ /khyod kyis gsol ba
33a6(myang 'das): ma btab na/ /bdag cag rnams ni mi 'tsho'o/ /de bas khyod kyis gsol ba thob/ /kha lo sgyur ba'i ston pa la de'i tshe tsun+da shin tu dga' mgu rangs pa ni/ dper na/ mi zhig
33a7(myang 'das): pha ma shi ba las phyir sos pa tsam du tsun+da'ang shin tu dga' bar gyur nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal te tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
33b1(myang 'das): legs so bde ba'i don du gyur/ /mi yi lus kyang legs par thob/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug bsal/ /ngan song gsum yang yongs su spangs/ /legs so bde ba'i don gyur te/ /
33b2(myang 'das): rin chen gser gyi ri mthong nas/ /ston pa kha lo sgyur dang mjal/ /byol song khams su skye mi dogs/ /sangs rgyas u dum wA ra ltar/ /phrad pa'i dus kyang shin tu dka'/ /phrad nas dge
33b3(myang 'das): ba'i rtsa ba'ang bskyed/ /yi dwags sdug bsngal yongs su bcom/ /gzhan yang yongs su bcom pa ni/ /lha ma yin gyi ris rnams te/ /khab rtses yungs kar bzed pa bas/ /sangs rgyas 'byung
33b4(myang 'das): ba de bas dka'/ /bdag ni sbyin pa yongs rdzogs te/ /lha dang mi yi rgyud las thar/ /'jig rten chos kyis ma gos pa/ /pad+mo chus mi chags bzhin te/ /srid pa'i bar du legs par
33b5(myang 'das): spangs/ /'khor ba'i rgyun las yongs su grol/ /mi yi lus thob shin tu dka'/ /sangs rgyas 'byung dang phrad par dka'/ /ji ltar rgya mtsho chen po'i nang / /rus sbal long ba 'byung ba de/ /
33b6(myang 'das): shing gi bu gar mgo chud bzhin/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba de bas dka'/ /bdag gis mchod pa gsol ba 'di/ /bla med 'bras bu thob par smon/ /kun nas nyon mongs thams cad ni/ /snying
33b7(myang 'das): po med pas thams cad bcom/ /bdag nyid de ltar 'di nyid na/ /lha dang mi yi lus mi re/ /ci ste thob par gyur na yang / /de la dga' ba mos pa med/ /bcom ldan bdag gi mchod
34a1(myang 'das): bzhes pas/ /shin tu dga' ba dpag ma mchis/ /e raN+Da yi me tog las/ /tsan+dan bzang po'i dri 'byung bzhin/ /bdag ni e ran 'dra ba ste/ /bcom
34a2(myang 'das): ldan bdag gi mchod bzhes pas/ /tsan+dan bzang po'i bsung mngar bzhin/ /de bas bdag ni shin tu dga'/ /bdag ni 'bras bu mngon du thob/ /bla med mchog gi gnas phyin
34a3(myang 'das): te| |tshangs pa brgya byin lha rnams kyang / /lhags nas bdag la mchod pa bgyid/ /'jig rten bcas pa thams cad ni/ /sdug bsngal chen po'i mya ngan skyes/ /sangs rgyas
34a4(myang 'das): bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa/ /yongs su mya ngan 'da' zhes rtogs/ /thams cad mthun par skad chen pos/ /'jig rten kha lo sgyur pa med/ /sems can thams cad mi
34a5(myang 'das): spang zhing / /sras dang 'dra bar gzigs su gsol/ /bcom ldan dge 'dun 'khor rnams la/ /bla na med pa'i chos ston pa/ /ji ltar rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus/ /rin chen ri
34a6(myang 'das): rab snang ba bzhin/ /bcom ldan mi shes yongs gcod pa/ /ma rig pa yi mun sel te/ /ji ltar nam mkha' bar snang la/ /sprin chod yongs su sel pa bzhin/ /bcom
34a7(myang 'das): ldan yongs su sel ba ni/ /kun nas nyon mongs thams cad de/ /ji ltar nyi ma shar nas su/ /sprin med kun tu snang ba bzhin/ /da ltar sems can 'di dag ni/ /shin tu
34b1(myang 'das): dus pas mig kyang skrangs/ /thams cad 'khor bar 'khor ba yi/ /sdug bsngal 'bab klung g.yengs par gyur/ /de bas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /'gro ba'i dad pa bskyed pa dang /
34b2(myang 'das): 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gcad pa'i phyir/ /'jig rten yun du bzhugs par gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis tsun+da la bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no/ /khyod kyis
34b3(myang 'das): smras pa bzhin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du gshegs pa'ang shin tu dka' ba ni me tog u dum wA ra dang 'dra'o/ /sangs rgyas dang phrad nas dad pa skye ba'ang de
34b4(myang 'das): bas shin tu dka'o/ /sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' kar mchod pa phul ba bzhes te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa'ang de bas shin tu
34b5(myang 'das): dka' ste/ tsun+da khyod mya ngan ma byed par shin tu dga' bas bdag spro ba skyed cig /de bzhin gshegs pas mchod pa nang gi tha ma 'di bzhes te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
34b6(myang 'das): su rdzogs par gyur pas chog gi/ bcom ldan 'das la 'jig rten na yun du bzhugs par gsol ba ma 'debs shig /khyod kyis sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul thams cad mi
34b7(myang 'das): rtag la/ 'du byed rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyang de'i tshul du rig par gyis shig /de nas tsun+da la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten bcas pa thams cad ni/ /skye ba
35a1(myang 'das): yod na 'chi ba yod/ /tshe lo grangs med thub pa yang / /tha mar zad par rig par bya/ /dar ba yod na rgud pa yod/ /'du ba yod na 'bral bar 'gyur/ /lang
35a2(myang 'das): tsho de yang mi rtag ste/ /dar ba'i mdog kyang nad kyis 'phrog /'tsho ba'i tshe yang 'chi bas 'phrog /rtag pa'i chos ni gang yang med/ /dbang du gyur pa'i rgyal po dag /byin dang mthu
35a3(myang 'das): stobs zla med kyang / /thams cad 'gyur zhing 'pho bas na/ /'tsho ba'i srog kyang de bzhin no/ /sdug bsngal 'khor lo mtha' med de/ /'khor bar 'khor ba rgyun mi 'chad/ /khams
35a4(myang 'das): gsum thams cad rtag pa med/ /srid pa thams cad bde ma yin/ /srid pa'i mtshan nyid dngos po ni/ /thams cad stong ba med pa ste/ /'jig pa'i chos can 'gyur zhing 'pho/ /mya
35a5(myang 'das): ngan skyon dang rtag tu bcas/ /skyon mang 'jig pa'i chos can te/ /rga dang na 'chis rtag tu gtses/ /srid pa'i chos ni mtha' yas pas/ /'gyur zhing 'pho ba'i dgra dang bcas/ /nyon
35a6(myang 'das): mongs kun tu glags pa ni/ /ji ltar dar gyi srin bu bzhin/ /de la mkhas pa shes rab can/ /su zhig dga' zhing mos par byed/ /lus 'di sdug bsngal phung po ste/ /thams
35a7(myang 'das): cad mi gtsang btsog pa'o/ /skyon gyis bcings shing rma dang ldan/ /phan pa'i don ni ye nas med/ /yar na lha yi lus bar du/ /thams cad de dang 'dra bas na/ /'dod pa thams
35b1(myang 'das): cad mi rtag pas/ /nga ni de la chags mi byed/ /'dod spangs legs par yid byas na/ /yang dag bden pa rig par 'gyur/ /srid pa yongs su gcod pa ni/ /deng 'dir yongs su mya
35b2(myang 'das): ngan 'da'/ /nga ni srid pa'i pha rol phyin/ /sdug bsngal kun las shin tu 'das/ /de bas da ltar thob pa ni/ /bla med bde ba 'ba' zhig go /de yi rgyu dang rkyen gyis na/ /spros pa med pa'i
35b3(myang 'das): mtha' rig ste/ /bcing ba thams cad yongs bcad nas/ /deng 'dir yongs su mya ngan 'da'/ /nga la rga shi na ba med/ /sku tshe'i tshad kyang zad mi shes/ /deng du mya ngan 'das pa ni/ /ji
35b4(myang 'das): ltar me chen shi ba bzhin/ /tsun+da khyod ni ma rtog cig /de bzhin gshegs pa'i don rnams la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'di/ /ri rab bzhin du brtag par bya/ /nga ni mya ngan
35b5(myang 'das): 'das bzhugs te/ /mchog gi bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid yin/ /de bas ngu bar mi bya'o/ /de nas tsun+das bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
35b6(myang 'das): de de bzhin te/ /de de bzhin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa bzhin te/ bdag 'tshal ba'i shes rab shin tu chung ba ni/ dper na/ sbrang bu dang 'dra ba bdag gis de bzhin
35b7(myang 'das): gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs pa'i don zab mo ga la rig / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni klung chen po dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
36a1(myang 'das): chen po kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / zag pa thams cad bas pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa dang mnyam par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das
36a2(myang 'das): dper na/ gsar bu rab tu byung ba bsnyen par ma rdzogs mod kyi/ dge 'dun gyi grangs su mchi ba dang 'dra bar bdag kyang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byin gyi
36a3(myang 'das): rlabs kyis de ltar byang chub sems dpa' chen po de dag gi grangs su gtogs par gyur te/ de bas na bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa yun du 'jig rten na bzhugs shing / mya ngan
36a4(myang 'das): las mi 'da' bar gsol lo/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dper na/ mi bkres pa de ni slar slon mi gda' ba ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kyang de dang 'dra na mya ngan las mi 'da'
36a5(myang 'das): bar 'jig rten na yun du bzhugs par gsol lo/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tsun+da la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tsun+da khyod 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig
36a6(myang 'das): rten na yun du bzhugs shing yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba/ ji ltar mi shin tu bkres pa de skyug bro mi srid do zhes de skad ma zer bar khyod 'du byed rnams kyi mtshan
36a7(myang 'das): nyid la shin tu rtogs shig / de ltar 'du byed la brtags na stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang ldan par 'gyur gyi/ yang dag pa'i chos 'dod pa dag de lta bu'i tshul du bslab par bya'o//
36b1(myang 'das): tsun+das 'jam dpal la smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni/ lha dang mi'i nang na mchog tu gyur/ phul du gyur na/ ci de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed lags sam/ ci ste 'du
36b2(myang 'das): byed lags skye zhing 'gog pa'i chos can du 'gyur te/ dper na/ chu'i chu bur ltar de ma thag tu 'byung la/ de ma thag tu 'jig ste/ 'khor bar 'khor ba ni shing rta'i 'khor lo dang
36b3(myang 'das): mtshungs te/ 'du byed thams cad kyang de dang mtshungs so/ /bdag gis sngon thos pa ltar na lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyang shin tu ring ngo zhes 'byung na/ ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das lha'i
36b4(myang 'das): lha sku tshe rab tu thung ste/ lo brgyar yang mi bzhugs par gyur/ dper na/ dbang du gyur pa'i grong rdal gyi gtso bo'ang dbang dang mthu yod pas phas rgol ba thul te/ nam bsod nams
36b5(myang 'das): zad de dbul phongs par gyur na kun gyis brnyas shing mtho btsams te bkol bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byin dang mthu nyams pa'i phyir ro/ /'o na bcom ldan 'das kyang 'du
36b6(myang 'das): byed rnams dang mthun par 'gyur ro/ /ji ste 'du byed rnams dang mthun par gyur na lha'i lha zhes kyang gdags su mi rung ngo / /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'du byed rnams ni skye shi'i chos so//
36b7(myang 'das): de bas na/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'du byed dang mthun par mi blta'o/ /'jam dpal/ mkhyen bzhin du gsung ngam/ 'on te mi mkhyen pas de bzhin gshegs
37a1(myang 'das): pa 'du byed rnams dang mthun no zhes gsungs/ ci ste de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed rnams dang mthun na lta/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'jig rten gsum
37a2(myang 'das): na lha'i lha ste/ dbang du gyur pa'i chos kyi rgyal po zhes gdags su mi rung ngo / /dper na/ rgyal po zhig la gyad stobs po che gcig gis phas rgol ba stong thub ste gang gis kyang mi
37a3(myang 'das): thub na de ni mi stong thub pa'i gyad ces bya ste/ gyed de la ni rgyal pos kyang gnang la bya dga' yang gzhan pas lhag par stsal to/ /gyad des mi stong thub ces bya ba'ang gyad des stobs
37a4(myang 'das): 'ba' zhig gis mi stong thub pa ma yin gyi/ rtsal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mi stong las phul du gyur pas na stong thub pa'i gyad ces btags so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de dang 'dra
37a5(myang 'das): ste| nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang / phung po'i bdud dang / lha'i bu'i bdud dang / 'chi bdag gi 'dud yongs su bcom pas de bzhin gshegs pa ni khams gsum na phul du gyur pa'i
37a6(myang 'das): zhes gsungs te/ ji ltar gyad gcig gis mi stong thub pa bzhin no/ /de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'ang rnam pa sna tshogs kyi yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pas na/ de bzhin
37a7(myang 'das): gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes btags so/ /'jam dpal/ rnam par rtog pas de bzhin gshegs pa la 'du byed rnams dang mthun no/ /zhes rnam
37b1(myang 'das): par rtog par mi rigs so/ /dper na/ khyim bdag phyug po zhig gi bu khye'u zhig btsas nas mtshan mkhan gyis bltas te/ tshe thung ngo zhes dpyad na/ pha mas de skad ces thos ma thag tu
37b2(myang 'das): rigs 'tshob par mi 'gyur bar shes pas de la sdug par mi byed de/ rtswa tsam gyi tshod du 'dzin to/ /gang tshe thung ba de la ni dge sbyong dang / bram ze la sogs pa'i khye'u dang bu mo che chung gi
37b3(myang 'das): bar du btsun par mi byed do/ /ci ste de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed rnams dang mthun na lta/ 'jig rten du bcas pa lha dang / mi dang / sems can thams cad kyis kyang btsun par
37b4(myang 'das): mi byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i yang dag pa'i chos mi 'gyur mi 'pho ba'ang 'dzin pa med par 'gyur ro/ /de bas na/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa la
37b5(myang 'das): 'du byed rnams dang mthun no zhes gsung ba mi rigs so/ /'jam dpal/ dper na/ bud med dbul mo gnas med pa/ rten med pa/ skyabs med pa zhig nad kyis kyang gzir la/
37b6(myang 'das): zas dang skom gyis kyang phongs te/ 'khyams shing 'gro ba gcig gi khyim du phyin nas bu btsas na/ khyim bdag des 'dug tu mi ster te skrod do/ /bud med de bu btsas nas ring po ma
37b7(myang 'das): lon kyang bu phang du thogs te/ yul gzhan du 'gro ba las lam du rlung dang / char pa dang / lhags pas nyon mongs la/ sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrul gdug pa dang phrad dam/
38a1(myang 'das): lam gyi bar chu klung gang+gAs chod kyang chu klung shin tu zab cing drag pa de las bu bang du thogs te 'bog go /de nas ma smad gnyis ka chu'i nang du nub bo/ /de ltar
38a2(myang 'das): bud med de bu la byams shing sdug pas bsams pa'i bsod nams kyis shi ma thag tu tshangs pa'i lhar skyes so/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu dag dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i phyir de
38a3(myang 'das): bzhin gshegs pa la 'du byed rnams dang mthun no zhe'am/ 'du byed rnams dang mi mthun no zhes brjod par mi bya'i/ bdag ni gti mug gis ldongs pas shes rab kyi mig med de/
38a4(myang 'das): de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos ni bsam gyis mi khyab pas mi rtog ste/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni nges par 'dus byas zhe'am/ nges par 'dus ma byas zhes brjod
38a5(myang 'das): par mi bya'o/ /gang yang dag par lta bas ni de bzhin gshegs pa la nges par 'dus ma byas pa'o zhes brjod par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thams cad dge bar
38a6(myang 'das): 'gyur ba'i chos bskyed cing 'gro ba mang po la thugs brtse ba'i phyir ro/ /ji ltar bud med dbul mo de klung gang+gA la rgal ba na/ bu sdug par bsams te lus dang srog kyang yal bar
38a7(myang 'das): gyur pa dang 'dra bar/ rigs kyi bu chos bsrung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin du lus dang srog la bab kyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dus byas dang mthun zhe'am/
38b1(myang 'das): de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dus ma byas dang mthun zhes brjod par mi bya'o// //'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po gsum pa/ de ltar
38b2(myang 'das): de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus ma byas pa dang mthun no zhes brjod pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba ni/ ji ltar bud med dbul mo de tshangs pa'i lhar skyes pa
38b3(myang 'das): bzhin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos bsrung ba'i phyir ro/ /de la chos bsrung ba gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dus ma byas pa'o zhes smra ba ste/ rigs kyi bu/ gang zag de ni rnam
38b4(myang 'das): par grol ba la mi re mod kyi/ rnam par grol ba rang thob ste/ ji ltar bud med dbul mo de tshangs pa'i lhar mi re mod kyi/ tshangs pa'i lhar rang skyes so/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/
38b5(myang 'das): dper na/ mi zhig lam ring bor mgron du song ba las lam du ngal chad de gzhan gyi khyim du nyal nyal ba las/ de'i khyim mes 'bar te rab tu 'jigs skrag nas/ de 'di snyam du
38b6(myang 'das): bdag ni gdon mi za bar 'chi'o snyam bsams nas khrel zhing ngo tsha ba dang ldan pa'i phyir gos kyis lus dkris so/ /de tshe 'phos nas sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lhar skyes so/ /de
38b7(myang 'das): nas yang lan brgyad cu'i bar du tshangs pa chen po'i rgyal por skyes so/ /de nas lo brgya stong tshang bar mi'i nang du 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por skyes te/ gang zag de nam du'ang ngan
39a1(myang 'das): song gsum du ma skyes kyi/ gong nas gong du rab tu bde ba'i gnas su skyes so/ /de bas na/ 'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu dag khrel zhing ngo tsha ba dang ldan pa
39a2(myang 'das): rnams ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la 'dus byas rnams dang mthun par mi blta'o/ /'jam dpal/ mu stegs can ngan par lta ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dus byas
39a3(myang 'das): dang mthun no zhes smra'i/ tshul khrims bsrung ba'i dge slong dag ni de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dus byas pa yin par mi lta'o/ /ci ste de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dus
39a4(myang 'das): byas yin no zhes brjod na de ni brdzun du smra ba yin te/ gang zag de ni shi ma thag tu sems can dmyal bar skye bar rig par bya ba ni/ ji ltar gang zag bdag gi khyim na gnas
39a5(myang 'das): pa bzhin no/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni yang dag par 'dus ma byas pa'i chos can yin pas 'dus byas zhes brjod par mi bya'o/ /'jam dpal/ deng slan chad
39a6(myang 'das): 'khor bar 'khor ba na shes pa med par spangs te/ yang dag pa'i ye shes btsal bar bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/ gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa
39a7(myang 'das): la de lta bu'i tshul du lta na mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan zhing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
39b1(myang 'das): pas tsun+da la smras pa/ legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod ni shin tu tshe ring bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu mngon sum du gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag pa'i chos can/ mi 'gyur mi
39b2(myang 'das): 'pho ba'i chos can/ 'dus ma byas pa'i chos su rtogs pa legs so/ /khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid du ma brjod pa legs so/ /ji ltar mes 'tshig pa'i
39b3(myang 'das): gang zag de khrel zhing ngo tsha ba dang ldan pas gos kyis lus g.yogs pa dang / bsam pa de dge bas sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lhar skyes te/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po dang / 'khor los
39b4(myang 'das): bsgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur te/ rtag tu gnas bde bar skyes kyi/ ngan song du ma skyes so/ /de bzhin du khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid ma brjod pas phyi ma
39b5(myang 'das): ma 'ongs pa'i dus su gdon mi za bar mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang / ma 'dres pa'i chos bco brgyad dang / tshe tshad med pa dang / 'khor bar mi
39b6(myang 'das): gnas pa dang / rab tu bde ba dang / ring por mi thogs par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/ /tsun+da/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas rgyas par gsung bar
39b7(myang 'das): 'gyur gyi/ bdag cag gnyis kas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid mi brjod par bya'o/ /'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas pa 'di re zhig zhog la bsod snyoms ci
40a1(myang 'das): 'byor pa myur du phul cig / sbyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa sbyin pa'i nang na phul du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma
40a2(myang 'das): lam ring po nas 'ongs pa ngal chad pa dag la yongs su dag pa'i sems kyis ci 'dod pa myur du phul cig dang / khyod kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i sa
40a3(myang 'das): bon du 'gyur ro/ /tsun+da/ gang gis nang gi tha mar sangs rgyas dang / dge 'dun la mang yang rung / nyung yang rung / chog kyang rung / mchog rung / de bzhin gshegs pa yongs
40a4(myang 'das): su mya ngan las 'da' kar mchod pa phul cig / tsun+das 'jam dpal la smras pa/ ci'i phyir bsod snyoms la chags te/ mang ba dang / nyung ba dang / chog pa dang / mchog pa dang /
40a5(myang 'das): dus su phul cig ces gsung / 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa sngon lo drug gi bar du dka' ba spyod kyang bzod na/ deng 'dir skad cig thang cig tsam thogs pa lta ci smos/
40a6(myang 'das): 'jam dpal/ ci de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bsod snyoms 'di yang dag par bzhes so snyam sems sam/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs
40a7(myang 'das): pa'i sku 'di nges par chos kyi sku yin gyi/ zas kyi sku ma yin par shes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de de bzhin no/ /de de
40b1(myang 'das): bzhin te/ tsun+das smras pa bzhin no/ /tsun+da/ shin tu legs so/ /khyod ni mchog gi ye shes chen po dang ldan te/ theg pa chen po'i mdo sde shin tu zab mo'ang legs par rtogs so/ /'jam
40b2(myang 'das): dpal gyis tsun+da la smras pa/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dus ma byas par rtogs pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad ni shin tu ring bas de lta bu'i tshul du shes na de
40b3(myang 'das): bzhin gshegs pas kyang khyod la spro ba gnang bar gyur to/ /tsun+das smras pa/ bdag 'ba' zhig la spro ba gnang ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad la'ang spro ba gnang ba yin no/ /
40b4(myang 'das): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas khyod dang / bdag dang / sems can thams cad la'ang spro ba gnang ba yin no/ /tsun+das smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin
40b5(myang 'das): gshegs pas spro ba gnang ngo zhes ma zer cig / spro ba zhes bya ba ni phyin ci log tu 'du shes pa'o/ /gang phyin ci log tu 'du shes pa ni 'khor ba'o/ /gang 'khor ba de ni 'dus byas
40b6(myang 'das): kyi chos can no/ /de bas na/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dus byas su mi blta'o/ /ci ste de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dus byas yin par smras na/ skyes bu khyod dang
40b7(myang 'das): bdag kyang phyin ci log spyod par gyur to/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni sdug par dgongs pa med do/ /sdug par sems pa ni/ dper na/ ba be'u la sdug par
41a1(myang 'das): sems te/ ltogs sam skom yang 'gro bzhin du rtswa dang chu tshol te/ chog kyang rung / mchog kyang rung / de ma thag tu be'u tshol zhing 'ong ngo / /sangs rgyas
41a2(myang 'das): bcom ldan 'das la ni de lta bu'i dgongs pa mi mnga'i/ thams cad la sgra gcan 'dzin dang 'dra bar gzigs so/ /gang de ltar dgongs pa de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes kyi
41a3(myang 'das): spyod yul lo/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgyal po chen po'i rta shin tu dul pa las bcas pa'i shing rta la/ bong bu'i shing rtas slebs su re ba ni gnas med do/ /skyes
41a4(myang 'das): bu khyod dang / bdag kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa zab mo'i mtha' chub par rtogs su re ba'ang gnas med do/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bya
41a5(myang 'das): nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po steng gi nam mkha' la dpag tshad grangs med pa zhig las 'phags te/ 'og tu rgya mtsho la bltas na chu'i nang na gnas pa nya dang / rus sbal dang / kho
41a6(myang 'das): gor bab sha dang / chu srin dang / klu la sogs pa chu la gnas pa'i ris su gtogs pa thams cad gsal bar mthong ba ni/ ji ltar me long gsal ba'i nang na gzugs brnyan
41a7(myang 'das): snang ba dang 'dra ste/ bus pa shes pa chung ba dag gis ni dpag nus pa ma yin no/ /de ltar des mi mthong ba bzhin du skyes bu khyod dang bdag kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bzhin gshegs
41b1(myang 'das): pa'i ye shes la dpag nus pa ma yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis tsun+da la smras pa/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis smras pa bzhin te/ ngas don 'di dag ma rtogs pa ni ma yin gyi/
41b2(myang 'das): khyod dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams bstan par zad do/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs bkye nas/ 'od des 'jam dpal gyi lus la yongs
41b3(myang 'das): su snang bar byas so/ /'jam dpal la 'od des reg ma thag tu dngos po ji lta ba nyid mod la rtogs nas tsun+da la 'di skad ces smras so/ /de bzhin gshegs pas ltas 'di bstan nas
41b4(myang 'das): ring po mi thogs par yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gshegs nges kyi/ khyod kyi mchod pa nang gi tha mar bshams pa bcom ldan 'das dang / dge 'dun chen po rnams la dbul
41b5(myang 'das): ba'i dus la bab bo/ /tsun+da/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs bkye ba 'di ni rgyu med rkyen med pa ma yin par rig par gyis shig /tsun+das de skad ces smras pa thos
41b6(myang 'das): nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tsun+da la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis mchod pa bshams pa sangs rgyas dang / dge 'dun rnams la dbul ba'i dus la bab bo//
41b7(myang 'das): de bzhin gshegs pa ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du de bzhin du bka' stsal to/ /de'i tshe tsun+das bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
42a1(myang 'das): stsal pa thos ma thag tu skad chen po phyung ste dus nas 'di skad du/ kyi hud/ kyi hud/ 'jig rten stongs so zhes cho nge rdung ngo / /yang 'khor gyi dkyil
42a2(myang 'das): 'khor rnams la 'di skad du/ bdag cag gis lus smad lnga sa la gtugs te/ thams cad kyis skad mthun par bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol pa
42a3(myang 'das): gdab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis tsun+da la bka' stsal pa/ sems yongs su gdungs shing ma ngu bar/ bdag gi lus la chu shing lta bu'am/ smig rgyu ba'am/ chu'i
42a4(myang 'das): chu bur ram/ sgyu ma'am/ dri za'i grong khyer ram/ rdza so ma btang ba lta bu'am/ glog gi 'od dam/ chu la ri mo bris pa'am/ gsod du khrid pa'i btson lta bu'am/ shing tog
42a5(myang 'das): smin pa lta bu'am/ sha rul pa'am/ thags kyi rgyu zad pa'am/ gtun lta bur blta'o/ /'du byed rnams la dug dang 'dres pa'i zas lta bur blta'o/ /'dus byas kyi chos
42a6(myang 'das): rnams la nyes pa'i skyon rnam pa mang bar blta'o/ /de nas tsun+das bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten na yun du bzhugs par
42a7(myang 'das): mi bgyis na bdag mi ngu ba'i gtol ga la mchis/ kyi hud/ kyi hud/ 'jig rten stongs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag dang / sems can thams cad la thugs
42b1(myang 'das): brtse ba'i slad du 'jig rten na yun du bzhugs shing mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis tsun+da la bka' stsal pa/ bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i phyir
42b2(myang 'das): 'jig rten na yun du bzhugs par gsol zhes ma zer cig / ngas khyod la sogs pa 'gro ba thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i phyir yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs so/ /de
42b3(myang 'das): ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid kyang de yin la/ 'dus byas kyang de dang 'dra'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /'dus
42b4(myang 'das): byas pa yi chos thams cad/ rang bzhin nyid kyis mi rtag ste/ skyes nas mi gnas pa yin pas/ /rab tu zhi ba de bde'o/ /tsun+da khyod 'dus byas thams cad 'dres pa dang / chos
42b5(myang 'das): thams cad la bdag med pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / ring du mi gnas te/ lus 'di ni shin tu skyon mang bas chu bur lta bur ltos la de bas na ma du zhig /de nas tsun+das bcom
42b6(myang 'das): ldan 'das la gsol pa/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'ang thabs su bstan
42b7(myang 'das): par 'tshal mod kyi/ bdag gis mya ngan mi bgyid kyang mi bzod do/ /yang shin tu bsams na dga' zhing spro ba'ang skye'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis tsun+da la bka' stsal pa/ legs
43a1(myang 'das): so| |shin tu legs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pas sems can dang mthun pa'i tshul du mya ngan las 'da' bar bstan pa shes pa legs so/ /tsun+da khyod
43a2(myang 'das): legs par nyon cig / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bya sa la sa zhes bya ba dbyar tsha ba'i dus su thams cad mtsho ma dros pa zhes bya bar 'du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang de dang 'dra
43a3(myang 'das): ste| gnas de nyid du gshegs so/ /tsun+da khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad ring zhe'am/ thung zhes ma rtog par chos thams cad sgyu ma dang 'dra ste/ de bzhin gshegs
43a4(myang 'das): pas thabs kyis ci la'ang chags par mi mdzad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid kyis de'o/ /tsun+da khyod kyi mchod pa nang gi tha mar bshams pa 'di bzhes pa ni
43a5(myang 'das): khyod 'khor ba'i klung las bsgral ba'i phyir ro/ /de la lha'am mi'am/ 'jig rten du bcas pa gang yang rung / nang gi tha mar mchod pa bshams te nga la phul na/ mi g.yo
43a6(myang 'das): ba'i 'bras bu thob cing rtag tu bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga ni sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yin pa'i phyir ro/ /khyod kyang sems can rnams
43a7(myang 'das): kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur bar 'dod na mchod pa bshams pa ma thogs par myur du phul cig / de nas tsun+das sems can thams cad rnam par grol bar bya ba'i phyir
43b1(myang 'das): mgo smad de/ mchi ma blags bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /shin tu legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur yang dag na lta/ de
43b2(myang 'das): bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba ma lags par rtogs par 'gyur ba zhig na bdag cag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni/ sbrang bu
43b3(myang 'das): dang 'dra bas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / mya ngan las mi 'da' ba dpog mi nus so/ /de nas tsun+da 'khor dang bcas pas mchi ma blags te du bzhin
43b4(myang 'das): du de bzhin gshegs pa la bskor ba byas/ bdug spos dang / me tog gis gtor te/ mchod pa byas nas 'jam dpal dang bcas su 'dug pa las langs te/ mchod pa shom du
43b5(myang 'das): dong ngo / /de ltar song ma thag tu de'i tshe sa'ang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten la thug gi bar du rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /sa g.yos ba la rnam pa gnyis te/ sa g.yos pa dang / rab tu g.yos
43b6(myang 'das): pa'o/ /cung zad g.yos pa ni sa g.yos pa zhes bya'o/ /cher g.yos pa ni rab tu g.yos pa zhes bya'o/ /skad chung ba ni sa g.yos pa zhes bya'o/ /skad che ba ni rab tu g.yos pa zhes bya'o/ /
43b7(myang 'das): sa 'ba' zhig g.yos pa ni sa g.yos pa zhes bya'o/ /ri dang chu dang shing dang rgya mtsho la sogs pa thams cad g.yos pa ni rab tu g.yos pa zhes bya'o/ /phyogs gcig tu
44a1(myang 'das): g.yos pa ni sa g.yos pa zhes bya'o/ /kun tu 'khor zhing g.yos pa ni rab tu g.yos pa zhes bya'o/ /'gul ba ni sa g.yos pa zhes bya'o/ /'gul ba na
44a2(myang 'das): sems can thams cad kyi sems kyang g.yos pa ni rab tu g.yos pa zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' thog ma gnas pa de na gnam nas babs te/ dzam+bu'i gling du gshegs pa
44a3(myang 'das): na rab tu g.yos pa zhes bya'o/ /thog ma btsas pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / yongs
44a4(myang 'das): su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs pa ni rab tu g.yos pa zhes bya'o/ /deng de bzhin gshegs pa'ang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs pa lta ste/ de bas na sa 'di'ang
44a5(myang 'das): rab tu g.yos so/ /de nas lha dang / klu dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pa de
44a6(myang 'das): dag thos ma thag tu lus kyi ba spu kun langs nas thams cad du ngus te/ skad mthun par tshigs su bcad pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /phyag 'tshal kha lo sgyur ba la/ /bdag
44a7(myang 'das): cag rnams ni gsol ba 'debs/ /drang srong chen pos bor bas na/ /mgon skyabs rten ma mchis par gyur/ /bcom ldan mya ngan 'das gshegs pas/ /bdag cag sdug
44b1(myang 'das): bsngal rgya mtshor nub/ /yid blong mya ngan gdung ba ni/ /ji ltar be'u dag ma stor bzhin/ /dbul phongs mgon dang skyabs ma mchis/ /ji ltar shin tu na ba de/ /sman pa mkhas pa ma mchis
44b2(myang 'das): pas/ /yid bzhin bza' ba ci yang 'tshal/ /sems can nyon mongs nad kyis gzir/ /lta ba rnams kyis rtag tu gtse/ /chos kyi sman pa mkhas dang bral/ /ngan par lta ba'i gdug pa
44b3(myang 'das): 'tshal/ /de bas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /bdag cag spang ba mi mdzad gsol/ /dper na rgyal po mi bzhugs na/ /yul mi thams cad ltogs par gyur/ /bdag cag rnams
44b4(myang 'das): kyang de 'dra ste/ /chos kyi ro dang skyabs kyang stor/ /sangs rgyas mya ngan 'da' thos pas/ /bdag cag sems ni myos par gyur/ /ji ltar sa chen rab g.yos nas/ /phyogs rnams shin
44b5(myang 'das): tu bslad pa bzhin/ /drang srong mya ngan 'das gshegs pas/ /sangs rgyas nyi mas la lhung / /chos kyi chu yang bskams par gyur/ /bdag cag gdon mi za bar 'chi/ /bcom ldan mya
44b6(myang 'das): ngan 'das gshegs na/ /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal gdung ba ni/ /dper na tshong ba zhig gi bu/ /gsar du pha ma shi ba bzhin/ /bcom ldan mya 'das gshegs te/ /ci ste mi bzhugs
44b7(myang 'das): par gyur na/ /bdag dang sems can thams cad ni/ /mgon dang skyabs mchis par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan mya ngan 'das gshegs na/ /byol song skye gnas par du yang / /thams
45a1(myang 'das): cad sdug bsngal yi blong zhing / /gdungs par gyur te smre sngags 'don/ /deng 'dir bdag cag rnams kyis ni/ /mya ngan mi bgyid gtol ma mchis/ /
45a2(myang 'das): de bzhin gshegs pas bor ba yang / /ji ltar mchil ma ngar snabs bzhin/ /dper na nyi ma shar ba na/ /'od zer kun tu lham mer snang / /kun tu snang bar byas pas na/ /
45a3(myang 'das): mun pa thams cad med par gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul 'od/ /bdag cag rnams kyi nyon mongs bsal/ /'khor gyi nang du bzhugs pa yang / /ri rab ri yi rgyal
45a4(myang 'das): po bzhin/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dper na/ rgyal po zhig gi sras bu byad gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa shin tu mdzes pa dag mchis na shin tu byams pas sngar rtsal sna
45a5(myang 'das): tshogs bslabs te/ khong du chud pa'i 'og tu gshed ma la gsod cig ces gtad do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang chos kyi sras su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
45a6(myang 'das): bstan cing bcos na yang dag par lta ba dang ldan par 'gyur gyi/ bdag cag rnams mi spang du gsol/ ci ste bdag cag yongs su spangs par gyur na rgyal po'i sras dang
45a7(myang 'das): 'dra bar mi 'gyur ram/ mya ngan las mi 'da' bar 'jig rten na yun du bzhugs par gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/ dper na/ skyes bu zhig gtsug lag rnams legs
45b1(myang 'das): par bslabs nas gtsug lag gis skrag par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang de dang mtshungs te/ chos thams cad thugs su chud nas chos kyis bsnyengs par gyur to/ /gal te de
45b2(myang 'das): bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten na yun du bzhugs shing bdud rtsi lta bu'i chos bstan te/ thams cad ngoms par mdzad na sems can thams cad kyang sems can dmyal bar ltung
45b3(myang 'das): gis mi dogs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dper na/ skyes bu zhig las byed pa'i 'phro las bzung ste/ btson rar bcug nas de la mi zhig gis/ 'di skad du khyod 'di na ci byed ces
45b4(myang 'das): dris na bdag ni shin tu sdug bsngal chen po myong zhing 'dug ste/ 'di las thar na rab tu bde bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang de dang 'dra ste/ bdag cag gi
45b5(myang 'das): slad du spyod pa dka' ba mdzad mdzad de/ bdag cag 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa las mthar na de bzhin gshegs pa bde bar gal 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das/ dper na/ sman pa
45b6(myang 'das): shin tu mkhas pa ni sman dpyad gsang ba dag bu la ston gyi/ slob ma gzhan la mi ston no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang de dang 'dra ste/ dgongs te gsungs pa'i snying po shin tu zab
45b7(myang 'das): mo'ang 'jam dpal 'ba' zhig la bstan gyi/ bdag cag rnams la bstan par ma gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'ang sman pa lta bu 'ba' zhig la bstan gyi/ slob ma gzhan la
46a1(myang 'das): mi ston pa ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos thams cad la phrag dog tu ma gyur pa lags so/ /sman pa des kun la 'dra bar ma bstan pa ni byams
46a2(myang 'das): sdang gi sems dang bcas pas gsang ste ston par gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ni byams sdang mi mnga' na/ ci'i slad du bdag cag la bstan par ma gyur/
46a3(myang 'das): bcom ldan 'das yun du bzhugs shing mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol lo/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dper na/ rgan po'am/ gzhon nu'ang rung / nad kyis sdug bsngal
46a4(myang 'das): bar gyur la/ lam bzang po spangs nas lam nyam nga ba g.yang sa dang bcas pa/ lam ngan par zhugs na shin tu sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/ /de la mi zhig gis
46a5(myang 'das): mthong nas snying brtse bas lam nyam nga ba med pa bzang po bstan to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de la gzhon nu zhes bgyi ba ni chos can gyi
46a6(myang 'das): lus ma bskyed pa'i dpe'o/ /rgan po zhes bgyi ba ni nyon mongs pa chen po'i dpe'o/ /na ba ni 'khor ba las mthar pa'i dpe'o/ /lam g.yang sa dang ldan pa ni srid pa nyi shu
46a7(myang 'das): lnga po'i dpe'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag la bdud rtsi'i lam yang dag par bstan cing mya ngan las mi 'da' bar 'jig rten na yun du bzhugs par gsol lo/ /
46b1(myang 'das): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ khyed dge slong dag/ byis pa ma rabs sam/ lha dang mi lta bur mya ngan dang ngu ba ma byed par yang dag par dran pa nye bar
46b2(myang 'das): gzhag pa la brtson 'grus su gyis shig / de'i tshe lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ngu zhig ces bka' stsal pa thos nas/ dper na/ mi zhig
46b3(myang 'das): bu shi nas bu'i shid btang ma thag tu ma ngu zhig ces bsgo ba dang mtshungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po de dag la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ khyed rnams
46b4(myang 'das): so sor spro skyed la/ /mya ngan chen po ma byed cig /sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid yin/ /de bas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs/ /bag yod spyod la mos par bya/ /yang dag dran
46b5(myang 'das): pas sems kyang srung / /chos ma yin pa rab spangs te/ /spro ba skyed la dga' bar gyis/ /gzhan yang dge slong dag the tshom dang som nyir gyur pa yod na/ thams cad zhu zhing dris
46b6(myang 'das): shig| stong pa dang / stong pa ma yin pa dang / rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / sdug bsngal ma yin pa dang / gnas dang / gnas ma yin pa dang / song ba dang /
46b7(myang 'das): ma song ba dang / 'ongs pa dang / ma 'ongs pa ma yin pa dang / ther zug dang / ther zug ma yin pa dang / chad pa dang / rtag pa dang / sems can dang / sems can ma yin pa
47a1(myang 'das): dang | yod pa dang / med pa dang / bden pa dang / mi bden pa dang / yang dag pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa dang / 'gog pa dang / 'gog pa ma yin pa
47a2(myang 'das): dang / gsang ba dang / mi gsang ba dang / gnyis dang / mi gnyis pa la sogs pa'i chos la the tshom du gyur pa yod na/ zhu ba'i skabs la bab kyi/ dris shig dang / ci dang ci dris
47a3(myang 'das): pa de'i the tshom gcad do/ /khyed la sngar bdud rtsi lta bu'i chos bstan te/ gdod yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten du gshegs
47a4(myang 'das): pa'ang shin tu dkon/ mi'i lus thob pa'ang shin tu dka'/ sangs rgyas dang phrad cing dad pa bskyed pa'ang shin tu dka'/ bzod dka' ba bzod pa'ang shin tu dka'/ tshul
47a5(myang 'das): khrims rdzogs shing ma god ma nyams te/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob pa'ang shin tu dka' ste/ sa le sbram mam/ me tog u dum wA ra tshol ba bzhin no/ /dge slong dag/
47a6(myang 'das): mi khom pa brgyad dang bral te/ mi'i lus thob par dka' ba thob nas nga dang phrad par gyur na don med par chud mi gsan to/ /nga sngon dka' ba rnam pa sna tshogs spyad pas da
47a7(myang 'das): ltar 'di lta bu'i bla na med pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang ldan par gyur to/ /khyed la sogs pa'i phyir bskal pa tshad med pa'i bar du lus kyi yan lag lag pa dang / rkang pa dang /
47b1(myang 'das): mgo dang / mig dang / rkang dang / klad pa'ang yongs su btang ngo / /de bas na khyed rnams bag med par mi bya'o/ /dge slong dag/ ji ltar na yang dag pa'i chos kyi rin po che'i mkhar
47b2(myang 'das): brgyan cing yon tan rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan zhing / tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyi rab dang / 'obs dang / nyen lta bur 'gyur bar bya ba soms
47b3(myang 'das): shig| khyed sangs rgyas kyi chos rin po che'i mkhar lta bu dang phrad pa'i 'og tu/ yang dag pa ma yin pa/ sgyu dang bcas pa len pa'i mi rigs so/ /dper na/ tshong dpon dag rin po
47b4(myang 'das): che yang dag pa'i gling du phyin na/ gyo mo dang rdo ba blangs te/ phyir khyim du 'ongs pa 'dra bar khyed kyang de dang 'dra ste/ rin po che'i gling du phyin nas rdzas sgyu ma dag len to/ /dge slong
47b5(myang 'das): dag| zhum pa'i bsam pas chog pa'i sems ma skyed cig/ khyed rnams rab tu byung mod kyi/ theg pa chen po la mos par mi byed do/ /dge slong dag/ kha dog bsgyur ba'i gos ngur
47b6(myang 'das): smrig gyon mod kyi/ sems ni theg pa chen po yongs su dag pa'i chos la zhen par ma gyur to/ /dge slong dag/ bsod snyoms la zhugs te kun tu rgyu mod kyi/ theg pa chen po'i
47b7(myang 'das): chos kyi zas ma myong ngo / /dge slong dag/ skra dang kha spu bregs mod kyi/ yang dag pa'i chos kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa med par ma byas so/ /dge slong dang / deng thams cad
48a1(myang 'das): tshogs pa 'dir yang dag par gsung gis khyed la ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni yang dag pa ste/ phyin ci ma log pa'o//
48a2(myang 'das): de bas na khyed rnams dpa' zhing rtul phod pa'i sems kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa gzhom pa la brtson par gyis shig/ stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi nyi ma nub par gyur
48a3(myang 'das): na khyed rnams kyang ma rig pas khebs par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag/ dper na/ sa chen po dang ril skyes pa'i rtsi shing ni sems can rnams kyi dgos par 'gyur ro/ /nga'i
48a4(myang 'das): chos kyang de dang 'dra ste/ shin tu dge ba'i bdud rtsi lta bu'i chos kyi ro'ang skye la/ sems can gyi nyon mongs pa'i nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sman du'ang 'gyur ro/ /ngas deng 'dir
48a5(myang 'das): sems can thams cad dang / nga'i sras su gyur pa 'khor rnam pa bzhi yang dgongs te gsungs pa'i snying po la bde bar dgod cing nga'ang de la bde bar gnas nas yongs su mya
48a6(myang 'das): ngan las 'da'o/ /de la dgongs te gsungs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ dper na/ yi ge i lta bu thig le gsum thad kar bzhag gam/ dngar na ir mi 'gyur gyi/
48a7(myang 'das): dbang sgyur chen po'i mig lta bur pho gsum du bzhag na ir 'gyur te/ thig le gsum so sor phral ba las kyang ma yin no/ /nga'ang de dang 'dra ste/ rnam par grol ba'i chos
48b1(myang 'das): kyang mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'ang mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin/ chos gsum po so sor
48b2(myang 'das): phral ba las kyang mya ngan las 'da' ba'ang ma yin te/ nga ni chos gsum po 'di la gnas nas sems can gyi phyir mya ngan las 'da' ba zhes bya ste/ ji ltar 'jig rten na yi ge i zhes
48b3(myang 'das): grags pa bzhin no/ /de'i tshe na dge slong rnams sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nges par yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes gsungs pa thos nas shin tu mi dga' ste/ lus kyi ba spu
48b4(myang 'das): thams cad langs nas/ mig mchi mas gang bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal nas lan grangs med par bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
48b5(myang 'das): bcom ldan 'das/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / bdag med pa legs par gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dper na/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi rjes kyi
48b6(myang 'das): nang na bal glang gi rjes mchog go/ /mi rtag pa'i 'du shes kyang de dang 'dra ste/ 'du shes thams cad kyi nang na mchog go/ gang zhig de la brtson 'grus su nan tan bgyid na 'dod
48b7(myang 'das): pa'i khams kyi 'dod pa thams cad dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i 'dod pa dang / ma rig pa dang / nga rgyal dang / mi rtag pa'i 'du shes thams cad kyang ma mchis
49a1(myang 'das): par bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang bral na/ da yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs
49a2(myang 'das): par mi rigs so/ /ci ste ma bral na ci'i slad du mi rtag pa la nan tan bgyis nas khams gsum gyi 'dod pa dang / ma rig pa dang / nga rgyal dang / mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang bral
49a3(myang 'das): bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs/ bcom ldan 'das/ dper na/ zhing pa dag ni ston gyi dus su zhing rmos nas zhing gi ngo yur ma yongs su sel to/ /mi rtag pa'i 'du shes kyang de dang
49a4(myang 'das): 'dra ste/ 'dod pa'i khams kyi 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs ma mchis pa'i 'dod pa dang / ma rig pa dang / nga rgyal dang / mi rtag pa'i 'du shes kyi bar du sel to/ /
49a5(myang 'das): bcom ldan 'das/ dper na/ zhing rmo ba'i nang na ston log btab pa bzang ngo / /rjes thams cad kyi nang ba bal glang gi rjes mchog go/ 'du shes thams cad kyi nang na'ang
49a6(myang 'das): mi rtag pa mchog go / bcom ldan 'das/ dper na/ rgyal po chen po ni 'gum pa'i bus bgyid pa na/ sngar mtha' bzhir sho btang nas btson thams cad thar ba'i 'og tu
49a7(myang 'das): tshe'i bya ba bgyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de dang 'dra bar sems can thams cad shes rab med pa'i ma rig pas yongs su khebs pa las bsgral te thar par mdzad nas/
49b1(myang 'das): gdod mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs pa'i rigs kyi/ bdag cag ma bsgral bar ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag yongs su btang ste/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das
49b2(myang 'das): par gshegs/ bcom ldan 'das/ dper na/ mi zhig yi dwags kyis brlams te/ sngags mkhan dang phrad na/ sngags kyi mthus de las thar par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin
49b3(myang 'das): gshegs pa'ang de dang 'dra ste/ nyan thos rnams kyis ma rig pa'i yi dwags bsal cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rnam par grol ba la sogs pa'i chos la bde bar 'god pa
49b4(myang 'das): ni| ji ltar 'jig rten na yi ge i zhes grags pa bzhin no/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dper na/ spos kyi glang po che ni mis bcings na 'dul mkhas pa'i mkhan po mchis kyang mi thul te/
49b5(myang 'das): bcings pa'i thag pa bcad nas yid bzhin du mchi'o/ /de ltar bdag ni nyon mongs pa lnga bcu rtsa bdun gyis bcings pa las yongs su ma grol na ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas
49b6(myang 'das): yongs su btang ste mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs/ bcom ldan 'das/ dper na/ tsha ba'i nad kyis btab pa ni sman pa mkhas pa dang phrad na de ma thag tu 'tsho'o/ /bdag kyang de
49b7(myang 'das): dang 'dra na log par 'chi ba'i tsha ba'i nad mang pos sdug bsngal bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang mjal kyang nad ma byang ste/ bla na med pa'i bde ba rtag pa'ang ma thob na/
50a1(myang 'das): ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su spangs te/ mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs/ bcom ldan 'das/ dper na/ mi ra ro ba ni mi dran pas
50a2(myang 'das): na nye ring ma shes te/ ma dang / bu mo dang / sring mo la mi 'os mi rigs pa byed cing bag ma mchis par smra ste/ mi gtsang ba'i steng na nyal lo/ /de la sman pa mkhas pas sman
50a3(myang 'das): btang ste/ chang 'thungs pa slar skyugs na/ de ma thag tu dran te 'dzem pa dang ngo tsha ba'i sems skyes nas/ chang ni sdig pa mi dge ba thams cad kyi rtsa ba yin te/ gang gis yangs
50a4(myang 'das): su spangs na/ sdig pa thams cad kyang spong bar 'gyur ro zhes 'gyod pa skye'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang de dang 'dra ste/ thog ma mchis pa'i dus nas 'khor
50a5(myang 'das): bar 'khor te/ 'dod pas myos nas 'dod pa lnga la chags pas ma ma lags pa mar 'du shes/ sring mo ma lags pa la sring mor 'du shes/ bu mo ma lags pa la bu
50a6(myang 'das): mor 'du shes/ sems can ma lags pa la sems can du 'du shes bskyed pas 'khor bar 'khor te/ sdug bsngal myong ba ni ji ltar me ra ro ba ngan skyugs kyi steng na nyal
50a7(myang 'das): ba bzhin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pas kyang bdag la chos kyi sman btang nas nyon mongs pa'i chang slar skyugs mod kyi/ legs par ma sangs par ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs
50b1(myang 'das): pas yongs su spangs te mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs/ bcom ldan 'das/ dper na/ gang zag gcig shing chu shing la sra zhing snying po yod do zhes ston na/ de ni gnas ma
50b2(myang 'das): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ so so'i skye bo dag kyang de dang 'dra ste/ bdag dang / gang zag dang / sems can dang / 'tsho ba dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang /
50b3(myang 'das): shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / bya ba dang / byed pa po la yang dag pa bden pa'o/ /zhes ston na/ de'ang gnas ma lags so/ /bdag cag kyang de ltar bdag ma mchis pa la nan
50b4(myang 'das): tan bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dper na/ sbrang ma ni cir yang mi dgos te/ lus kyang de dang 'dra bar bdag ma mchis/ bdag po ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ me
50b5(myang 'das): tog 'dab ma bdun pa la dri bsung ma mchis pa dang 'dra bar lus 'di la'ang bdag ma mchis/ bdag po ma mchis te/ bdag cag kyang de lta bu'i sems kyis bdag ma mchis
50b6(myang 'das): pa'i 'du shes la nan tan bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ltar chos thams cad la bdag dang bdag gi ba ma mchis te/ dge slong dag/ de lta bu'i tshul du nan
50b7(myang 'das): tan gyis shig/ de lta bur nan tan byas na/ nga rgyal yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa ltar/ bdag cag gis nga rgyal spangs nas mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs
51a1(myang 'das): su gsol lo/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dper na/ nam mkha' la 'phur ba'i bya'i rjes ni mngon du snang ba'i gnas ma mchis so/ /gang bdag ma mchis pa
51a2(myang 'das): la nan tan bgyid pa ni lta ba rnams mchis zhes bgyi ba'i gnas ma mchis so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ legs so/ /shin tu legs
51a3(myang 'das): so| |khyed rnams kyis bdag med pa'i 'du shes legs par bsgoms so/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
51a4(myang 'das): bdag cag ni bdag ma mchis pa'i 'du shes la nan tan bgyid par ma bas kyi/ de ma lags pa gzhan yang sdug bsngal bar 'du shes pa dang / stong pa dang / mi rtag pa
51a5(myang 'das): dang / bdag ma mchis par 'du shes pa la'ang nan tan bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dper na/ mi ra ro ba ni sems myos par gyur pas ri dang / chu dang / brag dang /
51a6(myang 'das): shing dang / khang khyim dang / nyi zla dang / skar ma'i bar du 'khor ba snyam bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang sdug bsngal ba dang / mi rtag pa dang / bdag ma mchis pa'i
51a7(myang 'das): 'du shes la sogs pa la nan tan mi bgyid na/ gang zag de ni 'phags pa zhes mi bgyi ste/ bag ma mchis pas 'khor bar yongs su 'khor ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de
51b1(myang 'das): bas na bdag cag ni 'du shes de dag la shin tu nan tan bgyid do/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ legs par nyon la shin tu yid la gzung
51b2(myang 'das): zhig |khyed kyis mi ra ro ba la dpe blangs pa ni tshig dang 'bru tsam shes par zad kyi/ don ni ma rtogs so/ /de la don zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ dper na/ mi ra ro bas nyi zla la sogs pa
51b3(myang 'das): mi 'khor bar 'khor bar 'du shes pa dang 'dra bar so so'i skye bo'ang de dang 'dra ste/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i ma rig pas yongs su khebs pas na phyin ci log gi sems bskyed de/ bdag
51b4(myang 'das): la bdag med par 'du shes/ rtag pa la mi rtag par 'du shes/ yongs su dag pa la yongs su ma dag par 'du shes/ bde ba la sdug bsngal bar 'du shes te/ kun nas nyon mongs
51b5(myang 'das): pas yongs su khebs pas de dang 'dra bar 'du shes mod kyi/ don khong du ma chud pas mi ra ro ba de 'khor ba'i gnas ma yin pa la 'khor bar 'du shes bskyed pa bzhin no/ /bdag
51b6(myang 'das): ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i don no/ /rtag pa ni chos kyi sku zhes bya ba'i don no/ /bde ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba'i don no/ /yongs su dag pa ni chos zhes bya ba'i don
51b7(myang 'das): yin na/ ci'i phyir dge slong khyed bdag tu 'du shes pa ni nga rgyal can yin te/ 'khor ba na 'khor ro zhes smra/ khyed smra ba ltar na bdag cag kyang mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba
52a1(myang 'das): dang | bdag med pa'i 'du shes la nan tan byed do zhes bya ba ni yang dag par don med do/ /nan tan byed pa gsum po de la yang dag pa'i don med pas de
52a2(myang 'das): ma yin pa nan tan byed pa'i chos gsum po las lhag pa ngas bshad par bya'o/ /sdug bsngal la bde bar 'dzin pa dang / bde ba la sdug bsngal du 'dzin pa ni phyin ci log gi
52a3(myang 'das): chos so/ /mi rtag pa la rtag par 'dzin pa dang / rtag pa la mi rtag par 'dzin pa ni phyin ci log gi chos so/ /bdag med pa la bdag tu 'dzin pa dang / bdag la bdag med par
52a4(myang 'das): 'dzin pa ni phyin ci log gi chos so/ /yongs su ma dag pa la dag par 'dzin pa dang / yongs su dag pa la yongs su ma dag par 'dzin pa ni phyin ci log gi chos so/ /phyin ci
52a5(myang 'das): log gi chos rnam pa bzhi po 'di ni yang dag par ji lta bur nan tan bya ba gang zag gis mi shes so/ /dge slong dag /sdug bsngal gyi chos la bde bar 'du shes skyed cig /mi
52a6(myang 'das): rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes skyed cig / bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes skyed cig /yongs su ma dag pa la dag par 'du shes skyed cig /'jig rten na'ang rtag pa dang /
52a7(myang 'das): bde ba dang / bdag dang / yongs su dag pa yod do/ /'jig rten las 'das pa la'ang rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / bdag dang / yongs su dag pa yod do/ /'jig rten gyi chos
52b1(myang 'das): ni brjod du yod la don med pa'o/ /'jig rten las 'das pa ni brjod du'ang yod la/ don yang yod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi chos ni phyin ci log bzhi dang bcas pas don
52b2(myang 'das): mi rtogs so/ /de ji lta zhe na/ 'du shes phyin ci log dang / sems phyin ci log dang / lta ba phyin ci log dang / phyin ci log gsum gyis 'jig rten pa ni bde ba la sdug bsngal du lta/
52b3(myang 'das): rtag pa la mi rtag par lta/ bdag la bdag med par lta/ yongs su dag pa la yongs su ma dag par lta ste/ phyin ci log ces bya'o/ /phyin ci log pas na 'jig rten pas ni tshig
52b4(myang 'das): tu smra ba shes kyi/ don mi shes so/ /de la don zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ bdag med pa ni 'khor ba zhes bya'o/ /bdag ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /mi rtag pa ni nyan thos
52b5(myang 'das): dang | rang sangs rgyas so/ /rtag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku'o/ /sdug bsngal ba ni mu stegs can thams cad do/ /bde ba ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /
52b6(myang 'das): yongs su ma dag pa ni 'dus byas pa'i chos so/ /yongs su dag pa ni sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag pa'i chos yin te/ de bas na phyin ci ma log
52b7(myang 'das): pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar na phyin ci ma log pas tshig tu brjod pa'ang shes la don yang shes so/ /gang zhig phyin ci log bzhi po yongs su spong bar 'dod na/ de lta bu'i tshul du
53a1(myang 'das): rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / bdag dang / yongs su dag par rig par bya'o/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
53a2(myang 'das): to| |bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ltar/ phyin ci log bzhi rtog pas rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / bdag dang / yongs su dag pa khong du chud ces gsungs na/ de bzhin
53a3(myang 'das): gshegs pa ni phyin ci log bzhi mi mnga' ste/ rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / bdag dang / yongs su dag pa thugs su chud do/ /de ltar rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / bdag dang /
53a4(myang 'das): yongs su dag pa thugs su chud na/ ci'i slad du bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa phyed kyi bar du bzhugs shing / bdag cag gi phyin ci log bzhi yongs su spong bar 'gyur
53a5(myang 'das): pa mi ston par bdag cag spangs te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs/ de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag cag gi ston
53a6(myang 'das): par gyur na/ bdag cag kyang rtse gcig pa'i sems kyis spyi bos len cing nan tan bgyid do/ /gal te de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'da' na/ bdag cag kyang
53a7(myang 'das): de ltar gdug pa can gyi lus dang lhan cig tu gnas te tshangs par spyad pa spyod/ bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring du mya ngan las 'da'o/ /de'i tshe bcom
53b1(myang 'das): ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la'ang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /khyod de skad ma zer cig /ngas ni bla na med pa'i yang dag pa'i chos thams cad kyang 'od srung chen po la gtad do/ /
53b2(myang 'das): 'od srung chen po ni khyed kyi gnas dang rten du 'gyur te/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi gnas dang rten du gyur pa bzhin/ 'od srung chen po 'di'ang khyed la
53b3(myang 'das): sogs pa thams cad kyi gnas dang rten du 'gyur ro/ /dper na/ rgyal po chen po dbang dang ldan pa yang bsrang du 'gro ba na/ yul gyi srid thams cad kyang blon po chen po la gtad
53b4(myang 'das): do| |de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de dang 'dra bar dam pa'i chos thams cad kyang 'od srung chen po la gtad do/ /khyed rnams mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes la nan
53b5(myang 'das): tan byed pa'ang yang dag pa ma yin no/ /dper na/ dbyar gyi dus su rdzing chen po'i nang na gzings kyi steng na rtse ba las rin po che bai DU R+ya chur lhung na/ de'i tshe mi mkhas pa thams
53b6(myang 'das): cad chu'i nang du zhugs nas/ gyo mo dang / rdo ba dang / rtswa dang / shing dang / gseg ma dag so so nas phyung ste/ rin po che'i bai DUR+ya rnyed snyam nas dga' bzhin du phyir byung na/
53b7(myang 'das): gdod yang dag pa ma yin par shes so/ /de'i tshe rin po che chu'i nang na yod pas rin po che'i mthus chu yongs su dang bas na/ thams cad kyis nor bu rin po che chu'i gting na
54a1(myang 'das): yod par shes te/ ji ltar steng gi nam mkha' la zla ba lta ba bzhin no/ /de'i tshe na 'khor de dag gi nang na mkhas pa thabs dang ldan pas ni/ dal gyis
54a2(myang 'das): chu'i nang du zhugs nas rin po che len to/ /dge slong khyed kyang mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / yongs su ma dag pa'i 'du shes la nan tan byed pa
54a3(myang 'das): ni| ji ltar mi mang po dag so so nas gyo mo dang / rdo ba dang / rtswa dang / shing dang / gseg ma dag phyung nas nor bu rin po che rnyed do snyam du sems pa dang 'dra'o/ /khyed rnams
54a4(myang 'das): kyang thabs la shin tu mkhas par gang nas gang du gnas kyang bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / yongs su dag par 'du shes pa la mkhas par
54a5(myang 'das): gyis shig / khyed kyis sngar chos rnam pa bzhi po'i mtshan ma tsam la nan tan byas pa ni thams cad kyang phyin ci log tu tsam la nan tan byas pa ni thams cad kyang phyin ci log tu
54a6(myang 'das): bzhin du nan tan du sgom pa ni/ ji ltar mkhas pa thabs dang ldan pa des nor bu rin po che phyung ba dang 'dra bar bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / yongs
54a7(myang 'das): su dag par 'du shes pa la nan tan bya'o/ /de nas yang dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sngar gsungs pa
54b1(myang 'das): ltar na/ chos thams cad la bdag med kyi/ khyed de lta bu'i tshul du nan tan gyis shig /de ltar nan tan byas na/ bdag tu 'du shes pa spong bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag tu 'du shes
54b2(myang 'das): pa spangs na/ nga rgyal dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /nga rgyal dang bral na mya ngan las 'da'o zhes gsungs pa'i don ji lta bu lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
54b3(myang 'das): legs so/ /shin tu legs so/ /bdag cag gi the tshom gcad pa'i phyir don 'di legs par dris so/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgyal po mi mkhas pa shes pa chung ba la sman pa'ang
54b4(myang 'das): mi mkhas pa glen pa zhig yod na/ rgyal pos ma rtogs pas sman pa de la bya dga' cher stsal to/ /sman pa glen pa de ni nad thams cad la sman du 'o ma gtong ste/ nad thog ma ci
54b5(myang 'das): las gyur pa'ang mi shes la/ sman du 'o ma gtong ba la'ang mi mkhas pas/ rlung nad dang / bad kan dang / mkhris pa'i nad thams cad la'ang sman du 'o ma gtong ste/ rgyal
54b6(myang 'das): pos ni sman pa nyid kyang ma rtogs la/ 'o ma bzang ngam ngan pa'i bye brag kyang mi phyed do/ /de la sman pa mkhas pa rig pa brgyad dang ldan pa/ nad thams cad gso ba la shin tu
54b7(myang 'das): mkhas pa/ dpyad thams cad khong du chud pa zhig yul gzhan nas 'ongs na/ de'i tshe sman pa mi mkhas pa de mkhas pa de la 'dri ba'am/ slob par mi byed kyi/ phyir nga rgyal gyi
55a1(myang 'das): sems bskyed do/ /de'i tshe sman pa mkhas pa de mi mkhas pa de la brten nas slob dpon du bzung ste/ sman dpyad gsang ba dag bslab pa'i phyir sman pa
55a2(myang 'das): glen pa de la bdag ni khyod la slob dpon du gsol gyi/ dpyad rnams bstan cing bshad du gsol/ zhes gsol pa btab na/ sman pa glen pa de mkhas pa de la 'di skad ces dam
55a3(myang 'das): 'cha'o/ /khyod ci ste lo bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyi bar du kho bo'i g.yog bya na/ dpyad thams cad kyang bstan to zhes bsgo'o/ /de nas sman pa mkhas pa des mi mkhas pa'i lung
55a4(myang 'das): bzhin du bgyi'o/ /bdag gis rngo ci thog gis khyod kyi g.yog bgyi'o zhes smras so/ /de nas sman pa glen pa de sman pa gsar pa khrid nas rgyal po'i pho brang du chas so/ /rgyal po
55a5(myang 'das): dang phrad nas/ de'i tshe sman pa gsar pa des rgyal po de la dpyad rnam pa sna tshogs dang / gzhan yang sgyu rtsal mang po'i gtam dang / yul gyi srid gzung ba dang / nad pa
55a6(myang 'das): gso ba'i thabs 'di'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ thugs su chud par gyis shig ces gtam byas so/ /de'i tshe rgyal po des de skad smras pa thos pa dang / sman pa rnying pa de mi
55a7(myang 'das): mkhas par shes nas/ yul de nas bskrad do/ /de nas kyang sman pa gsar pa de la lhag par rim gro dang bkur sti bskyed do/ /de'i tshe sman pa gsar pa de 'di snyam du rgyal
55b1(myang 'das): po 'di la bstan pa'i dus la bab bo snyam du bsams nas/ rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to /rgyal po chen po/ bdag la dgongs par mod na/ bdag gis gsol pa gcig
55b2(myang 'das): gnang bar mdzod cig / rgyal pos smras pa/ kho bo'i lag pa g.yas pa nas lus kyi yan lag thams cad kyi bar du yid bzhin du slongs shig dang / thams cad sbyin par bya'o/ /
55b3(myang 'das): sman pa des gsol pa/ 'di ltar rgyal po'i lus kyi yan lag thams cad kyang bdag la 'tshal bar gnang mod kyi/ bdag kyang thugs mi thub la mang po'ang mi gsol na/ deng slan
55b4(myang 'das): chad yul mi thams cad kyis sman pa rnying pa'i dpyad sman du 'o ma gtong ba shos bcad pa bkar gdags su gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sman de ni gdug pa dang bcas pas mang
55b5(myang 'das): du 'chi ba'i phyir ro/ /gal te sman de gtong ba yod na yan lag mgo bcad do zhes bkar btags nas/ sman 'o ma gtong ba chod pas dus ma yin par 'chi ba med de/ thams cad
55b6(myang 'das): bde zhing skyid par 'gyur gyi/ bdag gis gsol ba 'di gnang bar mdzod cig /de nas rgyal pos smras pa/ khyed gsol ba 'di shin tu phan par 'gyur ba yin te/ deng phyin
55b7(myang 'das): chad yul mi las na ba zhig yod na/ sman du 'o ma gtong du mi gnang ngo / /gal te 'o ma gtong ba zhig mod na/ yan lag gi dam pa mgo bcad do zhes bkar btags so/ /de'i tshe
56a1(myang 'das): na sman pa mkhas pa de tsha ba dang / kha ba dang / skyur ba dang / mngar ba dang / bsngal ba la sogs te/ ro rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sman sbyar te/ nang gsos na
56a2(myang 'das): gang yang ma sos pa med do/ /de nas phyis ring po ma lon par rgyal po de nad kyis btab nas sman pa de bkug ste/ 'di ltar nga ni nad kyis shin tu sdug bsngal par gyur na ji
56a3(myang 'das): ltar gso zhes smras pa dang / sman pa des rgyal po'i nad bltas na sman du 'o ma dgos pa 'dra nas/ rgyal po la gsol pa/ rgyal po'i nad thabs dang sbyar na sman du 'o ma
56a4(myang 'das): gtang 'tshal te/ bdag gis sngar sman du 'o ma gtang du mi rung zhes gsol pa brdzun du gyur te/ sman du 'o ma las bzang ba ma mchis la/ rgyal po'i nad kyang tsha ba las
56a5(myang 'das): gyur pas/ sman du 'o ma btang na bzang ngo / /rgyal pos smras pa/ sman pa khyod 'on te myos sam/ tsha ba'i nad kyis btab na nad 'di la 'o ma phan no zhes smra/ khyod kyis sngar
56a6(myang 'das): 'o ma la dug yod do zhes smras na/ da ji ltar btung / khyod kyis nga la bgam mam/ sman pa snga mas bsngags pa la dug yod do zhes byas pas sman pa gcig bskrad
56a7(myang 'das): pa'i 'og tu/ nga yang na ba la sman du 'o ma bzang ngo zhes khyod smra ba dang sbyar na/ nga'i sman pa rnying pa ni khyod pas mkhas nges so/ /de nas sman pas yang rgyal po la 'di skad
56b1(myang 'das): ces gsol to/ /rgyal po/ de skad ma gsung zhig /dper na/ srin bu shing zan gyi rjes las yi ger rung ba'ang yod de/ srin bus ni yi ge yin nam/ ma yin pa mi shes kyi/ de la
56b2(myang 'das): mkhas pa shes rab can gyis mthong na/ srin bu yi ge shes so zhes ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin to/ /rgyal po chen po/ sman pa snga ma'ang de dang 'dra ste/ nad rnams mi rtogs pas thams
56b3(myang 'das): cad la sman 'o ma gtong ba ni ji ltar srin bu'i rjes las yi ger 'gyur ba bzhin te/ sman pa snga mas ni 'o ma bzang ngan dang / rung mi rung yang mi shes so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ sman
56b4(myang 'das): pa snga mas ji lta bur mi shes/ sman pas smras pa/ sman 'o ma zhes bya ba ni gdug pa'ang lags la/ bdud rtsi'ang lags so/ /de la ji ltar na/ 'o ma de gdug pa'ang yin la/
56b5(myang 'das): bdud rtsi'ang yin zhe na/ gal te ba nyid sbang ma dang / rtswa sbyin pa dang / phub ma ma zos la/ pe'u yang shin tu dul zhing 'tsho ba'i sa'ang ri mthon po'i steng ma yin/ nags khrod
56b6(myang 'das): ma yin pa na 'tsho zhing / chu'ang 'bab chu dwangs ma las blung de/ drag tu mi gda'/ khyu mchog dang khyu gcig tu mi btso bar bag yangs su za zhing 'thung la/ 'gro ba dang sdod
56b7(myang 'das): ba'ang bag yangs su 'gyur ba'i ba'i 'o ma ni nad rnams la phan pas bdud rtsi zhes bya'o/ /de ma yin pa ni thams cad kyang gdug pa dang bcas pa zhes bya'o/ /de'i tshe na rgyal po
57a1(myang 'das): chen pos de skad ces smras pa thos nas sman pa legs so/ /shin tu legs par smras so/ /da slan chad 'o ma bzang ngan dang / rung mi rung yang shes so/ /
57a2(myang 'das): de nas sman du 'o ma btang nas nad kyang byang bar gyur te/ yul mi thams cad la da phyin chad sman du 'o ma thong zhig ces bkar btags so/ /yul mi rnams kyis de skad ces thos
57a3(myang 'das): nas thams cad gshe ste/ rgyal po chen po 'di ni yi dwags kyis brlams sam/ smyos sam ci nyes na/ bdag cag bslus te/ sman du 'o ma thong zhig ces gsung / yul mi
57a4(myang 'das): thams cad khros bzhin du rgyal po'i spyan sngar lhags so/ /de la rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/ khyed nga la ma gshe zhig /sman du 'o ma btang du rung ngam/ mi rung ba ni sman pa 'di'i
57a5(myang 'das): dpyad yin gyi/ das ni ma nyes so/ /de'i tshe rgyal po chen po dang / yul mi thams cad kyang shin tu dga' zhing mgu bar gyur nas/ sman pa de la lhag par rim gro dang bkur
57a6(myang 'das): sti bskyed de/ nad pa thams cad la sman 'o ma btang bas nad kyang byang bar gyur to/ /dge slong khyed kyang de lta bu'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
57a7(myang 'das): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten rig pa/ bla na med pa/ skyes bu 'dul zhing kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi
57b1(myang 'das): rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la de ltar rig par bya ste/ sman pa chen po lta bur 'jig rten du gshegs nas/ mu stegs can ngan par lta ba'i sman pa thams cad
57b2(myang 'das): btul nas rgyal po thams cad la nga ni sman pa'o zhes brjod de/ mu stegs can dag gdul ba'i phyir 'di skad du bdag med do/ /gang zag med/ sems can med/ 'tsho ba med/
57b3(myang 'das): shes can med/ shed bdag med/ shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / bya ba dang / byed pa po med do zhes gsungs so/ /dge slong dag /mu stegs can gyis bdag ces brjod pa ni srin
57b4(myang 'das): bu'i rjes las yi ger gyur pa'ang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la bdag med do zhes gsungs te/ de ni sems can gdul pa'i phyir/
57b5(myang 'das): dus mkhyen pa'i phyir de ltar bdag med ces gsungs pa'ang rgyu yod/ rkyen yod pas na/ bdag yod ces gsungs pa ni ji ltar sman pa mkhas pas 'o ma la sman du rung ba dang mi rung
57b6(myang 'das): ba shes pa dang 'dra ste/ byis pa ma rabs kyis bdag tu 'dzin pa lta bu ni ma yin no/ /byis pa ma rabs kyis bdag tu 'dzin pa ni mthe bo tsam zhe'am/ yungs kar tsam zhe'am/
57b7(myang 'das): rdul phra mo tsam du 'dzin to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdag ces brjod pa ni de lta bu ma yin pas chos thams cad la bdag med do zhes gsungs kyang yang dag par na bdag med pa
58a1(myang 'das): ma yin te/ bdag ces bya ba ni chos gang bden pa/ yang dag pa/ rtag pa gnas pa/ bdag por gyur pa/ mi 'gyur mi 'pho ba de ni bdag ces
58a2(myang 'das): bya ste/ ji ltar sman pa chen po de sman 'o ma la mkhas pa bzhin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de dang 'dra ste/ so so'i skye bo'i phyir chos thams cad la yang dag par bdag
58a3(myang 'das): yod do zhes gsungs kyi/ khyed la sogs pas 'khor rnam bzhi'ang de lta bu'i tshul du chos thams cad la nan tan gyis shig/ /'phags pa yongs su
58a4(myang 'das): mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po bzhi pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan yang dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dge slong dag /khyed 'dul
58a5(myang 'das): pa la ji tsam the tshom du gyur pa de dag ji dga' bar dris shig dang / ngas bstan cing bshad de khyed kyis sems rangs par bya'o/ /ngas ni chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis
58a6(myang 'das): stong pa nyid du mngon par rtogs te/ dge slong dag /de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid du rtogs par zad do snyam du mi bsam mo/ /
58a7(myang 'das): dge slong dag /'dul ba la ji tsam du the tshom du gyur pa de dag da zhu ba'i dus la bab bo/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
58b1(myang 'das): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag ni shes rab dang mi ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la zhu zhing gsol ba'i mthu ma mchis
58b2(myang 'das): so| |de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pas ting nge 'dzin yang bsam gyis mi khyab la/ ston pas bstan pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab
58b3(myang 'das): pas bdag cag ni shes rab zhan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu zhing gsol ba'i mthu ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dper bgyi na/ rgan po la brgya nyi shu lon pa/
58b4(myang 'das): rgas 'khogs pa/ rtag tu na bas rtsol ba'i mthu ma mchis pa/ nyam chung ba/ tshe'i dbang du ma gyur pa gcig la/ mi phyug po don gnyer ba'i phyir yul gzhan du mchi ba zhig
58b5(myang 'das): gser srang brgya stong du ma rgan po la gtams nas/ 'di skad du bdag gi nor bu rin po che 'di khyod la gtams kyi/ lo bcu 'am/ gal te lo nyi shu na phyir 'khor gyi/ slar byin
58b6(myang 'das): cig ces smras so/ /rgan po des rin po che de blangs nas ring po ma lon par nad kyis shi ste/ rabs kyang chad pas rin po che des ci gtams pa rnams kyang thams cad 'khyams
58b7(myang 'das): par gyur to/ /nor bdag phyir log nas slar blangs pa'i gnas ma mchis par gyur to/ /de ltar glen pa de gtams pa'i rigs sam/ mi rigs pa'i gnas mi 'tshal bas
59a1(myang 'das): yul gzhan nas slar 'khor yang rin po che kun 'khyams te slar blang ba'i gnas ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag nyan thos rnams kyang de dang
59a2(myang 'das): 'dra ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas yang dang yang nan tan du 'dul ba bsan pa ni thos nas gzungs su 'dzin cing / chos yun du gnas par bgyid mi nus pa ni/ ji ltar rgan po
59a3(myang 'das): des pha rol pos gtams pa blangs pa dang mtshungs te/ bdag cag la shes rab ma mchis pas 'dul ba rnams la gang zhu zhing 'dri ba'i cha'ang ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan
59a4(myang 'das): 'das kyis dge slong dag la bka' stsal pa/ khyed deng nga la zhus na sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du 'gyur gyi/ de bas na khyed ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig /
59a5(myang 'das): de nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dper na/ skyes bu tshad la bab pa/ lo nyi shu rtsa lnga lon pa/ shin tu lang tsho
59a6(myang 'das): ba| byad gzugs dang ldan pa/ nor rin po che gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+ya rab tu mang ba/ pha dang / ma dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / 'khor du bcas pa zhig la/
59a7(myang 'das): gal te mi zhig gis nor rin po che dag gtams te/ de la 'di skad du bdag ni don gnyer zhing yul gzhan du mchi'i/ nor rin po che 'di dag khyod la gtams kyi/ nam
59b1(myang 'das): 'khor ba na slar stsol cig ces smras so/ /de nas skyes bu des bdag gi nor dang 'dra bar shin tu bsrungs so/ /skyes bu de phyis nad kyis btab nas drung gi 'khor kun bsdus te/ 'di skad
59b2(myang 'das): du rin po che po 'di dag ni che ge mo zhig gis gtams kyi/ nam len du 'ongs pa dang slar byin cig ces bsgo'o/ /mkhas pa shes rab can ni de ltar gtams pa dang / mi gtams pa'i
59b3(myang 'das): gnas 'chal bas slar 'khor ma thag tu rin po che kun thob bo/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du chos kyi dkon mchog 'di'ang gal te/ dga' bo'am/ dge slong dag gtams
59b4(myang 'das): na yun ring por mi gnas so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'od srung chen po dang / nyan thos thams cad ni mi rtag pa ste/ ji ltar rgan po des gzhan gyis gtams pa'i nor len pa dang
59b5(myang 'das): mtshungs so/ /de bas na bla na ma mchis pa'i chos kyi dkon mchog 'di byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gtams na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'dri pa dang lan glan pa la
59b6(myang 'das): mkhas pas chos rin po che 'di yun du gnas shing bskal ba tshad med pa'i bar du shin tu rgyas par 'gyur la/ sems can la phan pa'i don du 'gyur te/ ji ltar skyes bu lang
59b7(myang 'das): 'tsho la nor rin po che gtams pa dang mtshungs so/ /de ltar bas na byang chub sems dpa' chen pos ni zhu zhing gsol ba'i mthu mchis kyi/ bdag cag sbrang bu dang 'dra ba'i shes
60a1(myang 'das): rab kyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos shin tu zab mo la zhu ba'i mthu ma mchis so/ /zhes gsol nas cang mi smra bar 'khod do/ /de nas
60a2(myang 'das): bcom ldan 'das kyis shin tu legs so/ /shin tu legs so/ /zhes bstod nas/ dge slong dag /khyed kyis zag pa med pa'i sems dang / dgra bcom pa'i sems legs
60a3(myang 'das): par thob bo/ /nga'ang de snyam du dgongs te/ rkyen rnam pa de gnyis kyis theg pa chen po 'di byang chub sems dpa' la gtams na dam pa'i chos yun du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /
60a4(myang 'das): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na 'dus pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams la bka' stsal pa/ nga'i sku tshe ni tshad dpag tu med do/ /so so
60a5(myang 'das): yang dag par shes pa'ang zad mi shes mod kyi/ khyed 'dul ba dang chos mngon pa las ci dang ci 'dod pa yid bzhin du dris shing / /ces lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du
60a6(myang 'das): bka' stsal to/ /de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grong khyer ta la zhes bya ba na gnas pa bram ze'i rigs 'od srung chen po zhes
60a7(myang 'das): bya ba rab tu gzhon pa zhig sangs rgyas kyis byin gyi brlabs kyi 'dug pa las langs nas bla gos phyogs gcig tu byas te/ lan brgya stong du mar bskor nas pus mo g.yas
60b1(myang 'das): pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te bdag gis zhus nas zhus pa'i lung bstan par bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye
60b2(myang 'das): par gnang na/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la phyogs gcig cig zhu'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od srung la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
60b3(myang 'das): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rang shing the tshom med par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub
60b4(myang 'das): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od srung gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag zhu bar gnang na bdag gi shes
60b5(myang 'das): rab ni sbrang bu lta bur gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan ni shin tu mtho bas/ gcan gzan dang / seng+ge lta bu rnam par mi shigs pa'i 'khro gyis yongs su bskor te/ de
60b6(myang 'das): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'ang rdo rje lta bu la mdog baiDUR+ya 'dra ste mi shigs pa lags la/ ye shes dang shes rab rgya mtsho lta bus yongs su bskor cing / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
60b7(myang 'das): na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la sogs pa'ang tshad med/ mtha' yas pa'i yon tan mchog dang ldan te/ spos kyi glang po che lta bu'i 'khor gyi dkyil
61a1(myang 'das): 'khor 'di'i nang na 'dre bar ga la spobs mod kyi/ 'on gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / 'khor mang po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs kyis
61a2(myang 'das): cung zad cig zhu bar 'tshal to/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ tshe ring bar ni cis 'gyur zhing / /mi 'jig rdo rje'i lus cis 'thob/ /ci yi
61a3(myang 'das): rgyu dang rkyen gang gis/ /shin tu bstan pa'i stobs kyang 'thob/ /ji ltar mdo sde 'di nyid kyis/ /mthar thug pha rol phyin par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs
61a4(myang 'das): pa gang / /sems can dag la bshad du gsol/ /ji ltar che ba nyid 'thob cing / /kun gyi rten dang gnas su 'gyur/ /dgra bcom pa nyid ma yin par/ /dgra bcom pa
61a5(myang 'das): dang mnyam pa lags/ /ji ltar lha yi bdud rnams kyis/ /bar chad bgyid pa 'tshal bar bgyi/ /bcom ldan gsung dang bdud kyi tshig/ ji ltar rtogs shing 'tshal bar
61a6(myang 'das): bgyi| / ji ltar kha lo sgyur ba dang / /dgyes bzhin don dam bden pa gsungs/ /yang dag dge dang ldan bzhin du/ /phyin ci log bzhi ston pa lags/ /ji ltar dge ba'i
61a7(myang 'das): las bgyid pa/ /drang srong chen pos bshad du gsol/ /ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /lta dka' nyid kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar rdzogs pa'i don chud cing / /
61b1(myang 'das): don gyi phyed tsam rtogs pa lags/ /ji ltar 'phags dang mthun spyod cing / /sa la sa zhes bya lta bu/ /ka ling te dang nyi zla dang / /phod dang skar chen lta bu lags/ /ji ltar sems ni ma
61b2(myang 'das): bskyed par/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhes su gdags/ /ji ltar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du/ /mi 'jigs pa yi sems thob cing / /dzam+bu chu klung gser lta bur/ /skyon dang rnam par
61b3(myang 'das): bral ba lags/ /ji ltar 'jig rten rnyog pa 'dir/ /pad+mo bzhin du mi chags 'gyur/ /ji ltar kun nas nyon mongs kyang / /kun nas nyon mongs chags mi 'gyur/ /sman pa mkhas
61b4(myang 'das): pas nad gsos pa/ /nad mi 'go ba lta bu lags/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen por ni/ /ji ltar ded dpon lta bur 'gyur/ /ji ltar 'khor ba yongs spangs pa/ /sbrul lpags rje ba lta
61b5(myang 'das): bu lags/ /ji ltar dkon mchog gsum po la/ /yid bzhin lha yi shing lta bu/ /theg pa gsum gyi rigs med na/ /ci yi slad du gsungs par gyur/ /dper na bde ba ma skyes par/
61b6(myang 'das): ji ltar bde ba myong zhes bgyi/ /ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /mi shigs pa yi 'khor yang 'thob/ /ji ltar ldongs shing 'thoms pa yi/ /'dren pa yi ni mig tu 'gyur/ /
61b7(myang 'das): ji ltar mgo mang ston pa yang / /drang srong chen pos bshad du gsol/ /ji ltar chos rnams smra ba dag /zla ba tshes pa bzhin du skye/ /ji lta bur na mthar phyin pa'i/ /mya ngan 'da' ba
62a1(myang 'das): ston pa las/ /ji ltar dpa' zhing brtson pa la/ /mi dang lha dang bdud lam ston/ /ji ltar chos kyi mtshan nyid shes/ /chos kyi bde ba myong ba lags/ /
62a2(myang 'das): ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /thams cad nad dang bral ba lags/ /ji ltar so so'i skye bo'i phyir/ /dgongs te gsungs pa ston pa lags/ /mthar phyin pa yi don
62a3(myang 'das): ni gang / /ji ltar mthar ma phyin pa lags/ /the tshom gcod pa'i phyir gsungs na/ /gcig tu nges par cis mi gsung / /ji ltar gya nom bla med pa'i/ /byang chub la ni bsnyen
62a4(myang 'das): par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyir/ /de bzhin gshegs la bdag zhu'o/ /spyod pa shin tu zab mo yi/ /dam pa dag ni bshad du gsol/ /rnam pa thams
62a5(myang 'das): cad chos kyi nang / /bde ba'i rang bzhin kun mchis na/ /drang srong chen po mchog gis su/ /rnam par phye ste bstan du gsol/ /skye bo'i rten dang gnas 'gyur ba/ /rkang
62a6(myang 'das): gnyis mchog ste sman lta bu/ /phung po rnams las zhu brtsams kyang / /'tshal ba'i shes rab ma mchis so/ /de ltar shin tu zab mo yi/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul
62a7(myang 'das): ni| |byang chub sems dpa' brtson pa yang / /shes par nus pa ma lags so/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung la shin tu legs so/ /
62b1(myang 'das): shin tu legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ma thob mod kyi/ khyod kyis shin tu zab mo'i snying po zhu zhing gsol ba 'di
62b2(myang 'das): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis 'dri ba dang tha mi dad do/ /rigs kyi bu/ sngon byang chub kyi shing drung du snying por byang chub ste mngon par sangs rgyas pa na/ de'i tshe na yang sangs
62b3(myang 'das): rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams lhags te/ nga la shin tu zab mo'i don dris pa'i tshig gi rnam grangs dang / don dang /
62b4(myang 'das): yon tan yang 'di dang 'dra ste tha mi dad do/ /gang gis 'di skad du 'dri ba ni sems can tshad med pa snyed la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don du spyod pa yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems
62b5(myang 'das): dpa' 'od srung gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag la shes rab ma mchis pas 'di lta bu shin tu zab mo'i don dri ba'i mthu ma mchis
62b6(myang 'das): so| |bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sbrang bu dag ni rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu 'phur nus pa'i mthu'am/ nam mkha'i dbyings kun tu phyin pa'i mthu ma mchis so/ /bdag
