376b3(myang 'das): khyab bo| |de bzhin gshegs pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa ni byams pa de
376b4(myang 'das): lta bu dag la nan tan byed do/ /gnyid kyi bde ba la gnas kyang rtag tu brtson 'grus rtsom pas gnyid kyis zil gyis mi non no/ /rtag tu sad mod kyi gnyid med pa'i phyir sad pa'ang med do//
376b5(myang 'das): gnyid kyi nang na lha rnams yongs su bsrung mod kyi/ sdig pa mi spyod pas na bsrung ba'ang med do/ /gnyid dang yongs su bral bas rmi lam ngan pa'am/ mi dge bar 'gyur ba gang yang med
376b6(myang 'das): do| |tshangs pa'i lhar skyes mod kyi/ dbang du gyur bas na skye ba'ang med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang byams pa la nan tan byed pa de ni de lta bu'i yon tan tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab
376b7(myang 'das): pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo sde dam pa 'di yang de lta bu'i yon tan tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no/ /sangs
377a1(myang 'das): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang de lta bu'i yon tan tshad med pa mtha' yas pa dang ldan no/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis bcom ldan 'das la
377a2(myang 'das): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ji tsam yid la bgyid pa de dag thams cad yang dag par bden pa lags la/ nyan
377a3(myang 'das): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi bden pa yang dag pa ma lags na/ ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthu stobs kyis sems can thams cad mtshungs
377a4(myang 'das): bar bde ba myong bar mi mdzad/ de ltar sems can thams cad yang dag par bde ba mi myong bas na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i sems la nan tan bgyid pa ni phan
377a5(myang 'das): pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa ni phan par mi 'gyur ba ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ sems can
377a6(myang 'das): kha cig ni nges par sdug bsngal myong ba'ang yod/ kha cig ni mi myong ba'ang yod do/ /sems can gang nges par sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba log sred can dag la ni
377a7(myang 'das): byang chub sems dpa'i byams pas phan par mi 'gyur ro/ /gang sdug bsngal myong ba ma nges pa dag la ni byang chub sems dpa'i byams pas phan par 'gyur te/ sems
377b1(myang 'das): can de dag rab tu bde ba myong bar byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi zhig rgyang ring po na seng ge dang / stag dang / spyang ki dang / srin po dang / yi dwags la sogs pa mthong na
377b2(myang 'das): rang bzhin gyis 'jigs skrag pa skye'o/ /ci ste mtshan mo g.yang sa mthong na'ang de bzhin du 'jigs pa skye'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ mi de rang bzhin gyis 'jigs pa skye ba dang 'dra bar sems
377b3(myang 'das): can gang byams pa la nan tan byed pa mthong na/ rang bzhin gyis bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ don de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la nan tan byed pa ni yang
377b4(myang 'das): dag par yid la byed pa ste/ phan par mi 'gyur ba'ang ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ ngas ni byams pa de la rnam pa tshad med pa bshad do/ /'di lta ste/ mngon par shes pa dag go /rigs
377b5(myang 'das): kyi bu| dper na/ lha sbyin gyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra la de bzhin gshegs pa bsad par bstan te/ de'i tshe nga rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms mthar gyis len par zhugs pa na
377b6(myang 'das): rgyal po ma skyes dgras nor srung ba'i bal glang myos pa btang nas nga dang slob mar bcas pa gsod du bcug go/ de'i tshe bal glang de dag gis sems can tshad med pa brgya stong
377b7(myang 'das): rdzis te bsad pas sems can shi ba de dag gi khrag gis phog pas lhag par myos par yang gyur la/ nga'i slob ma ngur smrig gyon pa'ang khrag snyam du mthong nas/ bal glang de
378a1(myang 'das): dag dor te byung ngo / /nga'i slob ma'i nang na 'dod pa dang ma bral ba thams cad ni phyogs bzhir bros te/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo 'ba' zhig ma gtogs so/ /de'i
378a2(myang 'das): tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i mi thams cad skad mthun pas ngus te/ mchi ma blags nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /kyi hud/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni med par gyur to//
378a3(myang 'das): de ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa 'di ltar nang gcig tu zhig par gyur ces smras so/ /de'i tshe na lha sbyin ngo mtshar gyi dga' ba skyes nas/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma med par gyur pa
378a4(myang 'das): ni legs so/ /deng phan chad ni yang dag pa med par gyur te/ gros legs par smon pa bzhin du grub par gyur to zhes smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i tshe na ngas nor srung ba'i
378a5(myang 'das): bal glang gdul ba'i phyir byams pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas phyag brkyang ste bstan pas sor mo lnga la seng ge lnga snang bar gyur to/ /bal glang gis
378a6(myang 'das): de mthong nas shin tu skrag pas bshang gci'ang shor te/ lus sa la brdabs nas nga'i zhabs la gus par phyag byas so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i tshe na nga'i sor mo lnga la yang
378a7(myang 'das): dag par seng ge med kyang byams pa bsgoms pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus de dag btul bar gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang nga yongs su mya ngan las 'da' kar rtswa mchog
378b1(myang 'das): gi grong khyer du gshegs pa na gyad lnga brgya tsam zhig lam ka na lam 'chos shing phyag dar dang chag chag byed do/ /lam ka pha bong gcig yod pa la gyad rnams log ste/ mthu stobs ci
378b2(myang 'das): yod pas bteg kyang dor ma nus so/ /de'i tshe na gyad rnams la thugs brtse ba'i phyir byams pa'i thugs bskyed nas/ zhabs kyi mthe bos pha bong de gnam 'phang du bor nas/ phyag gis
378b3(myang 'das): bzung ste phyag mthil g.yas par bzhag go/ bus pa tsam gyis zhib mor yang gyur la phyir yang bsdus te bsgongs par gyad rnams kyis mthong bar byas so/ /gyad de dag gi nga rgyal
378b4(myang 'das): dang dregs pa'i sems kyang zhi bar byas nas chos rnam pa sna tshogs kyang bstan te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug go/ rigs kyi bu/ de'i
378b5(myang 'das): tshe na de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par na zhabs kyi mthe bos pha bong de gnam 'phang du bor ba'am/ phyag mthil g.yas par bzhag pa'am/ zhib mor byas pa'am/ phyir
378b6(myang 'das): gong bur bsgongs pa'ang med mod kyi/ rigs kyi bu/ de'ang byams pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthu las na/ gyad rnams kyis dngos po de lta bu dag mthong bar rig par bya'o/ /rigs
378b7(myang 'das): kyi bu/ gzhan yang lho phyogs po ta la'i yul na/ grong khyer chen po shu pa la zhes bya ba na khyim bdag 'dod pa zhes bya ba sngon 'das pa'i dus na sangs rgyas tshad med pa snyed la
379a1(myang 'das): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ 'gro ba mang po'i gtso bor gyur pa zhig yod do/ /rigs kyi bu/ grong khyer chen po de na gnas pa'i mi thams cad mu stegs
379a2(myang 'das): can la phyogs te/ gcer bu pa dag gi g.yog byed do/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag de gdul ba'i phyir rgyal po'i khab nas grong khyer der gshegs par chas so/ /de'i bar
379a3(myang 'das): ni dpag tshad drug rtsa lnga zhig yod de/ de na gnas pa'i sems can dag gdul ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas te gom pas dal gyis gshegs so/ /de'i tshe
379a4(myang 'das): grong khyer shu pa la zhes bya ba na gnas pa'i gcer bu pa rnams nga 'ong ngo zhes thos nas/ de dag sems kyis 'di snyam du bsams par gyur to/ /gal te dge sbyong go'u ta ma
379a5(myang 'das): 'dir 'ongs na/ 'di na gnas pa thams cad bdag cag kyang spong zhing yo byad kyang mi ster te/ dbul phongs par gyur na/ bdag cag cis 'tshor 'gyur snyam bsams
379a6(myang 'das): nas| gcer bu pa rnams so sor kha bkram ste/ grong khyer de na gnas pa'i mi rnams la 'di skad ces bsgo'o/ /dge sbyong go'u ta ma zhes bya ba de 'dir 'ong zhes grag gi/
379a7(myang 'das): dge sbyong de ni pha dang ma'ang spangs nas gar yang rgyu zhing 'gro ste/ gang nas gang du phyin pa'i gnas de dang de dag tu lo nyes pa dang mu ge 'byung bar byad/ nad mang ba dang
379b1(myang 'das): 'chi ba mang bar byed do/ /de las thar pa'ang med do/ /dge sbyong go'u ta ma rungs pa de ni 'khor yang srin po yi dwags ma rungs pa sha stag khrid cing 'ong ngo / /de la ni pha'ang med/ ma'ang
379b2(myang 'das): med de/ dbul phongs pas ched du 'khor 'dod pa'i phyir 'ong ngo / /des ston cing 'chad pa'ang rdzun 'ba' zhig tu zad de/ gang du phyin kyang thog ma nas bde ba dang skyid pa med do zhes
379b3(myang 'das): bsgrags pas/ de dag gis de skad thos nas shin tu 'jigs skrag ste/ gcer bu pa'i rkang pa la spyi bos phyag btsal nas phyir 'di skad ces smras so/ /ston pa chen po/ bdag cag
379b4(myang 'das): gis thabs ci byas na/ dge sbyong gi'u ta ma 'dir mi 'ong bar 'gyur/ gcer bu bas smras pa/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni rang bzhin gyis nags tshal dang / chu mig dang / 'bab chu la
379b5(myang 'das): dga' ba'i rigs kyi/ grong phyin ci yod pa thams cad bcad de med par bya dgos kyi/ khyed rnams so so nas grong khyer gyi phyi rol du deng la/ skyed shing gcig kyang ma lus par
379b6(myang 'das): chod cig / chu mig dang / khron pa dang / 'bab chu kun yang mi gtsang ba dang / ngan skyugs kyis khong zhig /phyir log la grong khyer gyi sgo dam du bcad la dgra cha bshams te/
379b7(myang 'das): grong khyer bsrungs la ci nas kyang mi chud par bya'o/ /gal te gnas 'dir ma chud na khyed kyang gdod bde bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag cag kyang ci nus kyis dge sbyong go'u ta ma phyir
380a1(myang 'das): bzlog pa'i cho ga bya'o zhes smras nas de dag kyang bsgo ba bzhin du mnyan te/ shing thams cad kyang bcad/ chu'ang bskams nas dgra cha bshams te grong
380a2(myang 'das): khyer bsrung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ de'i tshe nga grong khyer der phyin pa na/ nags tshal dang / skyed shing ni gcig kyang mi snang gi/ mi mang po mtshon cha thogs te sdod pa mthong ngo / /de lta
380a3(myang 'das): bu dag mthong ba dang shin tu thugs brtse nas byams pa'i thugs bskyed pas/ nags tshal dang / skyed shing thams cad kyang phyir skyes te/ de ma yin pa gzhan yang dpag tu
380a4(myang 'das): med pa'i shing rnams skyes la/ chu mig dang / rdzing bu dang / khron pa dang / 'bab chu thams cad kyang shin tu gsal zhing dang ba ni bai DUR+ya sngon po lta bur gyur nas/ kun tu
380a5(myang 'das): gang zhing lud de/ me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis kyang yongs su khebs par gyur te/ /grong khyer de'i ngos kyi ra ba'ang bai DUR+ya mthon mthing lta bur gyur te/ grong khyer de na
380a6(myang 'das): gnas pa thams cad kyis thal byung du nga 'khor dang bcas pa'ang gsal bar mthong ngo / /grong khyer gyi sgo de'ang rang bye nas thogs par ma gyur/ mtshon cha rnams kyang me
380a7(myang 'das): tog sna tshogs su gyur te/ khyim bdag 'dod pas gtso bor byas nas mi thams cad 'khor dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags so/ /ngas de dag la
380b1(myang 'das): chos rnam pa sna tshogs bshad nas/ de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i tshe na ngas de ltar yang dag
380b2(myang 'das): par nags tshal dang / skyed shing bskyed pa'am/ chu gtsang mas chu mig dang / rdzing bu kun gang bar byas pa'am/ grong khyer gyi ra ba bai DUR+ya ra bsgyur ba'am/ de na gnas pa'i mi de
380b3(myang 'das): dag gis thal byung du mthong bar byas pa'am/ grong khyer gyi sgo rang bye ba'am/ mtshon cha rnams me tog tu bsgyur ba med mod kyi/ rigs kyi bu/ de'ang byams pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i
380b4(myang 'das): mthu las mi de dag gis dngos po de dag mthong bar gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang mnyan du yod pa na bram ze'i bu mo ba si ta zhes bya ba la bu gcig pu zhig yod de/ dpe
380b5(myang 'das): med par shin tu byams pa shing sdug pa las nad kyis btab nas shi bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe bud med de mya ngan chen pos gdungs pas myos te/ sgren mor kun tu rgyug kyang ngo mi tsha ste
380b6(myang 'das): lam gyi bzhi mdo dag tu dus nas/ bu ga re/ bu gar song zhes 'bod cing grong khyer kun tu rgyu zhing 'gro'ang ngal ba med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ bud med de sngon 'das pa'i dus kyi
380b7(myang 'das): sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa zhig yin pas/ ngas bud med de la byams pa'i thugs bskyed pas/ de'i tshe na bud med des nga mthong nas nga la bur 'du shes bskyed de/
381a1(myang 'das): de ma thag tu sems sor chud nas/ nga phang du blangs te nga la 'o byas so/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na ngas dga' bo la chos gos 'di bud med de la byin cig ces bka'
381a2(myang 'das): stsal to/ /de la chos gos byin nas chos rnam pa sna tshogs bshad de/ bud med des chos thos nas rab tu dga' mgu rangs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
381a3(myang 'das): tu sems bskyed par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i tshe na yang dag par de'i bu'ang nga ma yin la/ nga'i ma'ang de ma yin te/ bang du blangs pa'am/ 'o byas pa'ang med mod kyi/ rigs
381a4(myang 'das): kyi bu| de'ang byams pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthu las bud med des dngos po de lta bu dag mthong bar rig par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang grong khyer ser skya na dge bsnyen ma
381a5(myang 'das): mahA si na dar ta zhes bya ba sngon 'das pa'i dus na sangs rgyas tshad med pa snyed la dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu bskyed pa zhig zla ba gsum gyi bar du dge 'dun spyan drangs nas/ nad kyi
381a6(myang 'das): rkyen sman yang dbul lo/ /de'i tshe dge 'dun de dag gi nang na dge slong gcig gcig nad tshabs po ches btab nas/ sman dang gnyer te dpyad byas nas nad 'di ni sha zhig
381a7(myang 'das): gis sman bya dgos te/ sha med na srog kyang ring po mi thub bo zhes bsgo'o/ /de'i tshe dge bsnyen mas tshig de skad ces smras pa thos nas/ gser thogs te tshong dus su 'di skad
381b1(myang 'das): ces smras so/ /kye| khyod la sha 'tshong ba ci yod/ rin du sha dang mnyam pa'i gser sbyin no zhes tshong dus thog thag tu btsal kyang sha ma rnyed do/ /de nas dge bsnyen ma de gri blangs nas
381b2(myang 'das): bdag nyid kyi brla sha bcad de gtubs nas/ sha tsog tu byas/ spos rnam pa sna tshogs kyis btab ste/ dge slong nad pa de la byin no/ /dge slong des sha zos nas nad kyang sos par gyur
381b3(myang 'das): to/ /de'i tshe dge bsnyen ma de sha bcad pa'i rma red nas shin tu mi bzad pa'i sdug bsngal chen po myong bas/ 'di skad du/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas la phyag
381b4(myang 'das): 'tshal lo/ /zhes bos so/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na nga mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te de skad ces pos pa thos nas/ bud med de la shin tu thugs rje chen po skyes pas bud med des de
381b5(myang 'das): ma thag tu nga mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas de'i rma la sman gyis bskus ma thag tu snga ma kho na bzhin du sor chud par gyur to/ /de nas de la chos rnam pa sna tshogs bstan cing bshad nas
381b6(myang 'das): rab tu dga' mgu rangs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ nga ni de'i tshe na yang dag par grong khyer ser skyar yang ma
381b7(myang 'das): gshegs la/ dge bsnyen ma'i rma la sman bskus pa'ang med mod kyi/ rigs kyi bu/ de'ang byams pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs kyis dge bsnyen ma des de lta bu'i dngos po dag
382a1(myang 'das): mthong bar gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang lhas byin ma rungs pa chog mi shes te/ zas kyi tshod ma zin nas mar mang du 'thungs pas klad pa na zhing spos par
382a2(myang 'das): gyur te/ shin tu mi bzad pa'i sdug bsngal chen po myong ste/ 'di skad du/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bos so/ /de'i tshe nang grong khyer
382a3(myang 'das): ud ni na bzhugs pa las/ de skad ces bos pa'i sgra thos nas shin tu byams pa'i sems skyes pas de'i tshe lha sbyin gyis nga mthong bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe nga'ang der gshegs
382a4(myang 'das): nas phyag gis mgo dang / lto ba la byugs te/ sga'i khu ba blud nas 'thungs ma thag tu sos par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ nga de'i tshe na yang dag par lhas byin gyi drung du gshegs
382a5(myang 'das): pa'ang med la/ phyag gis mgo dang / lto ba la byugs pa'am/ sga'i khu ba'ang blud pa med mod kyi/ rigs kyi bu/ de'ang byams pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs kyis lhas
382a6(myang 'das): byin gyis dngos po de dag mthong bar rig par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang yul ko sa lar mi rgod ma rungs pa lnga brgya tsam zhig bsdongs shing chom shod byed de/ shin
382a7(myang 'das): tu gnod par gyur nas/ rgyal po sde rab tu pham byed kyis dmag gis btab ste/ thams cad bzung nas mig phyung ste/ nags tshal stug por bzhag go/ /de'i tshe na mi rgod
382b1(myang 'das): ma rungs pa de dag sngon sangs rgyas rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa sha stag ste/ de ltar mig phyung bas shin tu sdug bsngal chen po myong bar gyur pas/ 'di skad du/ sangs rgyas la
382b2(myang 'das): phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bos so/ /bdag cag la mgon dang skyabs bgyid pa ma mchis te/ dpung gnyen ma mchis so zhes cho nge btab ste ngus so/ /
382b3(myang 'das): de'i tshe na nga rgyal bu dze ta'i tshal na bzhugs pa las de skad ces 'bod pa'i sgra thos nas shin tu byams pa'i thugs bskyed de/ de'i tshe na shin tu bsil ba'i rlung gis ri bsung can las
382b4(myang 'das): sman bdud rtsi lta bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mig tu bkang nas phyir sos bzhin du mthong bar gyur to/ /mi rgod ma rungs pa de dag de ltar mig phye ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mthong
382b5(myang 'das): bar gyur to/ /de nas mi rgod ma rungs pa de dag la dam pa'i chos bstan nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug go/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i
382b6(myang 'das): tshe na yang dag par rlung du sprul pa'ang med la/ ri bsung can nas spos blangs pa'am/ mi de dag gi mdun du chos bstan pa'ang med mod kyi/ rigs kyi bu/ de'ang byams
382b7(myang 'das): pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs kyis mi rgod ma rungs pa de dag gis de lta bu'i dngos po dag mthong bar gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang rgyal tshab bai DUR+ya zhes bya ba glen zhing
383a1(myang 'das): gti mug pas rgyal po'i thabs phrogs te/ bdag nyid rgyal sar zhugs nas/ sngon gyi 'khon ma btang bas shAkya rigs kyi bu mo stong phrag bcu gnyis snyed rna ba
383a2(myang 'das): dang / sna bcad de/ rkang lag gtubs nas 'obs kyi nang du bor ro/ /de'i tshe bud med de rnams shin tu sdug bsngal bar gyur nas/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas la phyag
383a3(myang 'das): 'tshal lo/ /bdag cag la mgon dang skyabs bgyid pa ma mchis so/ /zhes smras nas skad chen po phyung ste dus so/ /bud med de rnams sngon sangs rgyas mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed
383a4(myang 'das): pa sha stag ste/ nga de'i tshe na 'od ma'i tshal na bzhugs pa las de skad ces bos pa'i sgra thos nas shin tu thugs rje skyes pas de'i tshe bu mo de dag gis nga grong khyer ser skyar gshegs
383a5(myang 'das): te rma'ang chu gtsang mas bkrus nas sman gyis bskus par mthong ste/ sdug bsngal yang de ma thag tu zhi bar gyur to/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / rkang lag thams cad bcad pa'ang phyir skyes
383a6(myang 'das): te sor chud par gyur to/ /de'i tshe na ngas dam pa'i chos kyang bstan nas thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ thams cad dge slong ma skye
383a7(myang 'das): dgu'i bdag mo chen po'i drung du rab tu byung nas bsnyen par rdzogs par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni de'i tshe na yang dag par grong khyer ser skyar gshegs
383b1(myang 'das): pa'ang med la/ rma bkrus pa'am/ sman bskus pa'am/ sdug bsngal zhi bar byas pa'ang med mod kyi/ rigs kyi bu/ de dag thams cad kyang byams pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs kyis bud
383b2(myang 'das): med de dag gis dngos po de lta bu dag mthong bar rig par bya'o/ /snying rje dang dga' ba'i sems kyang de dang 'dra'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
383b3(myang 'das): po'i byams pa'i sems yid la byed pa ni yang dag pa ste/ rdzun pa ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ tshad med pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab la/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'ang bsam gyis
383b4(myang 'das): mi khyab/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzad pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab/ theg pa chen po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di'ang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang
383b5(myang 'das): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba la nan tan byas nas bu gcig pa dang 'dra ba'i sa rab tu dga' ba la gnas par 'gyur ro/
383b6(myang 'das): rigs kyi bu/ de la ci'i phyir na sa de la rab tu dga' ba zhes kyang bya la/ bu gcig pa dang 'dra ba zhes kyang bya zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ pha mas bu bde zhing skyid par
383b7(myang 'das): mthong na sems rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de la gnas pa'ang de dang 'dra ste/ sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra
384a1(myang 'das): ba'i lta bas dge ba la nan tan byed par mthong na rab tu dga' ba'i sems skye ste/ de bas na sa de ni rab tu dga' ba zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ pha
384a2(myang 'das): mas bu na ba mthong na shin tu sdug bsngal ba'i sems skye ste/ snying rje bas mya ngan gyi sems dang cung zad kyang mi 'bral lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa de la gnas
384a3(myang 'das): pa'ang de dang 'dra ste/ so so'i skye bo dag nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis yongs su gzir ba mthong nas bu dang 'dra bar snying brtse bas mya ngan byed de/ lus kyi ba spu'i bu ga nas khrag kyang
384a4(myang 'das): zag go/ de bas na sa 'di ni bu gcig pa lta bu zhes kyang bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ dper na/ byis pa chung ngu shed ma bye ba ni bong ba dang / gseg ma dang / rus gong dang / shing bu
384a5(myang 'das): dang / btsog pa'i bag kyang lag tu blangs nas khar 'jug go/ de'i pha mas de lta bu dag mthong na gnod par 'gyur du dogs te/ lag pa g.yon pas ni 'gram pa btsir/ lag
384a6(myang 'das): pa g.yas pas ni phyir 'byin to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa de la gnas pa'ang de dang 'dra ste/ sems can dag chos kyi sku'i shed ma rdzogs pas lus
384a7(myang 'das): dang / ngag dang / yid kyi sgo nas sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos spyod par byang chub sems dpas mthong na ye shes kyi lag gis de nas 'byin te/ de dag 'khor ba na 'khor zhing
384b1(myang 'das): sdug bsngal mang po myong bar mi 'dod pas sa 'di ni bu gcig pa dang 'dra ba zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ pha ma zhig la shin tu byams pa'i bu gcig pu yod pa las
384b2(myang 'das): gal te shi bar gyur na de'i pha ma'ang lhan cig tu shi bar 'dod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang de dang 'dra ste/ gal te log sred can dag sems can dmyal
384b3(myang 'das): bar lhung na de dang lhan cig tu sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'dod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ log sred can de dag sdug bsngal myong ba'i tshe gal te skad cig tsam zhig 'gyod pa'i
384b4(myang 'das): sems skyes na ngas de la chos rnam pa sna tshogs bstan cing bshad do/ skad cig thang cig tsam gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba skye bar byed pas na sa 'di ni bu gcig pa dang 'dra ba zhes bya'o/ /rigs
384b5(myang 'das): kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ pha ma la bu gcig pu zhig yod na bu de gnyid log gam sad kyang rung ste/ 'gro'am/ sdod dam/ 'dug gam/ nyal yang rtag tu sems la dran no/
384b6(myang 'das): gal te nyes pa zhig byas na'ang tshig 'jam pos ston cing 'chos kyi/ ngan pas ni ma yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang de dang 'dra ste/ gal te so so'i
384b7(myang 'das): skye bo dag sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes kyang rung / lha dang mir skyes kyang rung ste/ dge ba'am/ sdig pa ci byed snyam rtag
385a1(myang 'das): tu sems te mi gtong ngo / /gal te sdig pa mi dge ba'i las shig byed na'ang de la zhe sdang ba'i sems mi skye ste/ de bas na sa 'di ni bu gcig pa dang 'dra ba zhes
385a2(myang 'das): bya'o| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ltar na shin tu zab pas bdag gis 'tshal
385a3(myang 'das): ba ni shin tu'ang rgya chung na 'di ji lta bur 'tshal bar bgyi/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' dag bu gcig pa lta bu'i sa la gnas bas de lta bur gyur na lta/ ci'i slad du de bzhin
385a4(myang 'das): gshegs pa sngon rgyal po mdzad pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bram ze de snyed kyi srog bcad par gyur/ gal te sa 'di thob na ni skyob cing dpung gnyen du gyur
385a5(myang 'das): pa'i rigs/ gal te ma thob na ci'i slad du sems can dmyal bar mi ltung / gal te sems can thams cad la sras sgra gcan 'dzin dang 'dra bar dgongs na/ ci'i slad du lha
385a6(myang 'das): sbyin la 'di skad du glen pa ngo tsha med pa mi'i ngar snabs za ba zhes bka' stsal pas lha sbyin gyis thos nas 'khon du bzung ste/ mi dge ba'i sems bskyed nas/ sangs rgyas kyi
385a7(myang 'das): sku la khrag phyung bar gyur/ lha sbyin gyis de lta bu'i sdig pa byas nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pas sems can dmyal bar lhung zhing bskal pa gcig gi bar du sdug bsngal
385b1(myang 'das): myong bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs pa de don dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das/ btsun pa rab 'byor lta bu
385b2(myang 'das): stong ba nyid kyi sa la gnas pa'ang grong du 'jug cing bsod snyoms len pa na sngar pha rol po la yongs su rtog go/ gal te pha rol pos brnyas sam smod pa'i sems su gyur na/ ci ste
385b3(myang 'das): shin tu bkres par gyur kyang / de dag las bsod snyoms mi len to/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa rab 'byor ni rtag tu 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di lta bu dag mngon par dran no/ /sngon
385b4(myang 'das): gyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba zhig la/ mi dge ba'i rtog pa gcig tsam bskyed pas de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis sems can dmyal ba chen por lhung ste/ sdug bsngal chen po myong bar
385b5(myang 'das): 'gyur ro/ /bdag ci ste ltogs par gyur te/ gzha' gtsang ma zos kyang bla'i/ gzhan dag bdag la brnyas shing smad pas sems can dmyal bar ltung zhing sdug bsngal myong bar
385b6(myang 'das): mi bya'o snyam bsams nas yang 'di snyam du sems so/ /ci ste sems can gang zhig bdag 'greng ba las 'phya bar gyur na/ bdag gzha' gtsang du 'dug pa las mi ldang ngo / /
385b7(myang 'das): gal te sems can gang zhig bdag 'dug pa la 'phya bar gyur na/ bdag gzha' gtsang du 'greng ba las gnas mi bskyod de/ 'gro ba dang / nyal ba'ang de dang 'dra'o/ /de ltar btsun
386a1(myang 'das): pa rab 'byor yang sems can gyi yid bsrung ba'i phyir de lta bur sems bskyed na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ gal
386a2(myang 'das): te bu gcig pa dang 'dra ba'i sa thob na/ ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas de lta bu'i gsung ma klas pa gsungs pas sems can mang po shin tu mi dge ba'i sems bskyed
386a3(myang 'das): par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di skad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la so so'i skye bo'i nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'i rgyu mdzad do zhes
386a4(myang 'das): ma rgol cig / rigs kyi bu/ gal te sbrang bu'i mchus rgya mtsho'i gting thug par zad par byed kyang srid kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni sems can gyi nyon mongs pa'i rgyur
386a5(myang 'das): 'gyur bar mi mdzad do/ rigs kyi bu/ gal te sa chen po 'di gzugs ma yin par 'gyur yang srid/ chu ni skam pa'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur yang srid/ me ni grang ba'i mtshan
386a6(myang 'das): nyid du 'gyur yang srid/ rlung ni gnas pa'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur yang srid/ dkon mchog gsum dang / sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin dang / nam mkha' ni mi rtag pa'i
386a7(myang 'das): mtshan nyid du 'gyur yang srid kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba mi mdzad do/ /rigs kyi bu/ gal te tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba
386b1(myang 'das): bzhi nyams pa dang / log sred can dang / dam pa'i chos la skur ba dag lus 'di nyid kyis stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po
386b2(myang 'das): brgyad cu 'thob kyang srid kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba mi mdzad do/ /rigs kyi bu/ gal te nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la sogs
386b3(myang 'das): pa ni rtag tu gnas shing mi 'gyur yang srid kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba mi mdzad do/ /rigs kyi bu/ gal te sa bcu la gnas
386b4(myang 'das): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba bzhi nyams shing log sped can du gyur nas dam pa'i chos la skur kyang srid kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can rnams
386b5(myang 'das): kyi nyon mongs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba mi mdzad do/ /rigs kyi bu/ gal te sems can tshad med pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin med par 'gyur yang srid/ de bzhin gshegs
386b6(myang 'das): pa'ang mthar yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur yang srid kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba mi mdzad do/ /rigs kyi bu/ gal
386b7(myang 'das): te zhags pas rlung zin pa'am/ sos lcags chod pa'am/ sen mos ri rab 'jig nus kyang srid kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i rgyur 'gyur
387a1(myang 'das): ba mi mdzad do/ /sprul gdug pa dang lhan cig tu gnas sam/ seng ge ltogs pa'i khar lag pa bcug gam/ kha Da la'i thal bas lus bkrus par gyur
387a2(myang 'das): kyang bla'i/ 'di skad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba mdzad do zhes smra bar mi bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni
387a3(myang 'das): yang dag par sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa yongs su gcod kyi/ nam du'ang nyon mongs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba mi mdzad do/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod smra ba ltar de bzhin gshegs
387a4(myang 'das): pas sngon bram ze bsad do zhes bya ba ni/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chung ngu na grog sbur tsam yang ched du mi gsod na bram ze gsod pa lta smos
387a5(myang 'das): kyang ci dgos te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni rtag tu thabs mkhas pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams la tshad med pa'i 'tsho ba'i srog sbyin par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/
387a6(myang 'das): kha zas sbyin pa ni srog sbyin pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa spyod pa na rtag tu sems can dag tshad med
387a7(myang 'das): pa'i 'tsho ba sbyin par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ srog gcod pa yongs su spangs pa'i tshul khrims bsrungs pas tshe ring bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
387b1(myang 'das): po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa spyod pa na/ sems can thams cad la 'tsho ba'i srog tshad med pa sbyin pa byin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ dag gi sgo nas nyes pa'i skyon med pas na tshe ring
387b2(myang 'das): bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa spyod pa na sems can la 'khon du 'gyur ba mi ston te/ legs pa ni gzhan la
387b3(myang 'das): bdar/ nyas pa ni bdag khas len pas rtsod pa med de/ tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/ /de bas na byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa spyod pa na sems can la tshad
387b4(myang 'das): med pa'i 'tsho ba'i srog sbyin pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ dge ba la brtson 'grus byas pas tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi
387b5(myang 'das): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa spyod pa ni rtag tu sems can dag dge ba'i chos la nan tan byed par bskul nas so so'i skye bo dag de bzhin du byas pas tshe tshad med pa thob par byas te/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa spyod pa na sems can la tshad med pa'i 'tsho ba byin pa yin no/
387b6(myang 'das): /rigs kyi bu/
387b7(myang 'das): sems sdud pa la nan tan byed pa ni tshe ring bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa spyod pa na/ sems can dag
388a1(myang 'das): mnyam par 'jog pa'i sems la nan tan byed par bskul nas sems can dag de bzhin du spyad pas tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/ /de bas na byang chub sems
388a2(myang 'das): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa spyod pa ni sems can la tshad med pa'i 'tsho ba sbyin pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ ji tsam du dge bar 'gyur
388a3(myang 'das): pa'i phyogs la bag yod par spyod pa ni tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa spyod pa na sems can rnams
388a4(myang 'das): dge ba'i chos la bag yod par spyod du bcug nas/ so so'i skye bo dag de bzhin du spyad pas de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis tshe ring bar 'gyur te/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems
388a5(myang 'das): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa spyod pa na sems can la 'tsho ba tshad med pa sbyin pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ don de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'
388a6(myang 'das): sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad la srog 'phrog pa'i chos med do/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad du nga la bram ze bsad pa'i tshe sa 'di thob bam zhes dris pa ni/
388a7(myang 'das): rigs kyi bu/ ngas de'i tshe sa de thob pas de dag la sdug par dgongs pa'i phyir de dag gi srog gi dbang po bcad pa yin gyi/ ngan sems kyis ni ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di
388b1(myang 'das): lta ste/ dper na/ bu gcig pa'i pha ma ni bu de la shin tu sdug par bsams pas gal te nyes pa chen po zhig byas te gyod la thug par gyur na/ de'i pha ma 'jigs skrag pas skrod pa'am/
388b2(myang 'das): gsod par yang byed de/ de ltar gal te skrod dam gsod kyang ngan sems ni med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dam pa'i chos bsrung zhing skyob pa'ang de dang 'dra ste/
388b3(myang 'das): gal te sems can gang zhig theg pa chen po'i chos la skur ba 'debs na/ de la gzhu ba dang / 'tshog pa dang / gnod par bya ba dang / gal te na srog gi dbang po'i bar du yang gcod
388b4(myang 'das): de| ma 'ongs pa'i dus su dge ba'i chos la nan tan byed par 'dod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis sems
388b5(myang 'das): can rnams dad pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur snyam sems te/ thabs ji bzhin du de'i las byed de/ bram ze mang po dag tshe 'phos nas mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar skyes
388b6(myang 'das): te| rnam pa gsum po 'di dag sems so/ /bdag gnas gang nas 'dir skyes snyam sems te/ sngon mi'i rgyud las skyes par shes pa dang / bdag skye ba'i gnas 'di ci yin snyam
388b7(myang 'das): bsams nas/ mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba yin par shes pa dang / las gang dang rkyen gang gis 'dir skyes par gyur snyam bsams nas/ 'di ni theg pa chen po
389a1(myang 'das): shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde la 'phya zhing skur pa dang ma dad pa'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis rgyal pos bsad nas gnas 'dir skyes par gyur to snyam sems so/ /de ltar bsams
389a2(myang 'das): nas theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde la shin tu dad pa dang gus pa'i sems skyes te/ de nas tshe 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa zil mngar rnga zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten du skyes
389a3(myang 'das): te/ tshe yang bskal pa bcu snyed tshad bar gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ don de lta bas na ngas sngon mi de dag la bskal pa bcu snyed thub par gyur pa'i 'tsho ba byin pa yin na/ de la gsod pa
389a4(myang 'das): zhes byar rung ngam/ rigs kyi bu/ gang sa rko ba dang / rtswa rnga ba dang / shing gcod pa dang / ro la mtshon gyis 'debs pa dang / rgyab pa dang / 'tshog pa dang / gzhu ba'i las byas
389a5(myang 'das): na de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ram/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
389a6(myang 'das): pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sngon bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos la chos bstan pa na/ kye/ dge
389a7(myang 'das): slong dag / mgal dum la'ang ngan sems ma skyed cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thams cad ni ngan sems bskyed pa'i rgyus sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /
389b1(myang 'das): zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung la legs so/ /shin tu legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ khyod kyis smras pa bzhin du legs par yid
389b2(myang 'das): la zungs shig / ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ ngan sems kyis sems can dmyal bar ltung zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' la ngan sems zhes bya ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir
389b3(myang 'das): zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad la chung ngu na grog sbur gyi bar du'ang byams shing brtse ba dang phan pa dang bde ba'i sems bskyed do/ /
389b4(myang 'das): de'ang ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyu dang rkyen du 'gyur ba dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i phyir ro/ /thabs mkhas pa'i shugs kyis sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /rigs
389b5(myang 'das): kyi bu/ don de lta bas na ngas de'i tshe na/ shin tu thabs mkhas pas de dag gi srog phrogs kyang ngan sems kyis ni ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ bram ze'i chos kyis gal te grog
389b6(myang 'das): sbur shing rta bcu gang ba bsad kyang sdig bar mi 'gyur/ sprang ma dang / mchu sbrang dang / byi la dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / don dang / dred dang / gcan gzan sdig pa can
389b7(myang 'das): sems can la gnod par 'gyur ba dag shing rta bcu tshang bar bsad dam/ yi dwags dang / srin po dang / grul bum dang / ka ta pu ta na dang / brjed byed dang / smyo byed dang / skem
390a1(myang 'das): byed la sogs pa yi dwags sems can la gnod par 'gyur ba dag gi srog bcad kyang rnam par smin pa'i sdig med do/ /gal te mi'i nang na ngan pa zhig
390a2(myang 'das): bsad na'ang rnam par smin pa'i sdig yod de/ bsad ma thag tu ma mthol na yi dwags kyi khams su ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te zhag gsum zan mi za bar mthol zhing bshags
390a3(myang 'das): na| sdig pa'ang lhag ma ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te slob dpon bsad dam/ pha ma dang / bud med bsad dam/ bal glang bsad na lo grangs med pa stong gi bar du
390a4(myang 'das): sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes smra'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' ni shes bzhin du bsad pa la rnam pa gsum ste/ rab dang / 'bring
390a5(myang 'das): dang / tha ma'o/ /tha ma ni/ grog sbur la sogs te/ byol song gi skye gnas thams cad do/ /de la ma gtogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' dag byol song gi lus su skye bar ston
390a6(myang 'das): pa'o| |rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam gyi dbang gis byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba ston pa'ang yod de/ de ni gsod pa'i tha ma zhes bya'o/ /
390a7(myang 'das): gsod pa tha ma'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis kyang sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / yi dwags kyi khams su ltung ste/ sdug bsngal tha ma myong bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir
390b1(myang 'das): zhe na/ byol song la'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad yod de/ de dag bsad na kha na ma tho ba'i rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur te/ de ni gsod pa tha ma zhes bya'o/ /gsod pa 'bring zhes bya ba ni/ so so'i
390b2(myang 'das): skye bo ma rabs nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i bar du ni 'bring zhes bya ste/ las de'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis kyang sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / yi dwags kyi khams su ltung
390b3(myang 'das): ste| sdug bsngal 'bring myong bar 'gyur bas 'di ni gsod pa 'bring zhes bya'o/ /gsod pa rab ces bya ba ni/ pha ma bsad pa nas/ dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
390b4(myang 'das): dpa' nges pa'i bar du bsad na rab ces bya'o/ /de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por lhung zhing sdug bsngal rab myong bar 'gyur te/ de ni bsad pa rab
390b5(myang 'das): ces bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang zhig gis log sred can bsad na bsad pa rnam pa gsum gang du'ang mi bsdu'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ bram ze de dag ni thams cad kyang log sred can zhes bya'o/ /
390b6(myang 'das): dper na/ sa rko ba dang / rtswa rnga ba dang / shing gcod pa dang / ro la ma tshon gyis btab bam/ rgyab pa dang / btsogs brdegs kyang / kha na ma tho ba'i rnam par smin par mi 'gyur la/ log sred
390b7(myang 'das): can bsad pa'ang de dang 'dra ste/ kha na ma tho ba'i rnam par smin pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bram ze de dag la'ang dad pa la sogs te dbang po lnga'i bar du med pas na de dag bsad kyang
391a1(myang 'das): sems can dmyal bar mi ltung ngo / / //'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa/ rigs kyi bu
391a2(myang 'das): khyod kyis 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa la khyod ci'i phyir lha sbyin la glen pa mchil ma za'o zhes sbyos te ci bya zhes zer ba mi rigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
391a3(myang 'das): ni ji tsam du gsung ngo cog bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ yang dag par smra ba la ni 'jig rten pa thams cad 'dod do/ /dus ma yin pa dang / chos ma yin pa dang / phan
391a4(myang 'das): pa dang bde bar mi 'gyur ba'i tshig ni nam du'ang mi gsung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ tshig kha cig ni shin tu brlang zhing rtsub la rdzun pa'ang yin te/ dus ma yin pa dang / chos ma yin pa dang /
391a5(myang 'das): gang gis thos kyang mi 'dod pa dang / phan pa dang / bde bar mi 'gyur ba na ngas nam du'ang ma gsungs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ tshig tu gsungs pa kha cig ni brlang zhing rtsub kyang yang dag pa
391a6(myang 'das): mi rdzun pa ste/ dus dang ldan pa/ chos dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba ste/ thos pas mi dga' bar 'gyur ba'ang nges par gsung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
391a7(myang 'das): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mkhyen pa dang ldan pa ste/ shin tu thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ ngas sngon dus gcig na 'brog dgon pa dang / grong dang
391b1(myang 'das): grong khyer dang / nags tshal du rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ nags tshal gyi drung na yi dwags 'brog dgon pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ zas su sha za khrag 'thung bas sems can mang po la gnod
391b2(myang 'das): par yang 'gyur la/ grong khyer de'i mi rnams la nyin re zhing re re za'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ ngas de'i tshe na yi dwags de la chos rgyas par bstan cing bshad kyang khro zhing gtum la glen te shes pa
391b3(myang 'das): med pas ngas bstan pa mi nyan to/ /de'i tshe na ngas yi dwags mthu chen po dang ldan pa zhig tu sprul nas de'i gnas kyang bsgul te mi bde bar byas so/ /de'i tshe na yi dwags de de ma thag tu
391b4(myang 'das): 'khor dang bcas te gnas nas byung nas/ nga la rgol du chas so/ /de'i tshe yi dwags des nga mthong ma thag tu dran pa stor te myos bzhin du shin tu 'jigs skrag pas/ sa la 'gyel te
391b5(myang 'das): brgyal bar gyur nas mi ro lta bur dbugs kyang chad par gyur to/ /de la ngas byams pa brtse ba'i thugs bskyed nas lag pas de'i mgo bo la byugs pas de ma thag tu phyir sangs nas
391b6(myang 'das): 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag ni deng lus dang srog kyang phyir thob ste/ lha'i rgyal po chen po 'di ni shin tu mthu che ba dang gzi brjid che ba ste/ byams pa brtse ba'i thugs dang ldan pas
391b7(myang 'das): bdag gi nyes pa'i skyabs kyang byas zhes smras so/ /de'i tshe na yi dwags de nga la dad pa'i sems bskyed pas/ ngas de'i tshe phyir yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur sprul nas gzhan
392a1(myang 'das): yang chos rnam pa sna tshogs bstan cing bshad nas/ yi dwags de srog mi gcod pa'i khrims srung du bcug go /de'i tshe na 'brog dgon pa'i grong khyer de na khyim
392a2(myang 'das): bdag gcig za ba'i res la bab nas grong gi mi rnams kyis kyang yi dwags de'i drung du bskyal lo/ /de'i tshe yi dwags des khyim bdag blangs nas nga la phul lo/ /ngas kyang blangs nas
392a3(myang 'das): khyim bdag de'i ming yang lag pa zhes btags so / de'i tshe na yi dwags des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa
392a4(myang 'das): ni sha dang khrag 'tshal ba lags na/ de srog mi gcod pa'i khrims blangs na bdag cag cis 'tsho bar bgyi/ de la ngas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /deng phyin chad nga'i nye gnas
392a5(myang 'das): nyan thos rnams gang na sangs rgyas kyi chos la nan tan byed pa'i gnas thams cad du kun gyis khyod la zas sbyin par bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis dge
392a6(myang 'das): slong rnams kyis 'brog dgon pa'i yi dwags la rtag tu gtor ma byin cig ces khrims bcas pa yin no/ /gal te gnas khang dag tu gtor ma ma byin par gyur na de dag ni
392a7(myang 'das): nga'i nye gnas ma yin te/ lha'i bdud kyi dpung dang 'khor yin par rig par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can gdul ba'i phyir de lta bu'i thabs rnam
392b1(myang 'das): pa sna tshogs ston te/ ched du de dag 'jigs par byed pa ni ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ ngas sngon dbyug pa thogs te/ yi dwags chos srung ba zhes bya ba la brdegs so/ /yang dus gcig
392b2(myang 'das): na yi dwags lug mgo zhes bya ba ri ka nas phul te rbab tu btang ngo / /gzhan yang shing ka nas yi dwags spre'u zhes bya ba g.yang du btang ba dang / bal glang nor srung ba zhes bya ba seng
392b3(myang 'das): ge lnga mthong bar byas pa dang / rdo rje'i lus su sprul nas mu stegs can kun tu smra ba 'jigs par byas pa dang / seng ldeng gi phur bu yi dwags spu can la btsugs pa dang / de la sogs
392b4(myang 'das): pa byas kyang yi dwags de dag la gnod par ma gyur te/ de dag la dam pa'i chos la gnas par bya ba'i phyir thabs rnam pa sna tshogs ston to/ /rigs kyi bu/ ngas de'i tshe na yang
392b5(myang 'das): dag par lha sbyin la spyos pa'ang med la/ lha sbyin nyid kyang glen pa'ang ma yin/ mi'i mchil ma za ba'ang ma yin/ ngan song du skye bar yang mi 'gyur/ mtshams med pa'i sems can
392b6(myang 'das): dmyal bar bskal pa gcig gi bar du sdug bsngal myong ba'ang ma yin/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas pa'am/ sangs rgyas kyi sku la khrag phyung ba'ang ma yin/ rtsa ba bzhi nyams pa'ang
392b7(myang 'das): ma yin/ dam pa'i chos la skur ba dang / theg pa chen po'i mdo sde la skur pa'ang ma yin/ log sred can yang ma yin/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyang ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/
393a1(myang 'das): lha sbyin zhes bya ba ni yang dag par na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas nyag gcig gis mkhyen cing gzigs par zad do/ /
393a2(myang 'das): rigs kyi bu/ de bas na khyod kyis 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas ci'i phyir lha sbyin la smod pa dang / gshe ba dang / spyo ba mdzad ces ma 'dri zhig /khyod kyis ni sangs rgyas rnams
393a3(myang 'das): kyi spyod yul la de ltar the tshom bskyed pa'i mi rigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis yang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ dper na/ bu ram shing ni yang dang yang
393a4(myang 'das): bskol na ro rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba dang 'dra bar bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das las yang dang yang thos pas chos kyi ro rnam pa mang du thob pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ 'byung ba'i ro
393a5(myang 'das): dang / 'dod pa spong ba'i ro dang / zhi ba'i ro dang / byang chub kyi ro rnams so/ /yang bcom ldan 'das/ dper na/ gser yang dag pa ni yang dang yang bzhu ste brdungs na gser
393a6(myang 'das): btso mar 'gyur te/ shin tu gsal ba dang / mnyen pa dang / shin tu 'od gsal ba dang / rin thang skye bar 'gyur te/ lha dang mi'i rin po cher 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das
393a7(myang 'das): de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de dang 'dra ste/ yang dang yang zhu zhing dris na shin tu zab mo'i don thos pa dang mthong bar 'gyur bas zab mo la rnal 'byor pa rnams gzungs su
393b1(myang 'das): 'dzin cing nan tan byed pa dang / skye bo tshad med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / de'i 'og tu lha dang mi la sogs pas bsti
393b2(myang 'das): stang dang / bkur stir mchod par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung la legs so/ /legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'od srung / byang chub
393b3(myang 'das): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can la phan pa dang bde bar 'dod pa'i phyir shin tu zab mo'i don 'di dris pa legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ don de lta bas na/ ngas kyang
393b4(myang 'das): khyod kyis bsams pa bzhin du theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa zab mo'i don bstan pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ rab tu dga' ba bu gcig pa dang 'dra ba'i sa bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems
393b5(myang 'das): dpa' 'od srung gis yang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' dag byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba la nan tan byas pas bu gcig pa dang
393b6(myang 'das): 'dra ba'i sa thob par 'gyur na/ btang snyoms kyi sems la nan tan bgyid pa na sa gang dag thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs so/ /shin tu legs
393b7(myang 'das): so| |rigs kyi bu khyod ni shin tu dus la mkhas pas ngas kyang bshad par dgongs pa las khyod kyis zhus pa legs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po btang
394a1(myang 'das): snyoms kyi sems la nan tan byed pa na/ rab 'byor ltar stong pa nyid kyi mnyam pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'
394a2(myang 'das): sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid kyi mnyam pa'i sa la gnas pa na/ pha ma dang / phu nu dang / sring mo dang / bu dang / gnyen bshes dang / byams sdang du mi dmigs pa nas/
394a3(myang 'das): phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / sems can dang / 'tsho ba'i bar du mi dmigs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar nam mkha' la pha ma dang / phu nu dang / chung ma dang / bu
394a4(myang 'das): med pa nas/ sems can dang / 'tsho ba'i bar du med pa dang 'dra bar chos thams cad kyang pha ma nas/ 'tsho ba'i bar du med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
394a5(myang 'das): dpa' chen po'ang chos thams cad la sems mnyam par lta ba ni ji ltar nam mkha' dang 'dra'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid kyi chos la nan tan byed pa la shin tu mkhas
394a6(myang 'das): pa'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis yang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ de la stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/
394a7(myang 'das): stong pa nyid ces bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /
394b1(myang 'das): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / dmigs su med pa'i stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa'i stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / chen po
394b2(myang 'das): stong pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta bur nang gi stong pa la yongs su rtog ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi chos stong pa nyid du
394b3(myang 'das): rtog go / nang gi chos stong pa nyid ni/ 'di lta ste/ pha ma dang / byams sdang dang / sems can dang / 'tsho ba dang / rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / bdag dang / yongs su dag pa'ang
394b4(myang 'das): med| de bzhin gshegs pa dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / rdzas kyi dngos po'ang med do/ /de ltar nang gi chos la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yod mod kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi rang
394b5(myang 'das): bzhin de ni nang na'ang ma yin/ phyi rol na'ang ma yin no/ /de ji lta zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni rtag pa/ gnas pa/ mi 'gyur mi 'pho ba'i phyir ro/ /de dag ni byang chub
394b6(myang 'das): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi stong pa nyid la yongs su rtog pa zhes bya'o/ /phyi rol gyi stong pa nyid kyang de dang 'dra ste/ nang gi chos cung zad kyang med pa'o/ /phyi nang gi
394b7(myang 'das): stong pa'ang de dang 'dra'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni stong pa gnyis po 'di la mi
395a1(myang 'das): gnas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar rtag pa dang / bdag dang / bdag dang /yongs su dag pa dang / chos rnam pa bzhi po 'di dag ni stong pa nyid ces mi bya
395a2(myang 'das): ste| phyi nang gnyis ka stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni ji tsam du 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/ /'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang /
395a3(myang 'das): phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / bdag dang / yongs su dag pa stong pa nyid dang / sems can dang / 'tsho ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
395a4(myang 'das): pa dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / don dam pa stong pa ste/ de la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin 'dus byas kyi chos ma yin te/ de bas na sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni 'dus byas
395a5(myang 'das): kyi chos kyi stong pa nyid ma yin pas 'dus byas kyi stong pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas pa'i stong pa la yongs
395a6(myang 'das): su rtog pa zhe na/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos de ni thams cad kyang stong pa nyid do/ /'di lta ste/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yongs su ma dag pa dang / bdag med pa dang / phung
395a7(myang 'das): po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / sems can dang / 'tsho ba'i mtshan nyid dang / 'dus byas dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / nang gi chos dang / phyi rol gyi chos so/ /
395b1(myang 'das): 'dus ma byas pa'i chos las/ sangs rgyas la sogs te/ chos rnam pa bzhi po 'di dag ni 'dus byas kyang ma yin la/ 'dus ma byas pa'i mtshan nyid kyang ma yin te/ dge ba'i phyir
395b2(myang 'das): na 'dus ma byas pa nyid ma yin no/ /rtag pa dang gnas pa'i phyir 'dus byas pa ma yin te/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' 'dus ma byas pa'i stong pa la yongs su rtog pa zhes
395b3(myang 'das): bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thog ma med pa'i stong pa nyid la yongs su rtog pa zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'khor ba la mtha' med par
395b4(myang 'das): mthong bas thams cad kyang stong pa nyid dang rab tu zhi ba'o/ /'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid ces bya ba ni rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / bdag dang / yongs su dag pa ste/ thams cad stong
395b5(myang 'das): pa nyid kyis zhi ba/ 'gyur ba dang 'pho ba med pa/ sems can dang / 'tsho ba dang / dkon mchog gsum dang / sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin dang / 'dus ma byas pa'i chos kyang
395b6(myang 'das): med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' thog ma med pa'i stong pa nyid la yongs su rtog pa zhes bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs su
395b7(myang 'das): med pa'i stong pa nyid la yongs su rtog pa zhe na/ dper na/ mi zhig bu med pas khyim stong ngo zhes mthar byams pa dang sdang ba med par rtog pa dang / glen pa gti mug can
396a1(myang 'das): dag phyogs tsam stong ngo zhes smra ba dang / dbul po ngan pa dag thams cad stong pa'o zhes kha cig ni stong pa nyid du smra/ kha cig ni stong pa ma yin no zhes
396a2(myang 'das): smra ba lta bu ma yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' de ltar yongs su rtog pa na mi dbul po dang 'dra bar thams cad stong pa nyid du rtog ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
396a3(myang 'das): dpa' chen po dmigs su med pa'i stong pa nyid la yongs su rtog pa zhes bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don dam pa'i stong pa nyid la rtog
396a4(myang 'das): pa zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos don dam pa stong pa nyid la yongs su rtog pa'i tshe mig gi dbang po skye ba na gang nas kyang ma 'ongs
396a5(myang 'das): la| tha ma 'gags pa'i dus na'ang song ba med do/ /thog ma nas med la yod pa dang / yod nas kyang phyir med par 'gyur te/ de ltar yang dag pa nyid kyi rjes bcad na mig
396a6(myang 'das): kyang med/ bdag po'ang med de/ ji ltar mig la rang bzhin med pa dang 'dra bar chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra'o/ /chos gang la sogs pa la don dam pa'i stong pa zhes
396a7(myang 'das): bya zhe na/ las kyang yod/ rnam par smin pa'ang yod bzhin du byed pa yod par mi mthong ste/ stong pa'i chos 'di dag ni don dam pa'i stong pa zhes bya ste/ de ltar na byang
396b1(myang 'das): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don dam pa'i stong pa nyid la rtog pa zhes bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid kyi stong pa
396b2(myang 'das): la rtog pa zhe na/ stong pa nyid kyi stong pa zhes bya ba ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas la sogs pas myong bar 'gyur ba'i gnas yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ yod pa'ang ma yin la/ /
396b3(myang 'das): med pa'ang ma yin pa ni stong pa nyid kyi stong pa zhes bya'o/ /yin pa'ang ma yin la/ ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa ni stong pa nyid kyi stong pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ sa bcu la gnas pa'i
396b4(myang 'das): byang chub sems dpa' yang de la phyogs cung zad rdul gyi cha shas tsam rtog par 'gyur ba yin na gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar stong pa nyid kyi stong pa ni nyan
396b5(myang 'das): thos kyi stong pa nyid kyi stong pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang thun mong du 'gyur ba ma yin te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi stong pa la yongs su rtog pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/
396b6(myang 'das): de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa chen po la yongs su rtog pa zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ stong pa chen po zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
396b7(myang 'das): rol tu phyin pa ste stong pa chen po zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa 'di la gnas pa na stong pa nyid kyi sgo thob pas nam mkha' lta bur
397a1(myang 'das): mnyam pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ ngas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir 'di lta bu la sogs pa stong pa nyid kyi don bstan pa
397a2(myang 'das): na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po klung gang+gA bcu'i bye ma snyed nam mkha' ltar mnyam pa'i sa la gnas par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'
397a3(myang 'das): sems dpa' chen po dag sa de la gnas nas chos thams cad la thogs pa med de/ gzung ba'ang med/ mos bar 'gyur ba'ang med de/ don de lta bas na nam mkha' ltar
397a4(myang 'das): mnyam pa'i sa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni gzugs yid du 'ong ba la chags par yang mi byed/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs la zhe
397a5(myang 'das): sdang yang mi skyed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa 'di la gnas pa'ang de dang 'dra ste/ gzugs bzang po dang / ngan pa la 'dod pa'am/ zhe sdang ba'i sems
397a6(myang 'das): med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni rgya che la yangs pas zla med de/ chos thams cad shong pa dang 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
397a7(myang 'das): chen po'ang sa de la gnas na de dang 'dra bar shin tu rgya che ba dang / bla med pa dang / chos thams cad shong ba yin no/ /don de lta bas na nam mkha' ltar mnyam pa'i sa zhes
397b1(myang 'das): bya'o| |rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa 'di la gnas na chos thams cad mthong ba dang rtogs par 'gyur te/ gal te spyod dam/ dmigs sam/ de'i
397b2(myang 'das): rang bzhin dang / mtshan nyid dang / rgyu dang / rkyen dang / sems can gyi sems dang / dbang po dang / bsam gtan dang / theg pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / tshul khrims srung
397b3(myang 'das): ba dang / sbyin pa la spyod pa la sogs pa chos thams cad rtogs shing mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa de la gnas
397b4(myang 'das): na shes bzhin du mi mthong ngo / /gang dag shes she na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag smyung bar byed pa'i chos dang / chur mchong ba dang / mer mchong ba dang / brag las mchong ba dang / rkang pa
397b5(myang 'das): ya cig gis 'greng ba dang / tsha ba lngas bsreg pa dang / thal khung dang / sa dang / tsher phung dang / lo ma dang / rtswa dang / lci ba'i steng na nyal ba dang / gos rtsub po gso ras gyon pa
397b6(myang 'das): dang / dur khrod dang / phyag dar khrod du bor ba'i bar bur gyon pa dang / kham pa la gyon pa dang / sha ba'i phags pa gyon pa dang / shing shun dang / rtswa gyon pa dang / rtswa dang 'bras bu za ba
397b7(myang 'das): dang / pad+mo'i rtsa ba dang / snum gyi zhag dang / ba lang gi lci ba dang / rtsa ba dang 'bras bu za ba dang / gal te slong zhing za na'ang / khyim bdag gcig las lhag par mi slong ste/ ci
398a1(myang 'das): ste med byas na/ nga thal byung du 'gro ste/ phyir bos kyang 'ong mu mi btub pa dang / lan tshwa dang / sha dang / ba'i 'o ma las gyur pa'i ro rnam pa lnga myong
398a2(myang 'das): bar mi byed pa dang / rtag tu phub ma za zhing chu tshan 'thung ba dang / ba lang gi dka' thub dang / khyi dang bya dang phag gi dka' thub len pa dang / lus la thal ba skud pa dang /
398a3(myang 'das): skra skyed pas mtshan mar 'dzin pa dang / lug gis lha rjed cing de'i 'og tu gsod pa dang / zla ba bzhi mi rjed pa dang / zhag bdun rlung za ba dang / me tog rnam pa brgya stong
398a4(myang 'das): gis lha rnams la mchod de/ de'i rkyen gyis 'dod pa thams cad 'grub bo zhes zer ba dang / de la sogs pa chos 'di dag ni bla na med pa rnam par thar pa'i rgyur 'gyur
398a5(myang 'das): ba'i gnas med do/ /de dag ni shes par bya ba zhes bya'o/ /de la mi mthong ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag gcig tsam yang chos de dag
398a6(myang 'das): byas pas yang dag par rnam par thar pa ma mthong bas na mi mthong ba zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes bzhin
398a7(myang 'das): du mthong ba'ang yod do/ /de la mthong ba gang zhe na/ sems can dag log par 'gro ba'i chos de dag byas na gdon mi za bar sems can dmyal bar ltung bar mthong
398b1(myang 'das): ste| de ni mthong ba zhes bya'o/ /de la shes pa gang zhe na/ sems can de dag sems can dmyal ba de las thar nas mir skyes te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nas pha
398b2(myang 'das): rol tu phyin pa gzhan gyi bar du rdzogs par spyod na de dag gdon mi za bar yang dag pa'i rnam par grol ba thob par shes te/ de ni shes pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang
398b3(myang 'das): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mthong ba dang shes pa yod do/ /de la mthong ba gang zhe na/ rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang bde ba dang / yongs
398b4(myang 'das): su dag pa dang yongs su ma dag pa dang / bdag dang bdag med pa mthong ba ni mthong ba zhes bya'o/ /de la shes pa gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni mthar mya ngan
398b5(myang 'das): las 'da' bar gshegs pa ma yin par shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku ni rdo rje ste/ mi 'jig pa/ nyon mongs pa las grub pa ma yin pa/ btsog pa dang /
398b6(myang 'das): mnam pa dang / rul ba dang / myags pa'i sku ma yin par shes so/ /gzhan yang sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yod par shes pa ste/ de ni shes pa
398b7(myang 'das): zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes pa dang / mthong ba yod do/ /de la shes pa ni sems can gang dag dad pa'i sems
399a1(myang 'das): dang ldan pa shes so/ /sems can gang dag ni theg pa chen po tshol bar byed/ gang zag gang ni 'khor ba'i rjes su 'brang bar byed/ gang zag gang ni 'khor ba
399a2(myang 'das): las zlog par byed/ gang zag gang ni yang dag pa gnas par byed/ sems can gang dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rab tu shes so/ /'khor ba ni byin pa ma rabs so/ /'khor ba las zlog
399a3(myang 'das): pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa nas/ rang sangs rgyas kyi bar du thob pa'o/ /yang dag pa la gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams so/ /pha rol tu phyin pa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
399a4(myang 'das): sangs rgyas yin te/ de dag ni shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la mthong ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo sde la
399a5(myang 'das): gnas nas tshangs par spyod pa'i sems dang / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i 'phrul gyi mig gis so so'i skye bo dag lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi sgo nas mi dge ba gsum gyi
399a6(myang 'das): las byas pas sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / yi dwags kyi khams su skye ba mthong ba dang / so so'i skye bo dge ba'i las la nan tan byed pa dag ni
399a7(myang 'das): tshe 'phos nas mtho ris kyi lha dang / mir skye ba mthong ba dang / de la sems can kha cig ni mun pa nas mun par 'gro ba dang / sems can kha cig ni mun pa nas snang bar 'gro/
399b1(myang 'das): pa dang / sems can kha cig ni snang ba nas mun par 'gro ba dang / sems can kha cig ni snang ba nas snang bar 'gro ba'ang mthong ste/ de ni mthong ba zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan
399b2(myang 'das): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mthong ba dang / sems pa yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos so so'i skye bo kha cig lus la nan tan byas/
399b3(myang 'das): tshul khrims la nan tan byas/ sems la nan tan byas/ shes rab la nan tan byas kyang / gang zag de tshe 'di nyid la sdig pa'i las rnam par smin par 'gyur ba dang / 'dod chags
399b4(myang 'das): dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi rkyen gyis gdon mi za bar sems can dmyal ba'i las rnam par smin par 'gyur ba dang / gang zag dag lus la nan tan byas/ tshul khrims
399b5(myang 'das): dang / sems dang / shes rab la nan tan byas pas tshe 'di la yang ba tsam myong nas sems can dmyal bar mi ltung ba'ang shes so/ /de la las gang dang / ni 'phral du rnam par
399b6(myang 'das): smin par 'gyur zhe na/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i las ci yod pa mthol zhing bshags la/ bshags pa'i 'og tu phyis mi byed pa dang / 'dzem pa dang / ngo tsha ba dang ldan pa'i phyir/
399b7(myang 'das): dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa byed pa'i phyir/ bdag gis bdag la gnong bskur ba'i phyir/ gang zag de ni dge ba'i las de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis sems can dmyal bar
400a1(myang 'das): mi ltung ste/ tshe 'di la myong ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ klad pa na ba dang / mig na ba dang / lto na ba dang / rgyab na ba dang / mi snyan pa dang / 'chi bar 'gyur ba dang /
400a2(myang 'das): gshe ba dang / spyo ba dang / brgyad pa dang / bskyed pa dang / gzhu ba dang / rdeg pa dang / bzung ba dang / bkres pa dang / skom pas sdug bsngal te/ de dag la sogs pa tshe 'di la'ang
400a3(myang 'das): myong bar shes pa ni shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la mthong ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag kha cig lus la nan tan mi byed/ tshul khrims dang / sems
400a4(myang 'das): dang / shes rab la nan tan mi byed kyang sdig pa'i las chung du byed na de'i las ni tshe 'di la 'phral du myong bar mthong ngo / /gang zag des sdig pa chung du byas la 'chags shing
400a5(myang 'das): mthol bar yang mi byed/ bdag gis bdag la gnong bskur bar mi byed/ 'dzem pa dang / ngo tsha bar yang mi byed/ 'jigs pa'am/ skrag par yang mi byed na de las 'phel
400a6(myang 'das): zhing skye bar 'gyur te/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar mthong ste/ de ni mthong ba zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang shes la mi mthong ba'ang yod do/ /de la shes pa ni sems can thams
400a7(myang 'das): cad la sangs rgyas kyis rang bzhin yod par ni shes la/ nyon mongs pas zil gyis mnan te bsgribs nas mi mthong bas na/ de ni shes la mi mthong ba zhes bya'o/ /gzhan
400b1(myang 'das): yang shes la cung zad mthong ba yod do/ /sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ni sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yod par shes
400b2(myang 'das): kyang gsal bar mi mthong ba ni zla ba nyin mo mi gsal ba dang 'dra'o/ /gzhan yang mthong yang mthong la shes kyang shes pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so/ /de ni gzigs pa dang /
400b3(myang 'das): mkhyen pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang mthong ba dang shes pa dang / mi mthong ba dang mi shes pa yod do/ /de la mthong ba dang shes pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi yi ge dang / skad dang /
400b4(myang 'das): po dang / mo dang / theg pa dang / bum pa dang / khang pa dang / grong khyer dang / zas dang / gos dang / ri dang / chu dang / rab dag sems can gyi tshe'i tshad ni mthong ba dang shes pa
400b5(myang 'das): zhes bya'o/ /de la mi mthong ba dang mi shes pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyis dgongs te gsungs pa'i tshig dang / pho mo med pa nas ra ba'i bar du med pa ni mi mthong ba dang mi shes
400b6(myang 'das): pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang shes la mi mthong ba yod de/ shes pa ni sbyin pa'i gnas dang / mchod pa'i gnas shes pa dang / len pa'i gnas shes pa dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu
400b7(myang 'das): shes pa ste/ de ni shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la mi mthong ba ni sbyin pa'i gnas dang / mchod pa'i gnas dang / len pa'i gnas mi mthong / rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam par smin pa mi mthong ba ste/
401a1(myang 'das): de ni mi mthong ba zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa brgyad po shes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan rnam pa lngas shes
401a2(myang 'das): pa zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
401a3(myang 'das): de ltar rtogs shing 'tshal bar gyur na phan pa ji lta bu dag thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar
401a4(myang 'das): rtogs shing shes na so so yang dag par shes pa bzhi thob par 'gyur ro/ /'di lta ste/ chos so so yang dag par shes pa dang / don so so yang dag par shes pa dang / tshig so so
401a5(myang 'das): yang dag par shes pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par shes pa'o/ /de la chos so so yang dag par shes pa ni/ chos thams cad dang chos kyi mtshan nyid shes pa'o/ /don
401a6(myang 'das): so so yang dag pa shes pa ni/ chos thams cad kyi don du btags pa thams cad shes pa ste/ chos kyi rjes su ming dang tshig tu gdags pa las don du 'gyur ba thams cad
401a7(myang 'das): do| |tshig so so yang dag par shes pa ni/ yi ge'i gtsug lag dang / sgra skad kyi gtsug lag dang / rnam par rig byed kyi gtsug lag dang / 'jig rten pa'i gtsug lag
401b1(myang 'das): rnams so/ /spobs pa so so yang dag par shes pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji tsam tshig lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji tsam tshig
401b2(myang 'das): mi zlog pa/ 'jigs pa med cing zil gyis mi non pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpas de ltar mthong zhing shes pa tsam gyis so so yang dag par shes pa bzhi thob
401b3(myang 'das): par 'gyur ba zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang chos so so yang dag par shes pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang
401b4(myang 'das): chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su shes pa'o/ /don so so yang dag par shes pa ni/ theg pa la rnam pa gsum yod mod kyi/ gcig tu 'du bar shes pa
401b5(myang 'das): la so so tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /tshig so so yang dag par shes pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gcig la'ang ming rnam pa sna tshogs su
401b6(myang 'das): btags nas bskal pa tshad med pa'i bar du bshad kyang mi rdzogs kyi/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis ni de ltar bshad nus pa'i gnas med do/ /spobs pa so so yang dag
401b7(myang 'das): par shes pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bskal pa tshad med pa'i bar du sems can thams cad la chos rnams ston pa ni ming dang don rnam pa tha dad pa
402a1(myang 'das): sna tshogs bshad kyang zad pa'i mtha' med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang chos so so yang dag par shes pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
402a2(myang 'das): chen pos de ltar chos kun shes kyang de la chags pa med do/ /don so so yang dag par shes pa ni/ don rnams shes kyang de la mi chags so/ /tshig so so yang dag par shes
402a3(myang 'das): pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ming dang tshig rnams shes kyang de la chags pa med do/ /spobs pa so so yang dag par shes pa ni/ byang chub sems
402a4(myang 'das): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar bstan cing bshad pa ni mchog yin par shes kyang de la mi chags pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ gal te chags par gyur na
402a5(myang 'das): byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis bcom ldan 'das la yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te ma chags na chos 'tshal
402a6(myang 'das): bar mi 'gyur/ gang chos 'tshal ba ni chags pa ste/ gang mi chags par 'tshal ba ni ci'ang 'tshal ba ma mchis pa lags na/ ci'i slad du de bzhin du gshegs pas chos
402a7(myang 'das): 'tshal ba la ma chags pa'o zhes gsungs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ ji tsam du chags pa ni thogs pa med pa ma yin gyi/ chags pa med pa la
402b1(myang 'das): thogs pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'dra ste/ chags pa yod na thogs pa med pa ma yin no/ /gal te thogs pa ma yin na byang chub sems
402b2(myang 'das): dpa' zhes mi bya ste/ de ni byis pa ma rabs yin par rig par bya'o/ /ci'i phyir chags pa de la byis pa ma rabs zhes bya zhe na/ byis pa ma rabs thams cad ni gzugs la chags pa
402b3(myang 'das): nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du chags so/ /gzugs la chags pas 'dod chags pa'i sems skye'o/ /'dod chags pa'i sems bskyed pas gzugs kyis rnam par bcings pa nas
402b4(myang 'das): rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par bcings so/ /de ltar 'ching bas rnam par bcings pas na skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / zlos pa'i mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don
402b5(myang 'das): pa'i sdug bsngal chen po dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad las thar bar ma gyur to/ /de bas na gang chags pa ni byis pa ma rabs zhes bya ste/ don de lta bas na byis pa ma rabs thams
402b6(myang 'das): cad ni so so yang dag par shes pa bzhi med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bskal pa tshad med/ grangs med pa'i bar du chos rnams shes shing
402b7(myang 'das): mthong bar gyur to/ /de ltar shes shing mthong bas na don yang shes par gyur to/ /de ltar chos kyi mtshan nyid shes shing don shes pas na gzugs rnams la chags pa mi skyed pa
403a1(myang 'das): nas| rnam par shes pa'i bar du'ang de dang 'dra'o/ /de ltar ma chags pas na byang chub sems dpa' gzugs la'ang chags pa'i sems mi skyed pa nas/ rnam
403a2(myang 'das): par shes pa'i bar du chags pa'i sems mi skyed do/ /de ltar chags pa med pas na gzugs kyis rnam par ma bcings pa nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du ma bcings pa'o/ /de
403a3(myang 'das): ltar rnam par shes pa ma bcings pas na/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / zlos pa'i mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal chen po dang / nyon mongs
403a4(myang 'das): pa thams cad las rnam par thar par gyur to/ /don de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ni so so yang dag par shes pa bzhi thob pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i rgyu de'i
403a5(myang 'das): rkyen gyis nga'i nye gnas rnams la mdo sde bcu gnyis las kyang chags pas bcings pa ni bdud kyis bcings pa zhes bya'o/ /gang ma chags pa de ni bdud kyis bcings pa
403a6(myang 'das): las rnam par thar pa zhes bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'jig rten na gang nyes pa byed pa de ni rgyal pos rnam par bcings par 'gyur ro/ /gang nyes pa med pa de ni rgyal pos
403a7(myang 'das): kyang mi 'ching ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang de dang 'dra ste/ gang chags pas bcings pa ni bdud kyis bcings pa zhes bya'o/ /gang chags pas
403b1(myang 'das): ma bcings pa de ni bdud kyis ma bcings pa zhes bya'o/ /de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ni chags pa med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang chos so so yang dag par
403b2(myang 'das): shes pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yi ge'i gzungs la shin tu mkhas pas brjed par mi 'gyur te/ gzungs zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ sa dang ri lta bu'am/ mig
403b3(myang 'das): dang sprin lta bu'am/ mi dang ma lta bu ste/ chos thams cad kyang de 'dra'o/ /don so so yang dag par shes pa ni/ byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad kyi ming dang tshig shes kyang don mi
403b4(myang 'das): shes so/ /don so so yang dag par shes pa thob pa ni don rnams kyang shes so/ /ji ltar na don shes pa yin zhe na /de ni sa lta bu 'dzin pa ste/ dper na/ sas ni sems can
403b5(myang 'das): dang sems can ma yin pa thams cad 'dzin te/ de bas nas lta bur 'dzin pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ ri lta bur 'dzin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
403b6(myang 'das): 'di snyam du sems te/ de ci'i phyir ri la 'dzin pa zhes bya zhe na/ ris ni sa bzung ste/ mi g.yo bar byed pas 'dzin pa zhes bya'o/ /ci'i phyir mig la 'dzin pa zhes bya zhe na/ mig gis
403b7(myang 'das): snang ba 'dzin pa'i phyir na 'dzin pa zhes bya'o/ /ci'i phyir na sprin la 'dzin pa zhes bya zhe na/ sprin ni klu'i dbugs yin te/ klu'i dbugs kyis chu 'dzin pas na sprin yang 'dzin pa
404a1(myang 'das): zhes bya'o/ /ci'i phyir mi la 'dzin pa zhes bya zhe na/ mis chos dang chos ma yin pa 'dzin nus pa'i phyir mi yang 'dzin pa zhes bya'o/ /ci'i phyir ma la
404a2(myang 'das): 'dzin pa zhes bya zhe na/ mas bu 'dzin pa'i phyir ma yang 'dzin pa zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi ming dang tshig dang don shes
404a3(myang 'das): pa'ang de dang 'dra'o/ /tshig so so yang dag par shes pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis don gcig bstan cing bshad
404a4(myang 'das): pa'ang don med pa'o/ /dper na/ skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khang khyim dang / theg pa dang / sems can la sogs pa'i ming rnams so/ /ci'i phyir don med ce na/ rigs
404a5(myang 'das): kyi bu/ don med ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul lo/ /tshig ces bya ba ni byis pa ma rabs rnams kyi spyod yul lo/ /don shes
404a6(myang 'das): pa'i phyir na tshig so so yang dag par shes pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /spobs pa so so yang dag par shes pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshig
404a7(myang 'das): shes shing don shes pas bskal pa tshad med grangs med pa'i bar du tshig dang don bshad pa zad mi shes pa'i phyir spobs pa so so yang dag par shes pa zhes bya'o/ /
404b1(myang 'das): rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bskal pa tshad med pa mtha' yas grangs med pa'i bar du kun rdzob kyi bden pa la shin tu nan tan byas so/ /de ltar
404b2(myang 'das): shin tu nan tan byas pas na chos so so yang dag par shes pa rtogs par gyur to/ /gzhan yang bskal pa tshad med grangs med pa'i bar du don dam pa'i bden pa la nan tan byas
404b3(myang 'das): pas na/ don so so yang dag par shes pa thob par gyur to/ /gzhan yang bskal pa tshad med mtha' yas pa'i bar du gtsug lag bya ka ra na la shin tu nan tan byas pas tshig so
404b4(myang 'das): so yang dag par shes pa thob par gyur to/ /gzhan yang bskal pa tshad med grangs med pa'i bar du 'jig rten gyi gtsug lag bslabs pas spobs pa so so yang dag par shes pa
404b5(myang 'das): thob par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis ni so so yang dag par shes pa bzhi po 'di dag thob pa'i gnas med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ ngas mdo sde dgu po
404b6(myang 'das): las| nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis so so yang dag par shes pa bzhi thob bo zhes gsungs te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis ni yang dag par thob pa med do/ /de ci'i
404b7(myang 'das): phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can gyi don byed pas so so yang dag par shes pa bzhi la nan tan byed do/ /rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa ni
405a1(myang 'das): zhi ba phyogs gcig pa spyod de gcig pu gnas pa la dga' bas/ gal te sems can gyi don byed na'ang mngon par shes pa 'ba' zhig ston gyi/
405a2(myang 'das): rtag tu cang mi smra bar 'dug pas ston cing bshad pa med na/ so so yang dag par shes pa bzhi lta zhig ga la yod/ /ci'i phyir cang mi smra ba la bstan pa med ce na/ rang sangs
405a3(myang 'das): rgyas kyis chos bshad pas sems can gyi don byed pa'am pha rol pos drod dang / spyi bo dang / 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog thob par 'gyur ba'am/ rgyun du zhugs pa dang /
405a4(myang 'das): lan gcig phyir ldog pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / dgra bcom pa thob par ram/ sangs rgyas thob par ram/ sangs rgyas thob par ram/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thob par
405a5(myang 'das): byed kyang mi nus la/ pha rol pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par byed kyang mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ rang sangs
405a6(myang 'das): rgyas ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mdo sde dgu po med de/ de bas na rang sangs rgyas ni tshig so so yang dag par shes pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag
405a7(myang 'das): par shes pa med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ rang sangs rgyas ni chos kun shes mod kyi/ chos so so yang dag par shes pa ni med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos so so yang dag par
405b1(myang 'das): shes pa ni yi ge shes pa zhes bya ste/ rang sangs rgyas kyis kyang yi ge shes mod kyi/ yi ge so so yang dag par shes pa zhes bya ba med do/ /de yang ci'i phyir zhe na/ rtag pa gnas
405b2(myang 'das): pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge gnyis po mi shes pas na/ rang sangs rgyas ni tshig so so yang dag par shes pa thob pa ma yin no/ /don shes kyang don so so yang dag par shes pa ma yin
405b3(myang 'das): no| |yang dag par don shes pa ni sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yod par shes pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gyi don ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
405b4(myang 'das): pa'i byang chub ces bya'o/ /de lta bas na rang sangs rgyas ni don so so yang dag par shes pa thob pa ma yin te/ de bas na rang sangs rgyas ni thams cad kyi thams cad du so so yang
405b5(myang 'das): dag par shes pa bzhi med do/ /ci'i phyir nyan thos la so so yang dag par shes pa bzhi med ce na/ nyan thos la thabs mkhas pa rnam pa gsum po med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsum
405b6(myang 'das): po gang zhe na/ nges pa'i tshig 'jam po smra zhing chos sbyin pa dang / nges pa'i tshig rtsub po smra zhing chos sbyin pa dang / 'jam po'ang ma yin rtsub po'ang ma yin pas chos sbyin pa
405b7(myang 'das): ste| nyan thos la rnam pa gsum po 'di dag med pas na so so yang dag par shes pa bzhi med do/ /gzhan yang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas ni tshig dang don shes pa'i
406a1(myang 'das): mthar yang ma phyin la/ spyod yul shes pa'i dbang du 'gyur ba'i ye shes kyang med/ stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi'ang med/ rten cing 'brel par
406a2(myang 'das): 'byung ba bcu gnyis kyi mthar phyin pa'ang ma yin/ sems can rnams kyi dbang po rno rtul gyi khyad par rtogs par yang ma gyur/ bden pa gnyis la the tshom za ba'i sems
406a3(myang 'das): kyang yongs su chad pa ma yin/ sems can gyi sems yul ci la dmigs pa'ang mkhas par ma gyur/ don dam pa'i stong pa nyid ston pa la shin tu mkhas par yang ma gyur
406a4(myang 'das): te| de bas na theg pa chung ngu gnyis kyis ni so so yang dag par shes pa bzhi thob pa ma yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis yang bcom ldan 'das la
406a5(myang 'das): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la thams cad kyi thams cad du so so yang dag par shes pa bzhi ma mchis na/ ci'i slad du de bzhin
